chi manyɛ́n bachǐmbɨ Yesu Kristo, ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít nɛ Ábraham.
Ábraham achí nyaka chi Áisek, Áisek abhak chi Jekɔ́p, Jekɔ́p abhak chi Júda nɛ bɔ̌mayi.
Júda achí nyaka chi Pɛ́res nɛ mɔ́mayi Sɛrá. Máyap aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Táma. Pɛ́res abhak chi Hɛ́srɔn, Hɛ́srɔn abhak chi Rám.
Rám achí nyaka chi Amínadap, Amínadap abhak chi Náshɔn, Náshɔn abhak chi Sálmɔn.
Sálmɔn achí nyaka chi Bóas. Nnɔ Bóas aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ráhab. Bóas abhak chi Óbɛd. Nnɔ Óbɛd aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Rút. Óbɛd abhak chi Jése,
Jése abhak chi Mfɔ Debhít. Debhít achí nyaka chi Sólomon. Nnɔ Sólomon ayambɨ abháy Uria, kɛ ǎbhay Debhít.
Sólomon achí nyaka chi Rehóboam, Rehóboam abhak chi Abíja, Abíja abhak chi Ása.
Ása achí nyaka chi Jɛhósafat, Jɛhósafat abhak chi Jóram, Jóram abhak chi Úsia.
Úsia achí nyaka chi Jótam, Jótam abhak chi Áhas, Áhas abhak chi Hesékia.
Hesékia achí nyaka chi Manáse, Manáse abhak chi Ɛ́mɔs, Ɛ́mɔs abhak chi Josáya.
Josáya achí nyaka chi Jɛkonáya nɛ bɔ̌mayi. Mpok yɔ kɛ̌ bápɔ́kɔ́ bo Israɛl bɛ mandɔk manchɔkɔ ɛtɔk Bábilɔn.
Mpok anɛ bo Israɛl bárɔ́ Bábilɔn bápɛ̀tnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyap, Jɛkonáya achí nyaka chi Síltiɛl, Síltiɛl abhak chi Sɛrúbabɛl.
Sɛrúbabɛl achí nyaka chi Ábiud, Ábiud abhak chi Ɛliákim, Ɛliákim abhak chi Ásɔ.
Ásɔ achí nyaka chi Sádɔk, Sádɔk abhak chi Ákim, Ákim abhak chi Ɛ́liud.
Ɛ́liud achí nyaka chi Ɛliása, Ɛliása abhak chi Mátan, Mátan abhak chi Jekɔ́p.
Jekɔ́p achí nyaka chi Josɛ́f nnɛ́m María, María anɛ ábhé Yesu mmu achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
Bɛ́bhó amʉɛ́t Ábraham bɛghaka amʉɛt Debhít, mkpák bachǐmbɨ Kristo ɛ́chí yɛ nyaka byo nɛ ɛnwi. Bɛ́bhó amʉɛt Debhít bɛghaka mpok bápɔ́kɔ́ bo Israɛl bɛ mándɔ́k mánchɔ́kɔ́ ɛtɔk Bábilɔn, ɛ́bhák byo nɛ ɛnwi. Bɛ́bhó mpok bo Israɛl bárɔ́ Bábilɔn bápɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyap, bɛ́chúɔp mpok Kristo, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, mkpák bachǐmbɨ Yesu ɛbhak byo nɛ ɛnwi.
Ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka kɛ bábhé Yesu Kristo: María achí nyaka nnɔ Yesu. Mpok yɔ Josɛ́f atɨ bɛ́bhay yi. Kɛ bápɛ́rɛ rɨŋɨ batɨ, ɛ́fákari bɛ María achi nɛ mɛniɛ. Apɔkɔ mɛniɛ bhɔ chí ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
Josɛ́f abhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Ɛ́kʉ́ yí kɛyáŋ bɛchyɛ María ntíánwɔ́p. Akʉ yɛ ntɨ bɛway nɛbhay nɛ María ansɛm ansɛm.
Kɛ ɛnɛ́ Josɛ́f ákàysi ndak anɛ, Mandɛm ató ángɛl ywi amɔt ntá Josɛ́f ndǔ kɛnɔ́. Ángɛl wu aghati yi bɛ, “Josɛ́f, ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Debhít, kɛ́chay bɛsɔt María ndǔ nɛbhay, apɔ́kɔ́ mɛniɛ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
Nɛ chɔŋ ambé mɔ́mbakanɛm. Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́mbak bɛ Yesu, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ yí ampɛmɛ bɔ̌bhi ndǔ ntɛmsi bɛbʉ́ bhap.”
Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fákárí bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ andɛm, ɛmfu tɛtɛp.
Arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Chɔŋ Ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re rɨŋɨ mbakanɛm ampɔkɔ mɛniɛ ambé mɔ́mbakanɛm, nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛmbak bɛ Ɛmánuɛl”, nɔ́ chí bɛ, “Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɛsɛ.”
Josɛ́f áŋɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ kɛnɔ́, akʉ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ángɛl Mandɛm aghati yi. Asɔt María ndǔ nɛbhay.
Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bɔ́ kɛrɨŋɨ batɨ kpátɛ María abhe Mɔ́ywi. Ábhé nɔ́kɔ́, Josɛ́f arɛm bɛ nnyɛ́n mmɔ́ chi Yesu.
Bábhé Yesu ɛtɔk Bɛ́tlɛhɛm atú Judɛ́ya. Mpok yɔ, Hɛ́rɔd abhak Mfɔ atú wu. Nɛbhé bábhé Yesu, bo abhɛn bárɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti mambe báfú atú mmok áfù batwɔ Yerúsalɛm, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
“Mmɔ anɛ bábhé bɛ́ ámbák Mfɔ bo Israɛl achí fá? Sɛ́bhɛ̀p mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ nɛmbe ɛnɛ́n nɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti nɛbhe ɛni awu atú mmok áfù, nɛ sɛ́twɔ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó.”
Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǒbhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́, ntí átáka yi amɛm. Ɛ́bhák ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ bǒ mankɛm amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm.
Hɛ́rɔd abhɨŋɨ bǒbatí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bábhɔŋ bɛbhe Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò fá?”
Bágháti yi bɛ, “Bábhɔŋ bɛbhe yi ɛtɔk Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, fá atú Judɛ́ya, mbɔnyunɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ,
Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Wɔ Bɛ́tlɛhɛm ndǔ mmɨk Júda, puyɛ̌ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí ansɛm ndǔ bɛtɔk Júda mɛnkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ ntá yɛ kɛ̌ Mfɔ áfù. Mfɔ anɛ ákɛ̀m bǒbha, bo Israɛl, mbɔ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ákɛ̀m bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n yi.’”
Hɛ́rɔd ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, abhɨŋɨ mankɔ bhɔ, abhɔ́ŋ kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ ansɛm ansɛm, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ́ mángátí yi mpok anɛ bɔ baghɔ nɛmbe ɛnɔ atú ɛtɔk yap.
Aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, mǎmbɛp sayri nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɔ́wu achi. Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ́ yi, pɛt ká nsɛm mǎngati mɛ, bɛ́ mɛ nkwɔ́ ndɔ́k nchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó.”
Mankɔ̌ bhɔ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd árɛ́mɛ́, báfá bare rɔŋ. Ndǔ bárɔ̀ŋ, bághɔ́ nkúbhɛ́ nɛmbe ɛnɛ́n báyámbɨ baghɔ atú ɛtɔk ɛyap nɛ nɔ́ nɛ́rɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ambɨ, bɔ́ mánkoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm. Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, nɛmbe ɛnɔ nɛ́te amfay nɛbu, tɛ́bhɛ́ tɛ́bhɛ́ nɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mɔ́wu áchí arɛ́.
Nɛghɔ́ bághɔ́ nɛmbe ɛnɔ, maŋák amap aya acha.
Bághɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ nɔ́ nɛ́té arɛ tɛbhɛ tɛbhɛ, barɔk bachwe amɛm, baghɔ mmɔ́ nɛ máyi María. Bátɛ́p mánɛ́n amɨk bare chyɛ yi kɛnókó. Mánɛ́nɛ bɛbha bhap bafɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yá nkáp báchyɛ́ mbɔ awap akap ntá yi. Ɛ́mɔt ɛbhak pú, ɛ́chák ɛ́bhák ɛnyǔ sɛrwɔ́ ɛsɛn bádùrɛ sɛ́nchyɛ nɔkɔ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp. Ɛnɛ́fú ɛ́bhák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ básɔ̀t bɛghoko ngú bɛ ákɛ́ chɔŋti.
Mankɔ bhɔ bápɛ́rɛ́ gurɛ, Mandɛm asɛmti bhɔ ndǔ kɛnɔ́ bɛ́ bákɛ́ pɛtnsɛm ntá Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd. Báfʉɛ́t chí ndǔ mbi achak kɛ bágurɛ ɛtɔk ɛyap.
Bǒ bhɔ nɔ́ batwɔ bɛghɔ Yesu bagurɛ nɔkɔ, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi ntá Josɛ́f ndǔ kɛnɔ́ ɛkɛ́n yi aghɔ aghati yi bɛ, “Josɛ́f, Hɛ́rɔd ǎyàŋ mbi bɛway mɔ́nɛ. Faté yɛ́, sɔt mmɔ́ nɛ máyi, bʉɛ́ dɔ́k ɛtɔk Íjip. Dɔ́k, ɔ́mbák árɛ́ kpátɛ ngati wɔ ɔ́mpɛ́tnsɛm.”
Josɛ́f aŋɛmɛ, asɔt mmɔ́ nɛ máyi, afa, arɔk ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ bhɔ nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ángɛl Mandɛm aghati yi.
Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, abhak arɛ kpátɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd agú. Mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́fákárí nyaka ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ andɛm, ɛmfu tɛtɛp bɛ, “Mbɨ́ŋɨ́ mɔ́wa bɛ ámfá ɛtɔk Íjip”.
Hɛ́rɔd ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ mankɔ̌ bhɔ bárwɔ yi ndǔ yi ánóŋó bhɔ kɛghɔ́, ntɨ nɛ́nɛn yi amɛm. Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mángwáy bɔ̌babhakanɛm mankɛm abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ cha mamiɛ́ apay ndǔ ɛtɔk Bɛ́tlɛhɛm nɛ ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi kɛkwɔt. Hɛ́rɔd atɨk bɛ́ ɛ́náŋ ɛ́chí mamiɛ́ apay bɛ́bhó mpok mankɔ bhɔ báyámbɨ baghɔ nɛmbe mpok bábhé Yesu.
Ɛ́kʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Jeremáya árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari, ɛmfu tɛtɛp.
Arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Ɛyɔŋɔ́ kɛbhɔ ɛ́fù ɛtɔk Ráma. Kɛbhɔ kɛ́yá nɛ bása. Ráshɛl ǎdì bɔ̌bhi. Mánɨ̀k yi mmʉɛt bɛ ambɔt kɛbhɔ kɛ apú ka mbɔnyunɛ bágu barɔ yi.”
Hɛ́rɔd ágú nɔ́kɔ́, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi ntá Josɛ́f ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip,
aghati yi bɛ, “Josɛ́f, faté sɔt mmɔ́ nɛ máyi pɛtnsɛm ndǔ mmɨk Israɛl. Bo abhɛn báyàŋ nyaka bɛway mmɔ́ manaŋ bagu.”
Josɛ́f aŋɛmɛ, asɔt nnɔ nɛ mmɔ́ apɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk Israɛl.
Kɛ Josɛ́f ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Akɛlos asɔt ɛpok ɛtayi mbɔ Mfɔ atú ɛtɔk Judɛ́ya, acháy bɛrɔŋ arɛ́. Ndǔ kɛnɔ́ kɛ́chák, ángɛl Mandɛm ayɛp Josɛ́f batú bɛ yi ándɔ́k chí atú Gálili.
Josɛ́f arɔk, achɔkɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Gálili ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Násárɛt, mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́chí amɛm ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ Mandɛm arɛm ɛ̌ti Kristo bɛ, “Chɔŋ bo mámbɨŋɨ yi bɛ ‘Mmu Násárɛt’”.
Mpok yɔ, Jɔ̌n Njwiti abho bɛ́gháti bho amɛm baso atú Judɛ́ya bɛ,
“Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi mbɔnyunɛ mpok Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.”
Jɔ̌n Njwiti kɛ̌ Aisáya ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm árɛ̀mɛ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Mmu achi amɛm baso ǎbɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Toŋtí ká mbi anɛ Acha áfʉɛ̀t arɛ. Kʉ́ ka mbǐ ywi ambak chak.’”
Nkú Jɔ̌n abhak chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ babyɔk mpɔŋɔ baso. Mgbat anɛ yi ágwɔ̀t ɛbho abhak nkwɔbhɛ́nya, nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛni nɛ́bhak ngɛ́mtáy nɛ bawɛrɛ́ bɛtu ámɛ́n yi ághɔ̀ amɛm baso.
Bɛyǎ bho báfú, bárɔ́k ntá Jɔ̌n ndu bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m. Báfú ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm, nɛ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, nɛ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi kɛkwɔt nɛ Nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan.
Báré su bɛbʉ́ bhap, Jɔ̌n anjwiti nɔkɔ bhɔ amɛm Nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan.
Kɛ Jɔ̌n ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bátwɔ̀ bɛ yi anjwiti bhɔ, abho bɛ́rɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bě bɛfé! Agha áyɛ́bhɛ́ be batú bɛ mǎnjaŋ mbi bɛbʉɛ ntɛmsi Mandɛm anɛ átwɔ̀?
Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mǎnáŋ bǎtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka tɛtɛp.
Bǎkɛ́ chɔkɔ mǎnkáysi bɛ bǎchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛpu kway bɛkʉ bhe. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛsɔt batay anɛ ankʉ yɔ́ ámbak bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham.
Yɛ̌ chí nɛ́nɛ, sɛtɨ sɛ́chí bhʉɛrɛ́, nɛ bákway bɛkpɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛpu nyu bɛrɨ́tɨ́ kɛpɛm tɛ ndǔ bakaŋ, mangʉɛp angó.”
“Mɛ̌jwìti bhe nɛ manyiɛp bɛtɔŋ bɛ́ bǎtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ átwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm achá mɛ ɛnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mmu anɛ nchí kaŋari nkwɔbhánya bɛkak ɛbhi. Ántwɔ́, chɔŋ anjwiti bhe nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ngó.
Ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ nchán myákátí awɔ bɛ́chák nkway ndǔ bɛ́fáp ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́ nɛ bɛkpáfu. Ánáŋ ánkʉ́ nɔ́, ǎsɔt mbwɔt antɛn ndǔ nkpánɛ́, anyɔ mmɨk, ansɔt bɛkwɔp ɛbhi amfyɛ ndǔ ngo anɛ apu nɛmɛ.”
Ɛ́bhɨ́kí tat, Yesu afú atú Gálili arɔk ndǔ Nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan bɛ Jɔ̌n anjwiti yi.
Kɛ Jɔ̌n kɛyaŋ bɛjwiti Yesu. Are yáŋ bɛkʉ Yesu anjibhiri nkaysi yi. Arɛm bɛ, “Ɔtwɔ bɛ njwítí wɔ, ɛnɛ́ mɛ kɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ ntá yɛ bɛ ɔ́njwítí mɛ́?”
Yɛ̌ nɔ́, Yesu akɛmɛ yi chi bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ɛ́mbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí wɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ ɛrɨ bɛ sɛnkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ.” Jɔ̌n aka yɛ, ajwiti Yesu.
Nɛjwiti Jɔ̌n ájwítí yi, Yesu afú anyɛ́n. Nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ, aghɔ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áfú amfay, asɔt mkpá ɛbhóŋó are sɛp kpát ate yi amʉɛt.
Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú yɛ amfay ɛ́ré rɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ yi tontó. Ǎchyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.”
Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ Yesu arɔk amɛm baso bɛ Satan amɔ yi.
Arɛ́ amɛm baso, Yesu abhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay bɛti nɛ ngósí ndǔ manywɔp bɛsa bɛpay. Nsay akɛ́m yi.
Satan arɔk ntá yi, arɛm bɛ, “Mbák ɔ́chí Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, chyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ batay anɛ anjibhiri andɔp bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt.”
Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Puyɛ̌ nɛnyíɛ́ nɔ́nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́kɛ̀m nɛpɛ́m. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m kɛ̌ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm nɛpɛ́m mmu.’”
Satan asɔt yi barɔk Yerúsalɛm, ɛtɔk Mandɛm, bákó ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ áchí tɛ amfay ndǔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm.
Arɛ́, arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Mbák ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm, dók, tɛ̌ndu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɔángɛl bhi mántwɔ́ manchyɛ wɔ nɛkwak. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, chɔŋ mánkpʉɛp wɔ nɛ amɔ́ yap bɛ́ ɔ́kɛ́ tɛm ɛkak ndǔ ntay.’”
Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Kɛ́mɔ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ.’”
Bɛ́fú afɔ, Satan asɔt Yesu ndǔ njiɛ anɛ áré sáp amfay, atɔ́ŋ yi bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm nɛ kɛfɔ ɛkɛn kɛ́chí arɛ́.
Arɛm yɛ ntá Yesu bɛ, “Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm mbák ɔ́ntɛ́p mánɛ́n bɛsí bha, ɔnchyɛ mɛ kɛnókó.”
Kɛ Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Fǎ mɛ bɛsí, wɔ Satan! Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ ‘Mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó chi ntá Mandɛm Acha, antók chí yi aywǐnti.’”
Satan arɔ yɛ Yesu arɔk, bɔángɛl Mandɛm barɔk bachyɛ Yesu nɛkwak.
Mpok Yesu aghoko bɛ bákɛ́m Jɔ̌n Njwiti báfyɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, afa atú Judɛ́ya apɛtnsɛm atú Gálili.
Kɛ yí kɛrɔ́ŋ Násárɛt. Arɔk achɔkɔ Kapɛ̌naum. Ɛtɔk Kapɛ̌naum ɛ́bhák nɛpak manyu Gálili, atú Sɛ́bulɔn nɛ Náftali.
Ɛ́fákárí nyaka ɛnyu yɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya andɛm ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Aisáya arɛm nyaka bɛ:
“Mmɨk Sɛ́bulɔn nɛ Náftali, mmɨk anɛ bo báfʉɛ̀t arɛ bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Manyu Gálili, mmɨk anɛ áchí ɛbhěnyɛn nɛgho Jɔ́dan, atú Gálili anɛ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bachi arɛ.
Bǒ abhɛn báchí amɛm ɛjuri, bághɔ bɛyǎ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́. Bǒ abhɛn báchí ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́kándǐ nɛwu, mbaŋ ǎghɔ ɛtɔk ɛyap nɛ́nɛ.”
Nɛbho mpok yɔ, Yesu abho bɛ́gháti bho bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́tɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.”
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, ɛnɛ́ Yesu ákɔ̀ nɛpak manyu Gálili, aghɔ́ bo bati apay, bɔ̌ nnɔ amɔt chi amɔt. Amɔt aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Símun. Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́chák nɛ́bhák bɛ Píta. Manɔ́ ywi aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Andru. Bɔ bati apay bare gʉɛp bɛyǎ nkáp anyɛ́n ndu bɛway nsi mbɔnyunɛ bachi nyaka bawǎnsi.
Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká bhák bakoŋo bha, nɛ chɔŋ ntɔŋ be ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ bɛ́ bo bachak mámbák bakoŋo bha.”
Tɛ́mté wu, Símun nɛ manɔ́ barɔ bɛyǎ nkáp yap, bakoŋo Yesu.
Yesu átɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt ambɨ mandú, aghɔ́ bɔ̌ nnɔ amɔt chi amɔt bachak bati apay, nɔ chi, Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi. Bábhák amɛm áchwí chɔkɔ nɛ ɛtayap Sɛbɛdi, mángoko nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nkáp yap. Yesu abhɨŋɨ bhɔ nkwɔ bɛ mámbák bakoŋo bhi.
Tɛ́mté wu, bárɔ́ áchwí wap nɛ ɛtayap, bákoŋo yi.
Yesu abho bɛkɔ atú Gálili ankɛm antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl, angati nɔkɔ bhɔ nkwɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bhɔ mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Nɛ ambu nɔkɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nɛme ɛnɛn bo babhɔŋɔ.
Ɛ́kʉ́ nnyɛ́n Yesu nɛ́táka kpát nɛ́gháka atú Síria ankɛm. Bo báré pɔkɔ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mame mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu mándɔk nɔkɔ ntá Yesu bɛ ámbú bhɔ. Mbɔk yap bábhák bo abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ, báchák bábhák bǒ abhɛn bákwɛ̀n ntímɛn, abhɛ́nɛ́fú babhak bǒ abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ́. Yesu abú bhɔ mankɛm.
Bɛyǎ bhó bare fú mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ mánkoŋo nɔkɔ Yesu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ. Mbɔk ɛyap báfú atú Gálili, báchák báfú Dikápolis, nɔ chi atú bɛtɔk byo, báchák báfú Yerúsalɛm, báchák báfú atú Judɛ́ya, nɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú báfú ɛbhěnyɛ́n nɛgho ɛnɛn babhɨŋɨ bɛ Jɔ́dan.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, bo báré twɔ ntá Yesu ndǔ bakwɔ́. Aghɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́, arɔk achɔkɔ ambɨ njiɛ. Bakoŋo bhi bákó bátɛ́mɛ́ri yi, bachɔkɔ nɛ yi.
Abho bɛtɔŋ bhɔ mɛnyɨ.
Are tɔ́ŋ andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághɔ́ bɛ bɛsí Mandɛm, yi apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ ywi!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bǒ abhɛn báchí ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ nɛ́nɛ; mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mánchyɛ bhɔ́ nɛpɔptí ntɨ!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛ bápú tɔŋ bɛtaŋ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ yí anchyɛ bhɔ áfɔ́k ankɛm anɛ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ́!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nsay nɛ ɛkwak bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ yi anchyɛ bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághɔ̀ bho ntínso, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm angɔ́ yi ntínso!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bǒ abhɛn batɨ yap áchí amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bɔ́ mángɔ́ yi!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bǒ abhɛn mánù bɛ bo mámbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ; mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bɔ mámbak bɔ̌bhi!
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bo báchyɛ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Ǎyɛt yi mbɔnyunɛ achí Mfɔ ywi!
“Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛka mpok bo básɔ̀kɔti bhe nɛ mpok anɛ báchyɛ̀ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri, mámbarɛ nɔkɔ bhe barak amʉɛt ndɛ́ndɛm ɛ̌ti ya.
Ŋák ká nɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ bhe ɛrɛm akap awu amfay. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ báchyɛ̀ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ abhɛn tɛsáy ɛsɔŋɔri nkwɔ.”
“Bǎchí mbɔ ngáŋ ntá bǒ mmɨk mankɛm. Kɛ mbák ngáŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔ́ŋ manyɨŋti mi, ná bákway bɛkʉ wu ampɛt ambak ɛrɨ́tí ngáŋ? Bápú pɛrɛ kway bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ wu. Árɔp chi ɛnyɨŋ bɛto nɛfí ɛbhak ɛnɛ bo báfʉɛ̀t mánjati nɔkɔ wu.
“Bǎchí ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá bǒ mmɨk. Ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí amfǎy njiɛ ɛ́pú bhɛsɛ.
Nɛ bápú durɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mánsɔt ɛnyɨŋ mánkuti. Bádurɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mánte chi ɛbhak ɛnɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛte yɔ bɛ́ mbaŋ ángɔ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achi anywɔ́p.
Dɔ̌ yɛ́ ka ɛpɨŋ ɛyɛka ɛ́ngɔ́ mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɛka ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́, mámbɨti Ɛtayɛka mmu achi amfay.”
“Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ ntwɔ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bɛbhé Moses. Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ ntwɔ chí bɛfɛrɛ basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mɔ́, ntwɔ chí bɛkʉ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.
Tɛtɛp, nchí ghati bhe bɛ tɛ mfǎy ámfʉɛt, mmɨk amfʉɛt, bápú kwáy bɛfɛrɛ yɛ̌ mandú ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ basɨŋ amɛn wáwák. Basɨ́ŋ amɛn ǎbhák kpátɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ́mfu tɛtɛp.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ yɛ̌ chí mɔ́bhé amɔt, antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo bachak bɛ mánkʉ́ ɛnyumɔt mbɔ yi, chɔŋ ambak ansɛm ndǔ nkwɔ bhó mankɛm abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap. Kɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm mɛnkɛm, antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo bɛ mankʉ nkwɔ mbɔ yi, ǎbhák mǔngo ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap.
Nchí ghati yɛ be bɛ, mbák mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ bɛbhɨkɨ cha ɛbhɛ́n batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ɛbhɛn bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǎpú bhák bo abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap.”
“Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́ghàti nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bɛ mmu ákɛ́ wáy ntɨ, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áway mmu, bákʉ̀ manyé nɛ yi.
Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábèntɨ nɛ mɔ́mayi Mandɛm ǎtaŋ yi. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɔ̀kɔti mɔ́mayi mbɔ bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɔchí agha?’ Básɔ̀t yi bɛsi acha manyɛ́. Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m ntá mɔ́mayi bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɛchɨŋtímu’ chí mmu anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛmɛsɛ amɛm nɛpǐngo.
Mbák ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ yɛ bɛchyɛ akap ntá Mandɛm kɛ ɔ́ntɨk bɛ ntɨ manɔ́ ǎbè ntɨ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́kʉ́ yi,
dɔ̌ akap aywɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bo báchyɛ̀ akap, dɔ́k kpɨ́k kʉ mǎmbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ yi kɛ ɔ́mpɛtnsɛm ɔnchyɛ akabhɛ ywɛ ntá Mandɛm.
“Mbák mmu abhɔŋ ndak nɛ wɔ, antí wɔ, dɔ́k tɛmɛrí yi ayak mǎnsokori ndak wu, mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Mbák ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ, mpok ámfʉɛ́t, yi andɔk ntá ntaŋá manyé nɛ wɔ, afyɛ́ wɔ amɔ yi, nɛ yi anchyɛ wɔ ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú, nɛ bɔ́ mámfyɛ wɔ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ɔpú fu wawak kpátɛ ɔnchyɛ ákwɔ́ ywɛ ankɛm, yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp.”
“Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛn bɛrwɔp.’
Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k amʉɛt ngɔrɛ́, ambɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛ yi, anáŋ akwɛn bɛrwɔp nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu ndǔ ntɨ ɛni.
Mbák nyɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ nɛmɔt nɛ́tò wɔ ndǔ bɛbʉ́, fɛrɛ́ nɔ gʉɛp. Ɛ́rɨ bɛ ɔ́nɛ́m ɛpókómʉɛt ɛyɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛcha wɔ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, mánsɔt mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nkɛm mámɛsɛ amɛm nɛpǐngo.
Nɛ mbák awɔ́nɛm ywɛ átò wɔ ndǔ bɛbʉ́, kpɔ́t wú gʉɛ́p. Ɛ́rɨ bɛ ɔ́nɛ́m ɛpókómʉɛt ɛyɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛcha wɔ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, mánsɔt mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nkɛm mámɛsɛ amɛm nɛpǐngo.”
“Ɛbhé Moses ɛpɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay, abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi ɛkáti ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ awǎy nɛbhay.’
Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɔ̀ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay ɛnɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp, akʉ ngɔrɛ́ akwɛn bɛrwɔp, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbakanɛm anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápɛ́t apu ɛkɛrɛ́nɛbhay, akwɛn nkwɔ bɛrwɔp.”
“Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́pɛ́t ɛ́ghàti nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bɛ, ‘Kɛ́ fyɛ́ bariɛp bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ bɛkʉ yɔ. Mmu abhɔŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyɨ́kɨ́ bɛkʉ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm.’
Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mmu abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛyɨkɨ wáwák. Mmu abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛyɨkɨ ambɨŋɨ mfay, mbɔnyunɛ mfay chi bɛchɔ́kɔ́ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm.
Mmu abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛyɨkɨ ambɨŋɨ mmɨk mbɔnyunɛ mmɨkɨ nɛ achi mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ Mandɛm ásɨ̀kɨ bɛkak arɛ. Nɛ mmu abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛyɨkɨ ambɨŋɨ Yerúsalɛm, mbɔnyunɛ chi ɛtɔk ɛrɛmɛ́ Mfɔ ywɛsɛ.
Kɛ́ yɨkɨ ɔmbɨŋɨ ntí ywɛ mbɔnyunɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ ɛkaká ɛmɛnɛ ɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ ɔbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ yɔ ɛmbak pyɔ.
Mbák ɔ́nká bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, dɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛɛ’. Mbák ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, dɛm bɛ, ‘Ǎe’. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha ɛyɔ, ɛ́fù chi ntá mbʉ́mbʉ.”
“Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mbák mmu achɔ́ŋtí nyɛ́sɛ́ ntɨ mánchɔ́ŋtí ɛni nkwɔ. Nɛ mbák mmu áfɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́nyɛ́n ntɨ, bábhɔŋ bɛfɛrɛ ɛni nkwɔ.’
Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák mmu akʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, ɔ́kɛ́ kɛmɛ yi. Mbák mmu adɛp wɔ atá ndǔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm, tɔ́ŋ yi ɛbhe ɛ́chák nkwɔ.
Mbák mmu ǎyàŋ bɛkʉ manyé nɛ wɔ bɛ ánsɔ́t nkú yɛ, kpɨk chyɛ̌ yi ndɛ yɛ nkwɔ.
Nɛ mbák ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anyɛ́rɛ́ wɔ́ bɛ ɔmpɔkɔ ntu ywi ɔndɔk nɛ yi nɛkɔ̌ ntay nɛmɔt, dɔ́k nɛ yi nɛkɔ̌ batay apay.
Mbák mmu anɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́, chyɛ̌ yi yɔ. Nɛ mbák mmu atwɔ ntá yɛ bɛ ɔ́mpúɔ yi ɛnyɨŋ ɔ́kɛ́ nisi bɛkʉ nɔ.”
“Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɔ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́kɔŋ mmǔ ɛtɔk ɛyɛ, ɔ́mpap mmu anɛ ápábhɛ́ wɔ.’
Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, kɔŋ ka bǒmpap abhɛka, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ankwak bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ̀ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri.
Mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, bo bághɔ bɛ bǎchí bɔ̌ ɛtayɛka mmu achi amfay. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ yi ǎto mmok ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ bɛbʉ́ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́. Mandɛm ǎto manyiɛp ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ nɛ mmu anɛ ápú kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ mmu wu ankʉ.
Mbák bǎkɔŋ chi bǒ abhɛn bákɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe, ntɨkɨ nsáy bǎbhɔŋ? Yɛ̌ chí bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ mbɔ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti bakɔŋ bǒ abhɛn bákɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɔ.
Nɛ mbák bǎkaka chi bǒ abhɛn mǎnyìɛ nɛ bhɔ, nɔ́ bǎkʉ yi? Yɛ̌ chí bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákʉ̀ nɔ.
Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛbhak chak ndǔ babhi ankɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtayɛka Mandɛm mfay achi chak ndǔ babhi ankɛm!”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Sɔt ká mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ kʉ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ankʉ bɛsi bho ndu bɛtɔŋ mmʉɛt. Mbák mmu ankʉ nɔ, apú bhɔŋ nsáy anɛ Ɛtayɛka Mandɛm mfay áchyɛ̀.
“Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ ɔ́chyɛ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ntá mmu anɛ ɛyi ɛ́pú, kɛ́ dɛp akánkáŋ mbɔ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ mángɔ́ bhɔ. Bákʉ nɔ amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndu mántɨ́tɔk bɛ bo mámbɨti bhɔ. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ nɛbɨti anɛ bo bábɨti bhɔ chi awap akap ankɛm anɛ́ bɔ mǎnáŋ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
Mbák ɔ̌chyɛ̀ mmu ɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyi ɛ́pú, kʉ nɔ́ ɛnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ̀.
Ɛ́rɨ bɛ ɔ́nkʉ́ bɛrɨ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ nɛ chɔŋ Ɛtayɛ Mandɛm mmu ághɔ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ákʉ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ankap wɔ.”
“Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnɨkmʉɛt, bǎkɛ́ kʉ mbɔ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ mángɔ́ bhɔ́. Bákɔŋ bɛte amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndǔ manyé mbi kɛ manɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ mángɔ́ bhɔ. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, nɛghɔ́ anɛ bo bághɔ̀ bɛ bɔ mǎnɨkmʉɛt, chi awap akap anɛ mǎnáŋ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
Mpok anɛ mmǔ ywɛka áyàŋ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, ánchwé anywɔ́p, ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi ábhak aywǐnti, antíɛ́p mbǐnywɔp anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm Ɛta yɛka mmǔ bápú ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k. Mbák mmu akʉ nɔ, chɔŋ Ɛtayɛka mmu ághɔ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ákʉ̀ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ankap yi.
“Mpok mmu ywɛka ánɨ̀kmʉɛt, ákɛ́ rɛm bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt, mbɔ bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákʉ̀. Bákʉ̀ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bákaysi bɛ bɛyǎ kɛpɨ kɛ kɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm angok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap.
Bǎkɛ́ bhak mbɔ bhɔ́. Bǎpɛrɛ nɨkmʉɛt, Mandɛm Ɛtayɛka anaŋ arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎyaŋ.
Ɛnyu ɛnɛ kɛ̌ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt: ‘Ɛtayɛsɛ, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí amfay: Kʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛna kɛnókó;
kʉ bɛ́ mandɔ wɔ ɔmbak Mfɔ wap; nɛ bɛ mánkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́yaŋ bo mankʉ fá amɨk, mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi awu amfay.
Chiɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn ɛchɔŋ;
Ɔ́mfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ, mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́fóŋórí bo abhɛn bákʉ́ bhɛsɛ bɛbʉ́.
Nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ ka sɛ́nchwe ndǔ nɛmɔ ɛnɛn nɛ́kʉ sɛ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́, kɛ fɛrɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndu amɔ mbʉ́mbʉ.’
“Mbák ɔ́mfóŋórí bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ wɔ bɛbʉ́, chɔŋ Ɛtayɛ Mandɛm mmu áchí amfay nkwɔ amfoŋori wɔ.
Kɛ mbák ɔpú foŋori bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ wɔ bɛbʉ́, Ɛtayɛ Mandɛm Mmu achi amfay apú foŋori wɔ.”
“Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎtàt nsay ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm, bɛsí ɛbhɛka bɛ́kɛ́ bhak mbɔ bǒ abhɛn ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ. Bǎkɛ́ bhak mbɔ bǒ bɛtábhá. Bágwɔt bɛsí bhap chi bɛ bo mángɔ́ bɛ bɔ bachi ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, nɛghɔ́ anɛ bo bághɔ̀ bɛ bɔ bátàt nsay, chí awap akap anɛ mǎnáŋ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
Kɛ mpok ɔ́bhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay, sǒ bɛsí bhɛ watí, ɔ́mpák ntí.
Mbák ɔ́nkʉ́ nɔ, bo bápú rɨŋɨ bɛ ɔchí ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay, kɛ Ɛtayɛ mmu bápú ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k ǎrɨŋɨ. Nɛ chɔŋ Ɛtayɛ mmu ághɔ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ákʉ̀ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ankap wɔ.”
“Bǎkɛ́ sɔt kɛfɔ̌ nkáp nɛ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak mǎmbʉrɛ fá amɨk. Fá amɨk, kɛngɔk nɛ mfárɛ́káŋ báchɔ̀ŋti, nɛ baghɛ́p báwày ɛkɛt mámpɔkɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛ, ansɔt kɛfɔ̌ nkáp ɛki nɛ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ambʉrɛ amfay ntá Mandɛm. Arɛ́, kɛngɔk nɛ mfárɛ́káŋ bápú kway bɛchɔŋti bhɔ nɛ baghɛ́p bápú kway bɛdak ɛkɛt mángɛ́p wú.
Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ nkáp aywɛ áchí, arɛ́ kɛ̌ ntɨ ɛnɛ nkwɔ nɛ́bhak.”
“Amɨ́k áchí ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ángɔ mbaŋ. Mbák mmu abhɔŋ amɨ́k arɨarɨ, ǎghɔ andɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀.
Kɛ mbák ápú arɨarɨ, mmʉɛt yɛ nkɛm ǎbhák chi amɛm ɛjuri. Kɛ mbák ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛyɛ ɛ́girigíri, nɔ́ ɛjuri ɛnɛ ɔchí arɛ ɛya ɛcha.”
“Yɛ̌ mmu apu kwáy bɛtok bachi bati apay ndɔŋ amɔt. Mbák ámbɔ́ŋ bachi bapay, ǎkɔŋ amɔt ancha anɛfú, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ǎchyɛ kɛnókó ntá amɔt, ambyák anɛfu. Mmu apu kwáy bɛtok Mandɛm antok nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk.
“Nɔ́ kɛ̌ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛni andɛm bɛ́, ‘Chɔŋ nyíɛ yi? Chɔŋ nyú yi? Chɔŋ mfyɛ́ yi?’ Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha nɛnyíɛ́? Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha ndɛnɛ́?
Yɨŋɨ́ ká kɛnɛn. Kɛ́pú kwaŋ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ kɛ́pú fɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ kɛmbay ndǔ bɛtɛm. Yɛ̌ nɔ, Ɛtayɛka mmu achi amfay ǎchyɛ kɔ nɛnyíɛ́. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ bǎchá kɛnɛn-ɛ?
Nɛ ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka basɛ́mɛ́ ákway bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́nsap yɛ̌ chi mandú nɨŋɨnɨŋɨ, nɛncha ɛnyu nɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak?
“Nɛ ndaká yí bǎbhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti ndɛn ɛnɛ bɛ́fyɛ́ amʉɛt? Yɨŋɨ́ ká ɛnyǔ bɔchuchu abhɛn bachi ɛbhɨ bágò. Bápú kʉ bɛtɨk nɛ bapu ghoko ndɛn.
Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ chí Mfɔ Sólomon mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛyǎ kɛnɛ́m, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛrɨ mbɔ yɛ̌ chuchu amɔt.
Mandɛm kɛ̌ ághókó tákɔ nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhi, tákɔ anɛ ákway bɛbhak ɛchɔŋ, mbúrɛ́ angwɔsi, mámfyɛ́ angó. Bǎkáysí bɛ́ be kɛ̌ Mandɛm apu kwáy bɛ́kwák mǎmbɔ́ŋ ndɛn bɛ́fyɛ́ amʉɛt kɛ? Nɛka ɛnɛká nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́gʉ́psi nɛcha!
“Bǎkɛ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ basɛ́mɛ́, mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ sɛ́nyiɛ yi? Chɔŋ sɛ́nyú yi? Chɔŋ sɛ́mfyɛ́ yi?’
Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm kɛ̌ bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ arɛ. Kɛ Ɛtayɛka mmu áchí amfay arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm.
Yǎ yɛ́ ka mbɨ bɛfyɛ ntí bɛrɔ Mandɛm ámbák Mfɔ ywɛka, mǎmfyɛ́ ntí bɛkʉ chi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ bo mankʉ, nɛ chɔŋ yi anchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nkwɔ.
Bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti nywɔp ɛnɛn mbúrɛ́. Chɔŋ mbúrɛ́ antwɔ nɛ ayi barak anɛ mmu afyɛ́ ntí arɛ. Bǎkɛ́ sɔt bɛsɔŋɔri bɛchak mǎmáká ndǔ ɛbhɛn ɛchɔŋ.”
“Bǎkɛ́ táŋ batɨ kɛ́ká mántáŋ be nkwɔ.
Mmu ákɛ́ táŋ ntɨ mbɔnyunɛ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɔ́tàŋ ntɨ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm átàŋ wɔ. Ɛnyǔ ɔ́yɛ̀nti ɔ́nchyɛ ntɨ, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ báyɛ̀nti mánchyɛ wɔ.
Ndaká yí ɔ́yɨ̀ŋɨ mɔ́ɛ̌nyɨŋɨ anɛ achi anyɛsɛ ntɨ, ɛnɛ́ ɔ́pú fyɛ ntí ndǔ nkɔkɔ́nɔk anɛ achi wɔ anyɛsɛ?
Ná ɔ́ghàti ntɨ bɛ, ‘Manɔ́, dɔ̌ mɛ mfɛ́rɛ́ mɔ́ɛ̌nyɨ́ŋɨ́ anɛ achi wɔ anyɛ́sɛ́,’ ɛnɛ́ nkɔkɔ́nɔk achi wɔmbɔŋ anyɛsɛ?
Wɔ mmǔ bɛtábhá, fɛrɛ́ kpɨ́k nkɔkɔ́nɔk anɛ achi wɔmbɔ̌ŋ anyɛsɛ, kɛ ɔ́ngɔ mbaŋ sayri bɛfɛrɛ mɔ́ɛ̌nyɨ́ŋɨ́ anɛ achi amɛm nyɛ́sɛ́ manɔ́ywɛ.
“Bǎkɛ́ sɔt mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm mǎnchyɛ ntá bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi. Báchí mbɔ mmú. Mmu ákɛ́ sɔt mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ ntá bo abhɛn bábyak bhɔ. Báchí mbɔ bakók. Mbák mánchyɛ bakók ɛnyɨŋɨ́ nkáp, básɔ̀t mányɔp chi ndǔ ntɔp. Nɛ mbák mǎnchyɛ mmú mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm, ǎyibhiri mmʉɛt antoko bhe anɛt.”
“Nɨk mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ, chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ. Yáŋ, chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ. Dɛp nɛkok, chɔŋ mánɛnɛ ntá yɛ.
Kʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ ɛnyɨŋ, ǎghɔ yɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɛkok, mánɛnɛ ntá yi.
Bě bachǐbhɔ, mmu ywɛka anɛ mbák mɔ́ywi ámbɛ́p yi brɛt, ansɔt chi ntay anchyɛ yi, chi agha?
Mbák ámbɛ́p wɔ tansi, ɔ̌chyɛ yi nnyɔ́ kɛ?
Mbák be bǒ bɛbʉ́, bǎbhɔŋ ntɨ bɛchyɛ bɛrɨ́tɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ̌bhɛka, bǎkáysí bɛ Ɛtayɛka mmu achi amfay kɛ anɔk bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkɔŋ ndu bɛchyɛ bɛrɨ́tɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bǒ abhɛn mǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt kɛ?
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánkʉ́ yɛ nɛ batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákway bɛyaŋ bɛ bo mankʉ ntá yi. Mbák mǎnkʉ́ nɔ, ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Moses nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bághàti bhɛsɛ amɛm basɨŋɨ́ amap.
“Nyǔbhá anɛ́ mmu áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́ bɛchwe ndǔ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm áchí mábhɛ́rí. Nyǔbhá anɛ́ mmu áfʉɛt arɛ andɔk anchwe ndǔ mbǐ nɛwú ánɛ́nɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ mbi wu áchɨk, nɛ ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk bɛfʉɛt arɛ. Ɛ́kʉ bo abhɛn báfʉɛ̀t arɛ baya. Fʉɛ́t yɛ́ ka chi ndǔ nyǔbhá anɛ achi mábhɛ́rí.
Fʉɛ́t yɛ́ ka ndǔ nyǔbhá anɛ achi mábhɛ́rí mbɔnyunɛ wú kɛ̌ mmu áfʉɛt arɛ́ anchwe ndǔ mbǐ nɛpɛ́m. Mbi wu ábè mmʉɛt bɛfʉɛt arɛ́, nɛ bǒ abhɛn báfʉɛ̀t arɛ babhɨkɨ ya.”
“Sɔt ka mpok nɛ bǒ-nsé abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ báchí barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm. Bákɔ̀t ngɛpti bɛ báchí bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, kɛ sayri sayri, báchí chí nkwɔ ɛnɛ nsay ánu yɔ.
Chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɔ́ báchí ndǔ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmu árɨŋɨ ɛnɔk ndǔ kɛpɛm ɛki. Bápú rɔŋ ndǔ támfáŋ mánkɔ́k nɛpɨ. Nɛ bápú rɔŋ ndǔ nnɛt áróŋóri mánkɔ́k bakwa.
Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnɔk. Ɛ́nyu chi bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɛm, ɛpu kway mɛnyu bɛbɛ́ptí kɛpɛm.
Nɛ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnɔk ɛ́nyu chi bɛbɛ́ptí kɛpɛm, ɛ́pú kwáy mɛ́nyú bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɛm.
Bákɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́pú nyu bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɛm, mámkpɔti, mansɔŋ ango.
Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé bachi mbɔ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bɛpu nyu bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɛm. Bǎrɨŋɨ bhɔ chi ndǔ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap.”
“Puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ bɛ, ‘Acha, Acha’ kɛ̌ áchwè ndǔ Kɛfɔ̌ mfáy. Mǔnɛ ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay áyaŋ kɛ áchwe arɛ.
Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ manyé, chɔŋ bɛyǎ bho mándɛm ntá ya bɛ, ‘Acha, Acha, pú sɛ́ghàti nyaka bho Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna? Pú sɛ́bòk nyaka bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna? Nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna!’
Kɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ chɔŋ ngati bhɔ bhɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ be wáwák. Fǎ ká mɛ bɛsí, be bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́.’”
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌rɛ̀m, ankʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛ́mɛ́, achí mbɔ ndɨŋɨndak anɛ até ɛkɛt ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́.
Ɛ̌ti yɔ, yɛ̌ndu manyiɛp ákwɛ́nɛ́ tontó, nɛ manyɛ́n ájwí, agboko, babhʉɛ́p ataŋataŋ anu, ɛkɛt ɛyɔ ɛ́kɛ kwɛn. Ɛ́kɛ kwɛn mbɔnyunɛ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt até yɔ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́.
Kɛ mmu anɛ ǎghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌rɛ̀m, yi kɛ kʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛ́mɛ́, achí mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu anɛ áté ɛkɛt ndǔ ɛ̌siɛ́p.
Ɛso ɛ́twɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, manyiɛp akwɛn tontó, ajwi, ataka ɛbhɨ, babhʉɛ́p ataŋataŋ ánú, ɛkɛt ɛyɔ ɛ́báy mmʉɛt amɨk juu!
Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ, bǒ mankɛm abhɛn báchí arɛ bábhák maknkay tontó ɛ̌ti ɛyi ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ.
Ǎtɔ̀ŋ nyaka mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛmay, puyɛ̌ mbɔ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses.
Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ, arɔ njiɛ asɛp amɨk. Bɛyǎ bo bábhó bɛkoŋo yi.
Bápɛ́rɛ yiŋɨ́, mmu ɛbhaŋákwa amɔt atwɔ akwɛn yí bɛkak abho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbák ɔkɔŋ, ɔ̌kway bɛkʉ mɛ ntaŋ.”
Yesu anyabhɛ awɔ atɔk yi arɛm bɛ, “Nkɔŋ bɛkʉ wɔ ɔ́ntáŋ, nɛme ɛnɛ nɛ́máy.” Tɛ́mté wu, ataŋ.
Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Kɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí, kɛ dɔ́k ntá nchiakap Mandɛm bɛ yi angɔ bɛ ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛ́may. Ánáŋ ámbyó wɔ, ɔ́ndɔk, ɔnchyɛ yɛ akap ntá Mandɛm bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhé Moses. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bo bɛ ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛmay.”
Yesu afa are rɔ́ŋ Kapɛ̌naum. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, mmu amɔt anɛ áchí mǔnti ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Rom bɛsa bɛtay arɔk ntá Yesu, abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá yi,
andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Acha, mmɔ̌bɛtok awa achí anywɔ́p bɨ́ŋɨ́rí nɛ bɛyǎ bɛbe.”
Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ntwɔ nkʉ yi antaŋ.”
Kɛ mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu wu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mmu anɛ ɔ́twɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi. Chiɛ́ chí ɛyɔŋ, chɔŋ mmɔ̌bɛtok wa antaŋ.
Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnkwɔ́ mbɔ̌ŋ bǒ abhɛn, mbák mángátí mɛ nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛghok bhɔ. Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nkwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu antɛnɛ ya abhɛn mbák ngati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ, bábhɔŋ bɛghok mɛ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Dɔ́k’, ǎrɔ́ŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Twɔ́’, ǎtwɔ. Nɛ mbák ngátí mmɔ̌bɛtok awa bɛ, ‘Kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ’, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɔ.”
Yesu ághókó nɔkɔ nɔ, abhak maknkay tontó. Ayibhiri mmʉɛt, arɛm ntá bǒ abhɛn bákòŋo yi bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ yɛ̌ mmu Israɛl amɔt anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́.
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bɛyǎ bo báfù chɔŋ bɛbhě mɛnkɛm mántwɔ manchɔkɔ nɛ Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p ndǔ mɛnyiɛ ɛpǎ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛrɛ kɛfɔ mfay.
Kɛ chɔŋ mántɛn bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛrɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛfí ndǔ ɛjuri. Arɛ́, mámbak ndǔ kɛbhɔ nɛ nɛnyiɛ ámɛ́n.”
Yesu ayibhiri yɛ mmʉɛt arɛm ntá mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛ, “Pɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́nókó.” Nkúbhɛ́ mpok anɛ Yesu árɛ̀m nɔ, mmɔ̌bɛtok wu ataŋ.
Yesu arɔk achwe ɛkɛt Píta, aghɔ́ nnɔ ngɔrɛ́ ywi bhʉ́rɛ́ nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p amʉɛt.
Arɔk yi nɛ́kúmʉɛt atɔk yi ndǔ awɔ. Mbʉ́ɛ́p wu ámay. Afate akʉ nɛnyíɛ́ abho mɛne Yesu.
Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku, bo báré sɔt bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ mándɔk nɔkɔ ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ. Yesu are sɔt chí ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi amboko nɔkɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ mɛ́ndɔ́ bho, nɛ ambu nɔkɔ bǒmame.
Yesu akʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntá bho bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Aisáya arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Asɔt mame ayɛsɛ nɛ apɔkɔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛsɛ́.”
Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyǎ bo ndǔ bátwɔ́ bákábhɛ́ yi, aghati baghɔk abhi bɛ, “Sɛ́mpé ɛbhě manyu ɛ́nɛ awu.”
Ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm amɔt arɔk yɛ ntá Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, chɔŋ nkoŋo wɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ́rɔ̀ŋ.”
Yesu akɛmɛ yi nɛ nɛkay bɛ, “Bɛsɔp bɛbhɔŋ babhok, kɛnɛn kɛ́bhɔ́ŋ manyay, kɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛbhak bɛsoŋ ntí.”
Nkoŋo Yesu achak arɔk ntá yi arɛm bɛ, “Acha, dɔ̌ kpɨ́k ndɔ́k mbɛ́mɛ́ Ɛtaya.”
Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Koŋó mɛ. Dɔ̌ bawú mámbɛ́mɛ́ ngú wap.”
Yesu arɔk achwe amɛm áchwí nɛ bakoŋo bhi ndu bɛ́pe bɛrɔŋ ɛbhě manyu ɛchak.
Ndǔ bárɔ̀ŋ, bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ́ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ábhó mɛnu, mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛbho bɛdɛp áchwí, manyiɛp anchwe nɔkɔ amɛm. Yesu abhak ndǔ kɛnɔ́.
Bakoŋo bhi bárɔ́k maŋɛmɛ yi barɛm bɛ, “Acha, pɛmɛ́ bhɛsɛ, sɛ́twɔ̀ gu anyɛ́n!”
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Bǎcháy yi? Nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ́gʉpsi nɛcha!” Afate yɛ asáy mbʉ́ɛ́p nɛ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn, nnyɛ́n nɛkwɛn tɨɨɨ.
Bábhák maknkay tontó, babho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmu nɛ́? Yɛ̌ chí mbʉ́ɛ́p ághòk yi, mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́ngok yí!”
Yesu arɔk aghaka atú mmɨk bǒ Gɛrása ɛbhě manyu ɛchak. Bǒ bati apay abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ, báfú ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ manɛm anɛ́ bɔ́ báchɔ̀kɔ arɛ, bátɛ́mɛri yi. Bághɔ̀ nyaka bo, mántoko bhɔ anɛt. Ɛ́kʉ́ bo kɛpɛrɛ fʉɛ́t atú wu.
Nɛghɔ́ anɛ bághɔ́ Yesu, babho bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mmɔ Mandɛm, ɔbhɔ̌ŋ ntɨkɨ ndak nɛ bhɛsɛ́? Ɔ́twɔ́ bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɛmsi ɛnɛ́ mpok abhɨkɨ re kway?”
Ɛrɛmɛ nkwɔ́ bakók ányìɛ nyaka kɛkwɔt nɛ nɛbhʉɛ́t wu.
Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ bɛ́bhó mɛnɨk Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ, “Mbák ɔ̌bòk bhɛsɛ, tó bhɛsɛ chi ndǔ nkwɔ bakók wu.”
Yesu aghati bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká.” Bɛ́fú bǒbhɔ amʉɛt, bɛrɔk, bɛchwe ndǔ nkwɔ bakók. Bakók ankɛm bárókóri básɛp ndǔ nkoko-njiɛ dúgúdúgúdúgú bágúrɛ anyɛ́n.
Bǒ abhɛn bábhàbhɛri bakók, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábʉɛ́, bárɔk ndǔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt, baghati bho yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fákárí nɛ bǒ abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri nyaka bhɔ.
Ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́móko tɛ́mté ɛrɔk ɛ́tɛ́mɛri Yesu. Mánɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ ándɔ́ atú ɛtɔk ɛyap.
Yesu áfá nɔ́kɔ́ atú Gɛrása, arɔk, asɔt áchwí apé nnyɛ́n, apɛtnsɛm Kapɛ̌naum, ɛtɔk ɛnɛ yi áchɔ̀kɔ.
Bǒfú bátwɔ́ nɛ mbɛ́ntí amɔt anɛ bápɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛkpaka ntá yi. Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ yi bɛ abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛbu mmu wu, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mɔ́wa, ɔ́kɛ́ chay, mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛ.”
Ɛkʉ mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ bábho bɛrɛm nɛ mmʉɛ́t ɛyap bɛ, “Ǎrɛm kpát mbɔ bhɛ́ achi Mandɛm! Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ̌ ákway bɛ́fóŋóri bɛbʉ́ mmu!”
Yesu arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàysi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ?
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk chí ɛnɛ? Bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhɛ,’ kɛ chi bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Faté kɔ?’
Kɛ chɔŋ nkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk bɛfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho.” Arɛm ntá mbɛ́ntí wu bɛ, “Faté, pɔkɔ́ bɛkpaka bhɛ gurɛ!”
Mbɛ́ntí wu afate kpɛrɛp, agurɛ.
Bo bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari, bábhak maknkay tontó, babho bɛbɨti Mandɛm mmú áchyɛ́ nkwǎ ɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ.
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi ábú mbɛ́ntí ákɔ̀, árɔ̀ŋ, aghɔ́ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti amɔt chɔkɔ amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́bɛtɨk ɛyi. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Mátio. Abhɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Twɔ́, bhák nkoŋo wa.” Mátio afate, abho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Mátio abhɨŋɨ Yesu ɛkɛt ɛyi. Anak mamʉɛrɛ bhi nɛ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti bachak, nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak. Yesu, achɔkɔ anyiɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ, nɛ bakoŋo bhi nkwɔ.
Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Yesu ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́, bábhó bɛbhɛp bakoŋo Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí ntɔŋ ywɛka ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɛn?”
Yesu ághók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m, akɛmɛ bhɔ nɛ nɛkay bɛ, “Bǒ abhɛn bápú me, bápú yaŋ ngaŋ. Bǒ mame kɛ báyàŋ ngaŋ.”
Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká, mǎnu bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́. Arɛm bɛ básɨŋ bɛ, ‘Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ chi bɛ bo mángɔ́ ntínso nɛ batɨ, puyɛ̌ chi akabhɛ́nya.’ Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ bɛbhɨŋɨ bǒ abhɛn bakaysi bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ mámbák bakoŋo bha, ntwɔ bɛ́bhɨ́ŋɨ chi bo babʉ́babʉ́.”
Mbɔk bakoŋo Jɔ̌n Njwiti bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ndaká yí bɛsɛ́ nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi sɛ́tarɛ nɔkɔ nsay ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm, kɛ bakoŋo bhɛ bápú kʉ nɔ?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎkáysí bɛ́ bo bákwày bɛchɔkɔ nsónso ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛnɛ́ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ abhʉɛ́t nɛ bhɔ? Nsé! Kɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ báfɛrɛ chɔŋ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ ntá yap. Nɛ chɔŋ mǎntarɛ nsay mpok yɔ.”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛsɔt ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn nkɔ anchók mbok ndǔ ɛsɨ́ ndɛn? Mbák mmu ankʉ nɔ, ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn nkɔ ɛ́ŋàti, ɛnkʉ mbokó ndɛn ánchɨk ancha ɛsɨ́ mbok.
Nɛ ntá bo abhɛn báfyɛ mmɛ́m ndǔ bɛbhǎ nkwɔbhanya, bápú fyɛ mmɛ̌m bakɔ amɛm ɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛnya ɛnɛ ɛsɨ. Mbák mánkʉ́ nɔ, ɛbha ɛ́sɛn, ɛnchɔŋɔ, nɛ mmɛm andɔk amɨk. Báfyɛ mmɛm bakɔ chi ndǔ ɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛnya ɛnɛ ɛkɔ. Mbák mánkʉ nɔ, mmɛm ápú rɔŋ amɨk nɛ ɛbha ɛpu sɛn ɛnchɔŋɔ.”
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu abhʉɛt bɛghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ mǔnti bo Israɛl amɔt arɔk akwɛ́n yi bɛkak, abho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, mɔ́wa agu nɛ́nɛ. Chí mɔ́ngɔrɛ́. Nnɨkmʉɛt, twɔ́ nyaŋá amɔ yi amʉɛt, nɛ chɔŋ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
Yesu afate nɛ bakoŋo bhi bábho bɛrɔŋ nɛ mǔnti wu.
Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, ngɔrɛ́ amɔt afú Yesu ansɛm, arɔk pɛtii, atɔk nkokoŋ nkú yi. Ngɔrɛ́ wu ǎfɛ̀rɛ nyaka manoŋ ndǔ mamiɛ́ byo nɛ apay.
Akʉ nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ arɛm nyaka nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, “Mbák ntɔk yɛ̌ chi nkokoŋ ndɛn Yesu, chɔŋ ntaŋ.”
Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ́ yi, aghati yi bɛ, “Mɔ́wa, kɛ́chay. Nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.” Tɛ́mté wu ngɔrɛ́ wu ataŋ.
Yesu afʉɛ́t yɛ are rɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔnti bo Israɛl wu. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, achwe anywɔ́p, aghɔ́ bafě babhaŋ nɛ ngɛ́mtay bho ndǔ bádì kɛbhɔ nɛ bɛyǎ ɛwat.
Aghati bɔ́ mankɛm bɛ, “Fú ká kpɨ́k, mɔ́nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ gú. Ǎbhʉrɛ chí kɛnɔ́.” Bɔ́ mankɛm báré way Yesu way.
Bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt bátɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ nɛfí, Yesu arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ ngú wu, ákɛ́m yi ndǔ awɔ́, mɔ́wu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, afate.
Mbok ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ ataka atú ɛtɔk wu ankɛm.
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt wu árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ, manɛ́mámɨk bati apay babho bɛkoŋo yi mámbɨk nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít, ghɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso!”
Mpok Yesu achwe anywɔ́p, manɛ́mɛ́ amɨ́k bhɔ bákóŋo yi arɛ́. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ́ “Mǎnókó bɛ mɛ̌kwáy bɛkʉ mǎngɔ́ mbaŋ?” Bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Acha, sɛ́noko.”
Yesu atɔk yɛ amɨ́k ayap arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́mbák nɛ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ mǎnókó.”
Amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ bhɔ tɛ́mté, bapɛt babho bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Yesu asɛmti bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.”
Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bárɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́, mángati nɔkɔ bho ndǔ atú ɛtɔk wu ankɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ ntá yap.
Bǒ-bhɔ bati apay bárɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, bǒfu basɔt mbók bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ yi. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ kɛ ɛ́kʉ́ nyaka yi ákwɛ́nɛ́ kɛbhok.
Yesu abók ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ. Ɛ́rɔ́ mmu wu, abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ tɛ́mté. Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́, babhak maknkay, bábhó bɛrɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛnyu fá amɛm ɛtɔk Israɛl.”
Kɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Chí mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ kɛ̌ áchyɛ́ Yesu bɛtaŋ bɛ́bok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.”
Yesu ǎkɔ̀ nyaka amɛm bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk, antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl. Nɛ angati nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm. Ǎbù nyaka bo abhɛn bárɔ̀ŋ ntá yi nɛ mame mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtay bho bátwɔ̀ ntá yi, aghɔ́ bhɔ ntínso mbɔnyunɛ báchi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛbhɔ́ŋ nkwak, mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mbabhɛri.
Yesu arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mbuɔt bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ɛbhɨ aya, kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bábhɨkɨ ya.
Nɨk yɛ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu achi mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ bɛ́ ántó bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk mamfɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ.”
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Yesu abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo bhi bati byo nɛ apay, achyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́bók bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ ndǔ bɛ́bú mame mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
Manyɛ́n bǒnto Yesu bhɔ bati byo nɛ apay achi bɛ: Anɛ mbɨ abhak Símun. Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́chák nɛ́bhak bɛ Píta. Achák abhak Andru, manɔ́ Píta. Nɛ Jems nɛ mɔ̌máyi Jɔ̌n, bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi.
Báchák bábhák Fílip nɛ Batolómyo, nɛ Tɔmás, nɛ Mátio mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti, nɛ Jems mmɔ̌ Alfeyɔs, nɛ Tadiɔs.
Nɛ Símun, mfyɛ̌-bɛtaŋ ndǔ barakátɔk, nɛ Júdas Iskariɔt mmu átí nyaka Yesu.
Yesu abhɨŋɨ bǒbhɔ bati byo nɛ apay aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ̌tò bhe nɛfí ndǔ bɛtɨk. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nɛ bǎkɛ́ chwe ndǔ yɛ̌ ɛtɔk Samária ɛ́mɔt.
Dɔ́k ká chi ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi mbɔ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn anɛ́ ánɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ.
Dɔ́k ká mǎngati nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛ, ‘Mpok arɔp kɛkwɔt anɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap.’
Bú ká bǒmame, ŋɛmɛ́ ká bawú, mǎmbu bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa nkwɔ. Bók ká bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ mɛ́ndɔ́ bho. Nchyɛ́ bhe bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkɛ sɔt nkáp. Dɔ́k yɛ́ ka kʉ bhɔ ntá bho kɛbhɛ́p bhɔ nkáp.
Mmu ákɛ́ pɔkɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nkáp amʉɛt.
Mmu ákɛ́ pɔkɔ́ ɛbhǎ nɛkɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí nkú áchák, nɛ yɛ̌ chí nkwɔbhánya ɛ́chák, nɛ yɛ̌ chí ntɛ́m. Bo bábhɔŋ bɛ́chíɛ nkʉbɛtɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ bǎchuɔ́bhɛ́ arɛ́, yáŋ ká ɛsáyrí mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ bɛsyɛpti bhe ɛkɛt ɛyi, mǎnchɔkɔ nɛ yi kpátɛ mpok anɛ bǎrɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.
Nɛchwe anɛ bǎchwe anywɔ́p, kaká ka bǒ abhɛn bachi arɛ mǎndɛm bɛ, ‘Áfɔ́k Mandɛm ámbák nɛ bhe.’
Nɛ mbák básɔt bhe nɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɨk ka mmʉɛt bɛ áfɔ́k Mandɛm ámbák nɛ bhɔ. Kɛ mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt bhe nɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɨk ka mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánkɛ́m áfɔ́k ywi, kɛchyɛ bhɔ.
Nɛ mbák bábhɨkɨ syɛpti bhe ndǔ yɛ̌ ɛkɛt nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛtɔk, kwɛt ka mfok anɛ áchí bhe bɛkak, mǎmfa arɛ.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk Sódom nɛ abhɛn Gomóra ɛncha bǒ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt bhe nɛ ɛkɔŋ.”
“Ghók ká, Nchí to bhe ntá bǒ mmɨk mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛntɨ nkwɔ. Bák yɛ́ ka bǒ kɛ́ŋwáŋ mbɔ nnyɔ́, mǎmbɔ́ŋ batɨ pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ bɛbhóŋó.
Sɔt ka mpok mbɔnyunɛ bo bákɛ̀m chɔŋ bhe mámfyɛ amɔ bǒ batí ɛtɔk, mándɛp manɛt ayɛka amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap.
Chɔŋ bo mánja bhe gbaka gbaka gbaka ntá bɔgɔ́bhanɔ nɛ bafɔ ɛ̌ti ya. Nɛ chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nchyɛ bhe mbi bɛghati bhɔ nɛ bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya.
Mpok básɔ́rɛ́ bhe ambɨ ndu bɛ́táŋ be, bǎkɛ́ sɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm ná?’ Bǎkɛ́ sɔŋɔri mmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ mpok ánkwáy, Mandɛm ǎghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm.
Nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔnyunɛ mpok yɔ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎrɛ̀m bɛ́pú fu be antɨ. Ɛfóŋó mmu Mandɛm ɛtayɛka átò kɛ̌ ághàti bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm.
Chɔŋ manɔ́ anchyɛ ntɨ manɔ́ ntá bǒbati bɛ mángwáy. Chɔŋ mbɔk bachi mánkʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bɔ̌bhap. Chɔŋ mbɔk bhɔ mánte nɛnu nɛ bachi nɛ manɔ, mánkʉ bɛ mángwáy bhɔ.
Chɔŋ mɛnyǔ bho mɛnkɛm mámpap be ɛ̌ti ya. Kɛ Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áté kpirí tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti.
Ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bo báchyɛ̀ be ɛsɔŋɔri, fá ká arɛ́ áyák mǎndɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bǎpú kway bɛkɔ ndǔ bɛtɔk Israɛl mɛnkɛm bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbha ɛnɛ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ re pɛtnsɛm.
“Mmɔ̌káti apu kway bɛrɨ̀ŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ancha ntɔ̌ŋ ywi. Nɛ mǔbɛtok apú cha chi-bɛtok ywi.
Ɛ́chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maŋák bɛ mánkʉ nɛ mmɔ̌ ɛkáti mbɔ ɛnyu bákʉ́ nɛ ntɔŋ aywi. Nɛ ɛ́chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maŋák bɛ mɔ̌bɛtok ámbák mbɔ chi-bɛtok ywi. Mbák bo bákway bɛ́chɨk ntɨ kpát mámbɨŋɨ mɛ mǔnti nnɛrɛ́kɛt bɛ Bɛlsɛbul, ná nɛ be bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt? Chɔŋ mánchyɛ bhe manyɛ́n anɛ́ ábɛ́bhɛ́ áchá ɛnɔ!”
“Bǎkɛ́ chay yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ápàbhe. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákútí, chɔŋ mánɛnɛ. Nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, chɔŋ mánkʉ bɛ bo mándɨŋɨ yɔ.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe ansɛm ansɛm, ghatí ká bho kpóŋóróŋ. Ɛnɛ́ bǎghókó ansɛm ansɛm, kó ka amfǎy bɛkɛt mǎndɛm bɛ mmɨk nkɛm ángók.
Bǎkɛ́ cháy bǒ mmɨk. Bákway bɛway chi mmʉɛt nkwǎ. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndu Ɛfóŋó mmu. Mandɛm kɛ̌ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́cháy. Yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt mmu nɛ ɛfóŋó mmu ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm nɛpǐngo.
Pú mmu ǎkwáy bɛku bɔ̌kɛnɛn bapay nɛ nkáp anɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ? Yɛ̌ nɔ́, yɛ̌ mɔ́sɛnɛn amɔt apú kway bɛkwɛn amɨk ɛnɛ́ Ɛtayɛka mmu achi amfay abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ.
Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ bhe. Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí mpǎy bɛkaká ɛmɛnɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka anti.
Bǎkɛ́ chay yɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo bakway bɛkʉ bhe. Bɛsí Mandɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ mɛnwɔp tontó achá ngɛ́mtáy kɛnɛn.”
“Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ yi achi mmu wa, chɔŋ mɛnkwɔ́ ndɛm bɛsí Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay ndǔ nywɔp manyé, bɛ mmu wu achi awa.
Kɛ mmu anɛ átáŋá bɛsí bho bɛ yi apu mmu wa, chɔŋ mɛnkwɔ́ ntaŋa bɛsí Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay bɛ yi apu mmu wa.”
“Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ ntwɔ fá amɨk chi bɛkʉ bo mámbák ndu kpák nɛ batɨ. Ǎe. Ntwɔ chi bɛ bo mánú nɛ batɨ.
Ntwɔ bɛkʉ bɔ̌ abhɛn babhakanɛm mánú nɛ bachi bhap, abhɛ́n baghɔrɛ́ mánú nɛ manɔ nɛ baghɔrɛ́ mánú nɛ manɔ̌ manɛ́m abhap.
Bǒmpap báfù chi ɛkɛt mbɔ̌ŋ mmu.
Mbák ɔkɔŋ ɛtayɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí máyɛ ɔchá mɛ, nɔ́ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa. Nɛ mbák ɔkɔŋ mɔ́ywɛ ɔcha mɛ, nɔ́ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.
Mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛpɔkɔ ɛkotákátí ɛyi ankoŋo ndǔ bayarɛ́kak aya, abhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.
Mmu anɛ arɛmɛ bɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ ndǔ áyàŋ bɛ ámpɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt yi, apú bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Kɛ mmu anɛ áká bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti ya, ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.”
“Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɔ̀t bhe sayri, ǎsɔt chi mɛ. Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɔ̀t mɛ sayri, ǎsɔt chi Ɛta mmu átó mɛ.
Mbák ɔsɔt mmu sayri mbɔnyunɛ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yi achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ wa, chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ nkúbhɛ́ akap anɛ yi áchyɛ ntá ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ ywi. Nɛ mbák ɔsɔt mmu sayri mbɔnyunɛ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ǎkʉ̀ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ, chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ akap mbɔ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ.
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchyɛ́ yɛ̌ chí manyiɛp bakwɛn ntá yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bɔ̌bha bhɛn mbɔnyunɛ achí nkoŋo wa, dɨŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi akap.”
Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛghati baghɔk abhi bati byo nɛ apay ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, afa nɛbhʉɛt yi achi nɛ bhɔ arɔk ndǔ bɛtɔk Israɛl bɛ́chák ndu bɛghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
Mpok yɔ, Jɔ̌n Njwiti abhak ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ákʉ̀, ató mbɔk bakoŋo bhi bɛ mándɔ́k mámbɛ́p Yesu bɛ,
“Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ǎtwɔ, kɛ chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ mɛnoŋ mmu achak?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Pɛt ka nsɛm ghatí Jɔ̌n mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó bo bárɛ̀m, nɛ ɛbhɛn be babhɔŋ bǎghɔ.
Bǎghok nɛ bǎghɔ bɛ manɛ́mámɨk bághɔ̀ mbaŋ nɛ́nɛnɛ, nɛ bakɛm báfáté bákɔ̀. Bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa bátáŋ nɛ bachókó batú bághòk mbaŋ. Bawú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bo bághàti bachɛ́bhɛ́bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá mmǔ anɛ ápú kwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
Ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo Jɔ̌n bárɔ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, Yesu abho bɛrɛm ntá bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bátwɔ̀ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi ɛ̌ti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Mpok bǎrɔ̀ŋ nyaka awu amɛm baso, bǎrɔ́k bɛghɔ ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmʉ? Bǎrɔk bɛghɔ mmu anɛ achi mbɔ ɛ̌nsɔ́manyiɛp ɛnɛ babhʉɛ́p áfòk ɛ́nkwɛ́n ɛnɛ ɛbhe, ámfok ɛnkwɛn ɛbhe ɛ́chák kɛ?
Bǎrɔŋ nyaka amɛm baso bɛghɔ yi? Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn amʉɛt kɛ? Bǒ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ mɛnyǔ ndɛn ɛbhɔ báchɔ̀kɔ chi amɛm bɛkírí-bafɔ!
Ghatí ká mɛ. Bǎrɔŋ nyaka amɛm baso bɛ́ghɔ ntɨkɨ ɛnyʉ̌ mmu? Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ? Ɛ́chi tɛtɛp. Kɛ dɨŋɨ ka bɛ mmu anɛ bǎghɔ́ achá ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Bě bǎrɔ́k yɛ bɛghɔ kpɨk yi? Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ bǎrɔ́ŋ nyaka chi bɛghɔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ? Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ, Jɔ̌n acha barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ báchák.
Jɔ̌n kɛ̌ achi mmu anɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, Yɨŋɨ́, chɔŋ ntó mpɔkɔntó wa wɔ ambɨ, bɛ ángókó mbi ywɛ kɛ ɔ́ntwɔ.’”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ Jɔ̌n Njwiti acha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak, ndǔ bo abhɛn bágú nɛ abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Yɛ̌ nɔ́, yɛ̌ chí mmu anɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ mpáy bo abhɛn mányìɛ̀ Kɛfɔ̌ mfáy acha yi.
Bɛ́bhó ndǔ mpok anɛ Jɔ̌n Njwiti ághàti nyaka bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛghaka ɛchɔŋ, Kɛfɔ̌ mfáy kɛ́gò nɛ bɛtaŋ nɛ mbɔk bho mánù bɛ́chwe arɛ nɛ bɛtaŋ.
Jɔ̌n ápɛ́rɛ tó bǒ bɛtɨk bhi, basɨŋ amɛn Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ ǎrɛm nyaka ɛ̌ti Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎto.
Mbák bǎbhɔŋ ntɨ mɛnoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛm, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ sayri sayri mpok anɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ Ɛláija ǎtwɔ̀, bárɛ̀m nyaka chi ɛ̌ti Jɔ̌n.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m, ántá batú ángók sayri.
“Chɔŋ njɛnti mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ nɛ yi? Báchí mbɔ bɔ̌ abhɛn báchɔ́kɔ́ nɛfísiɛ bákʉ̀ ntok. Ɛka ɛ́mɔt barɛm ntá abhɛn ɛka ɛchak bɛ,
‘Sɛ́kwáy bakwáy nɛbhay bɛ mǎmbɛn nɛbhɛ́n kɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɛn. Sɛ́kwáy bakwáy nɛwú, kɛbhɔ bě kɛdi!’
Jɔ̌n Njwiti atwɔ nyaka antarɛ nɔkɔ nsay ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt nɛ mmɛm yi kɛ nyu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu are rɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛchi nɛ yi!’
Mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntwɔ́, nde nyiɛ, nnyú nɔkɔ nɛ bhe. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu arɛm bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ nyiɛ̌ mɛnyɨŋɨ́nyíɛ́ nɛ nyǔmɛ́m wu. Mamʉrɛ bhi chi babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak!’ Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ ákòŋo mbi Mandɛm ákʉ̀ kɛ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn nɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm nɛchi tɛtɛp.”
Bǒ abhɛn báchí nyaka amɛm bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, bábhɨ́kɨ́ tɨ́k nyaka nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Ɛ́kʉ Yesu abho bɛji bhɔ andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
“Bě bo Korasín, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bě bo Bɛtsáida, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka nkwɔ ɛncha! Mbɔ chí amɛm bɛtɔk Táya nɛ Sídɔn kɛ nkʉ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn-nɛ nkʉ ntá yɛka, mbʉ́ báfyɛ́ ndɛn pyɔ, mánto batwɔ́p anti tɛsáy, bɛtɔŋ bɛ bátɨ̀knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap!
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ Táya nɛ Sídɔn ɛncha bhe!
Nɛ bě bho Kapɛ̌naum, bǎkaysi bɛ bǎkway bɛyoŋ mmʉɛt, mǎnkó kpát mǎntɔk nɛbu? Nsé! Chɔŋ Mandɛm amɛsɛ bhe amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú! Mbɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Sídɔn kɛ nkʉ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn-nɛ nkʉ ntá yɛka, mbʉ yɔ ɛbhʉɛt téé tɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ!
Dɨŋɨ́ yɛ́ ka bɛ, ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk Sódom ancha bhe.”
Ndǔ mpok yɔ, Yesu ánɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛta, wɔ mmu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mfay nɛ mmɨk! Nchí chyɛ wɔ bakak ndǔ ɔ́rɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́mbák bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ ntá bo abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Ɔnɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ ɔtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mbɔ mǎmbɔ.
Ɛta, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́yáŋá bɛ ɛmbak.”
Yesu apɛt abho bɛghati bho bɛ, “Ɛtaya achyɛ́ mɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ Mmɔ áchí ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí Ɛtayi. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mmu Ɛta áchí ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí Mɔ́ywi nɛ bǒ abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ ndu bɛkʉ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtayi.
Twɔ́ ká ntá ya, bě mankɛm abhɛn bǎpɔ́kɔ́ mɛnwɔ́ptí batǔ bɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bǎpɔp, chɔŋ nsɛbhɛ yɔ amɨk, nchyɛ́ bhe nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt.
Sɔt ka bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nchyɛ́ bhe, mǎngɔ́k mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ bhe mbɔnyunɛ nchí kpák ndǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛya nɛ nɛyoŋómʉɛt nɛ́pú mɛ antɨ. Kʉ ka nɔ́ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt.
Twɔ́ ká ntá ya mbɔnyunɛ ntu ánɛ mɛ̌chyɛ bhe achi fuyak.”
Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu nɛ baghɔk abhi báré kɔ mámfʉɛt nɔkɔ amɛm nkɨ̌ nchwifú ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl. Nsay are nu baghɔk abhi. Ɛ́kʉ bábho bɛ́kʉɛp ɛnyǔ nchwi yɔ, mányiɛ nɔkɔ.
Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ bákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú chak bɛkoŋo ɛbhé yɛsɛ. Bákʉɛ̀p nchwi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt!”
Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mfɔ Debhít ákʉ́ nyaka nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchí nɛ yi mpok nsay ákɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ́?
Achwe nyaka amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm, yi nɛ bǒbhi, mányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn báchyɛ́ ntá Mandɛm. Bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhé, ɛpú nyaka chak bɛ yi nɛ bǒbhi mányiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ. Ndiɛrɛ bachiǎkap Mandɛm kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ngǎngaŋ mɛnyiɛ nɔ.
Nɛ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ambɨ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay amɛm ɛkáti Moses bɛ bachiǎkap bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ? Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ bɛ bɔ́ mánkwɛ́n ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmu ákɛ́ kʉ bɛtɨk ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt kɛ? Bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ bɔ bákʉ bɛbʉ́.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu achí fá anɛ áchá ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm.
Mandɛm ághàti bhɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chí amɛm ɛkáti yi bɛ, yi ǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ chi bɛ bo mángɔ́ ntínso nɛ batɨ, puyɛ̌ chi akabhɛ́nya. Mbɔ bě bǎrɨŋɨ ntí bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, mbʉ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ji bǒ abhɛn bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́pú nɛ bhɔ.’
Dɨŋɨ́ yɛ́ ka bɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm kɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.”
Yesu arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap.
Mmu amɔt abhak amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɔ anɛ awɔ ywi ágú. Mbɔk bo bábhák arɛ́ abhɛn báyàŋ mbi bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ Yesu. Bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɛ́pu chak bɛbu mmu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛká anɛ, mbák abhɔŋ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn amɔt, ákwɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ amɛm nɛpi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, andɔ, kɛfɛrɛ wu?
Ná nɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ mmu áchá ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn tontó? Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́pú káŋ mmu bɛkwak ntɨ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.”
Yesu arɛm ntá mmu anɛ awɔ ágú bɛ, “Nyabhɛ́ awɔ́ ywɛ.” Anyabhɛ, awɔ́ wu ápɛt ataŋ, abhak mbɔ áchák.
Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi arɛ́ baghɔ nɔkɔ nɔ, báfú, bárɔ́k. Báte ɛyu, batɨ bɛway Yesu.
Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ báte ɛyu ndu bɛway yi. Afa, arɔk ɛbhak ɛ́chák. Bɛyǎ bho bákóŋo yi, abú bo mankɛm abhɛn mámè.
Yesu asɛmti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ ghati bo bachak ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi.
Ɛ́fákárí ɛnyu yɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Mandɛm aghátí nyaka Aisáya andɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ,
“Ghɔ́ ka mɔ̌bɛtok wa anɛ njábhɛ́. Chi Mɔ̌ntɨ wa nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák nɛ yi tontó. Chɔŋ nkʉ Ɛfóŋó ya ɛ́mbák nɛ yi. Nɛ chɔŋ yí ankʉ mǎngati manɛrɛ́kɛt bǒ mmɨk ankɛm bɛ chɔŋ yí ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
Apú bhak mbɔ mmu anɛ ánù bɛ bo mángók yi. Apú bhak mbɔ mmu anɛ bághok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi nɛfí.
Yí ápú syɛp nkɔ́rɛ́-tákɔ́ anɛ abho bɛwɔsi, arɔp chi bɛ́gu. Nɛ apú nɛmɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ bawɛt amay amɛm, ɛ́rɔ́p chi mandú mɛ́nɛ́mɛ. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ yi arɔŋ ambɨ bɛghɔ bhɔ ntínso, kpátɛ yi ankʉ nkaysi anɛ achi tɛtɛp ansɔt awɔ́nɛm.
Nɛ chɔŋ bǒ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm mámbaka ntɨ chi nɛ yi bɛ ampɛmɛ bhɔ.”
Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bǒfú básɔt mbók bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ yi. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ kɛ ɛ́kʉ́ nyaka amɨ́k anɛ́mɛ́ yi nɛ akwɛ́n kɛbhok. Yesu abú yí, abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ, nɛ abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ.
Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ babhak maknkay tontó, bábho bɛbhɛp batɨ, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Debhít nɛ́ kɛ?”
Kɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, babho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Chí Bɛlsɛbul, mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ kɛ áchyɛ́ Yesu bɛtaŋ bɛ́bók bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ mɛ́mfú, mɛ́ndɔ́, bho.” Mmǔ achák apú!
Yesu arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap. Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ áchí arɛ nɛ bǒbati mánu nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ achi arɛ ákwɛnɛ kwɛn.
Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ kɛfɔ Satan. Mbák Satan ǎbók Satan, ná kɛfɔ ɛki kɛ́tee?
Nɛ mbák nchí bók bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Bɛlsɛbul, bǒ bhɛka básɔ̀t bɛtaŋ ághá bɛ́bók bhɔ mɛ́ndɔ́ bhó? Ɛ̌ti yɔ chɔŋ bɔ́ mántaŋ be.
Kɛ mbák, sayri sayri, mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, nɔ́ Mandɛm anaŋ achi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mbɔ Mfɔ.
Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛchwe amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mmǔ ntantaŋ angɛ́p ɛnyɨŋ, ampɔkɔ, andɔk nɛ yɔ́, mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ yambɨ ankɛm yi angwɔt.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú nɛ mɛ, achí chí mǔmpap awa. Nɛ yɛ agha anɛ ápú kwak mɛ mɛnyokoti bho, ǎtàkátak.
Dɨŋɨ́ yɛ́ ka bɛ, Mandɛm ǎfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m. Kɛ apú foŋori mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
Mandɛm ǎfoŋori yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nnyɛ́n ɛna, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, kɛ apú foŋori mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Mandɛm apú foŋori yi, yɛ̌ ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ.”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mbák ɛnɔk ɛ́rɨ, kɛpɛm ɛki nkwɔ kɛ́rɨ́. Mbák ɛnɔk ɛbhɔ̌ŋ nɛme, kɛpɛm ɛki nkwɔ́ kɛ́bhɔ́ŋ nɛme. Mmu ǎrɨŋɨ ɛnɔk chí ndǔ kɛpɛm ɛki.
Bě bɛfé, nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ bhe. Ná bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɨ kɛkwáy yɛ bɛ́fú be anyu ɛnɛ́ bǎchí bǒ bɛbʉ́? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí mmu antɨ, yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́fù yi anyu.
Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ nkáp bɛ́jwi amɛm mɔ́kɛrɛ nkáp, nɔ́ kɛ̌ nkaysi ndɨ́ndɨ́ ájwì antɨ mmu ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ bɛrɨ kɛ bɛ́fu arɛ.
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mankɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎghati yí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛpɔ̌ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú yi anyu.
Kɛpɨ ɛkɛn kɛ́fù wɔ anyu kɛ̌ yi ásɔt antáŋ wɔ ɛwak ɛ́mɔt. Mbák bɛrɨ́tɨ́ kɛpɨ kɛ kɛ́fù wɔ anyu, ɛwak ɛyɔ, yi ǎrɛm bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ manyé. Kɛ mbák bɛbɛ́ptí kɛpɨ kɛ kɛ́fù wɔ anyu, ɛwak ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎrɛm bɛ ɔ́kwɛ̌n manyé.”
Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, tɔ́ŋ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ ɛ́kway bɛtɔŋ bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm.”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bɛbʉ́ ná nɛ mkpáká bho anɛ ɛchɔŋ! Bápú kʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ. Báyàŋ bɛghɔ chi ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay! Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́mɔt mpú tɔŋ be, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chi ɛnɛ Jóna, ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Jóna achi nyaka amɛm mɛniɛ̌ nsǐ-ngo ndǔ manywɔp arat, nɔ́ kɛ bábhɛmɛ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, mbak amɛm nnɛm ndǔ manywɔp arat.
Ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, bǒ ɛtɔk Ninivɛ báfate mángati bhe bɛ bǎkʉ bɛbʉ́. Ɛwak ɛyɔ, bɔ́ bárɛm nɔ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bɔ bátɨk nyaka nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap mpok Jóna ághátí bhɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, mmu achí fá nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛka anɛ áchá Jóna; yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpu ka bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
Ɛwak Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, mfɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchí nyaka ɛtɔk Shɛ́ba ǎfate andɛm bɛ bǎkʉ bɛbʉ́. Ǎrɛm bɛ bǎkʉ́ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ yi afu nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ arɔk bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mfɔ Sólomon átɔ̀ŋ bho nɛ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́kɛpɨ. Nɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mmu achi fá nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛka anɛ acha Sólomon, Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎpú ka bɛghok yi.”
Bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbák mámbók ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́ndɔ́ mmu, ɛ́rɔp chí bóŋboŋbóŋ amɛm baso, ɛ́njaŋ nɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yɔ ɛ́chwe. Mbák ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ ɛbhak bɛchɔkɔ,
ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ɛbhak ɛnɛ mfú.’ Nɛ ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm, ɛ́ngɔ́ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu amɛm ɛsɨ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi, nɛ bɛ, mányɔ yɔ, bághókó sayri,
ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛyɔ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ yɛ, ɛ́nsɔt bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́chák tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́bɛ́bhɛ́ bɛcha yɔ. Bɔ́ mɛnkɛm mɛndɔk, mɛnchwe mmu wu amʉɛt, mɛ́mbak nɛ yi, nté yi ambɛ́p ancha anɛ mbɨ. Nɔ, kɛ̌ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari nɛ be bo bɛbʉ́ abhɛn mkpák anɛ ɛchɔŋ.”
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti bho, máyi nɛ bɔ̌mayi bátwɔ́ bátee nɛfí, mánjaŋ nɔkɔ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ yi.
Mmǔ amɔt aghati Yesu bɛ, “Máyɛ nɛ bɔ̌mayɛ báchí nɛfí téé, báyàŋ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ wɔ.”
Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ mmu wu bɛ, “Sayri sayri, máya chí agha? Nɛ ntɨkɨ bho bachi bɔ̌maya?”
Yesu asá awɔ ntá bakoŋo bhi, arɛm bɛ, “Máya chí bǒbhɛn, nɛ bɔ̌maya chí bǒbhɛn.
Bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay áyàŋ bɔ́ mankʉ, kɛ báchí maya, nɛ bɔ̌maya.”
Nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ, Yesu afú amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ yi achi arɛ, arɔk achɔkɔ nɛku manyu.
Bɛyǎ bo bákóŋo yi arɛ́. Yesu arɔ bho tété, arɔk achwe, achɔkɔ amɛm áchwí ɛnɛ́ bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ báté angɔkɔnyɛ́n.
Abho bɛghati bhɔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay bɛ, “Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, nkwaŋankɨ amɔt arɔk bɛtak ɛnyǔ nchwifú amɛm nkɨ ywi.
Ɛnɛ́ yi átàk árɔ̀ŋ, mbɔk akwɛnti ndǔ mɔ́mbi anɛ áchí amɛm nkɨ. Kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ́ kɛ́bwɔ́pti nchwi yɔ nkɛm.
Achák akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ anɛ ntɔp abhɨkɨ ya arɛ. Awakari achak.
Kɛ mpok mmok áfú, ásɔ́ŋ yɔ ndǔ bakaŋ ayi ábhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛchwe amɨk sayri. Anɨŋti, awɔsi.
Anɛfú akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk anɛ tákɔ nsěnse ágò arɛ. Achak are gó, kɛ tákɔ nsěnse agó áchɛt yɔ kpát agú.
Nchwi áchák akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́ndɨ́, achak, agó, achyɛ bɛyǎ nchwi. Nchwi ayá acha anɛ bápɨ́ ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay, achák ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛrat, anɛfu ndɔŋ ɛsa nsɛm byo.”
Ndǔ ngwɛnti, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok, ántá batú ángók sayri.”
Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɛm nɛkǎy nkwaŋankɨ, baghɔk abhi bárɔ́k ntá yi bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́ghàti bho mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm akʉ mǎndɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ áchí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kwak bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ yi ábhák nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ nɛ bo bachak.
Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ ntí bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ǎjwimɛm. Mɛ̌kʉ yi andɨŋɨ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ apu fyɛ ntí, yɛ̌ chi mandú ɛnyɨŋ anɛ yi arɨŋɨ básɔt ntá yi.
Ntí anɛ nchí ghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay achi bɛ, báyɨ̀ŋɨ kɛ bápú ghɔ, nɛ bághok mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛ bápú ghok, nɛ bápú jwimɛm.
Bǒbhɛn, bákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Mandɛm akʉ nyaka Aisáya andɛm bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mǎngoko ghok bɛyɔŋ ɛbha kɛ bǎpú jwimɛm wáwák; chɔŋ mǎnjɨŋɨ yɨŋɨ kɛ bǎpú ghɔ,
Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ batɨ̌ bǒbhɛn ákʉ bárɔp bɛchɨŋtǐ bho, báchí mbɔ bǒ abhɛn batú ábé bhɔ nɛ bapu pɛrɛ yáŋ bɛghok yɛ̌nyɨŋ, báchí mbɔ bo abhɛn bákútí amɨ́k bɛ bákɛ́ ghɔ́ mbaŋ, nɛ bɛ́ batú yap ákɛ́ ghók yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ jwimɛm, mantwɔ ntá ya, mbú bhɔ.’”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Kɛ mbák chí bhe, ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka ɛcha, mbɔnyunɛ amɨ́k ayɛka ághɔ̀ mbaŋ, nɛ batú yɛká ághòk mbaŋ.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bɛyǎ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ kɛ bɔ kɛghɔ bhɔ. Bábhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghòk, kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghok bhɔ.”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ghók yɛ́ ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nɛkǎy mmu anɛ ataka mbwɔt nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
Mbuɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mɔ́mbi anɛ achi amɛm nkɨ, até ndǔ mmu anɛ ághókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyu Mandɛm ábhak Mfɔ ywi, kɛ yi kɛjwimɛm, Satan atwɔ́ yɛ afɔŋɔ mbok anɛ Mandɛm ápɨ́ amɛm ntɨ ɛni.
Mbuɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ até ndǔ mmu anɛ ághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, anoko tɛ́mté nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
Kɛ yi kɛbhɔ́ŋ bakaŋ amɨk. Ante kákáti ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok. Kɛ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́twɔ́ nɛ bo mámbo mɛnyok yi ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ yi anoko, amfɛrɛ amɔ tɛ́mté.
Nɛ mbwɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk tákɔ nsěnse, até ndǔ mmu anɛ ághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, kɛ básɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk atwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi antɨ, nɛ ngoŋó nkáp, angɔkɔntɨk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ, Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm yɔ kɛkwak yi ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni.
Mbák chi mmu anɛ ághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm anjwimɛm, ɛ́mbak yi antɨ, achí mbɔ mbwɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́ndɨ́, achak, ágó sayri, achyɛ bɛyǎ mbwɔt nkɔ. Nɛ nsáy Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mmu achi mbɔ mbwɔt nkɔ anɛ áyá áchá anɛ bápɨ́, ndɔŋ ɛsa nsɛm byo, achák ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛrat, nɛ anɛfu ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay.”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Mbák Mandɛm ambak nɛ mmu mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mfɔ ábhák nɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́bhák mbɔ nkɨ anɛ́ mmǔfu ápɨ́ nchwi.
Kɛ mǔmpap arɔk nɛ bɛti ɛnɛ́ bo bábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́, aták nchaŋ, arɔk ɛbhak ɛyi.
Mpok nchwi ágó, abho mɛnyu kɛpɛm, kɛ bághɔ́ nchaŋ arɛ́.
Bakʉ̌-bɛtɨk báfá bárɔ́k ntá mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ barɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, pú nchwi kɛ sɛ́pɨ́ amɛm nkɨ? Nchaŋ ɛ́fu árɛ́ fá?’
Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, ‘Mǔmpap kɛ̌ ápɨ́ nɔ nchaŋ ɛyɔ.’ Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, ‘Sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́mfɛ́rɛ́ yɔ́ ɛ́ndɔp chi nchwi yɔyɔ kɛ?’
Mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, ‘Dɔ̌ ká. Mbák mǎndɔ́k bɛfɛrɛ nchaŋ ɛyɔ, bǎkway bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mbɔk nchwi nkwɔ.
Dɔ̌ ká yɔ ambak, mpok ánáŋ ánkwáy, chɔŋ ndɛm bǒ abhɛn báfɛ̀rɛ nchwi ɛbhɨ mánjámbɨ mamfɛrɛ nchaŋ ɛyɔ mányokoti ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, mánsɔ́ŋ. Kɛ mǎmfɛrɛ nchwi mǎmbʉrɛ anywɔ́p.’”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm fá amɨk kɛchi mbɔ sɛpɛm mɔ́nɔk anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ mɔ́stat, anɛ bápɨ́ amɛm nkɨ.
Sɛpɛmɛ mɔ́nɔk mɔ́stat sɛ́chí nɨ́ŋɨ́nɨ́ŋɨ́ tontó, kɛ mbák sɛ́nchák, sɛngo, sɛ́bhak nnɛt mɔ́nɔk anɛ áchɨk. Kɛnɛn kɛ́ntwɔ kɛnte manyay ndǔ batabhɛ yi.”
Yesu atɛ́m bhɔ nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm fá amɨk kɛchi mbɔ yís anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ásɔ́rɛ́ achɛmti nɛ nchán fláwa ɛ́rát. Mandu yís wu akʉ fláwa nkɛm amwɔt, kpát ajwi ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi achi arɛ.”
Yesu aghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm chi ndǔ bakay. Yi kɛ ghati bhɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi abhɨkɨ tɛ́m nɛkay.
Atɛ́m bakay bɛtɔŋ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛmfakari, ɛ́fákárí. Aisáya arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Chɔŋ ngati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ chi ndǔ bakay, chɔŋ ntɔŋ bɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ mɛ́mbák bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒmɨk.”
Yesu arɔ yɛ bɛyǎ bǒ abhɛn bachi nɛfí, arɔk achwe anywɔ́p nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Arɛ́, baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ghatí bhɛsɛ ntí nɛkǎy nchaŋ.”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm kɛ̌ nchí mmu anɛ ápɨ́ nchwi amɛm nkɨ.
Nkɨ chí mmɨk nkɛm, nɛ nchwi chi bo abhɛn Mandɛm áchí Mfɔ wap. Nchaŋ chí bǒ Satan.
Mǔmpap anɛ ápɨ́ nchaŋ chi Satan. Mpok anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ chi nɛmǎy mmɨk, nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn báfɛ̀rɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ chi bɔángɛl Mandɛm.
Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ báfɛ́rɛ́ nchaŋ, mányokoti nɛbhʉɛt amɔt básɔ́ŋ, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari mpok mmɨk ámay.
Mpok yɔ, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, nchí to bɔángɛl bha mǎmfɛrɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ bɛbʉ́, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkʉ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn mɛ nchí Mfɔ wap.
Bɔangɛl bha báfɛ̀rɛ bhɔ mámɛsɛ amɛm nɛpǐngo. Arɛ́, bábhàk ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ nɛ nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n.
Mpok yɔ, bo abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm bághɔ̀ mbɔ mmok ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Ɛtayap achi Mfɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m, ántá batú ángók sayri!”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛchi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ bɛyǎ nkáp ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ amɛm nkɨ. Mmu amɔt ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɔ, apɛt abhɛsɛ yɔ sayri, arɔ, arɔk nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák, ati yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyi, asɔt nkáp, aku nkɨ wu.”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́chí mbɔ nkɔsíɛ́ anɛ áyàŋ bɛku batay bɛyǎ nkáp.
Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ́mɔ́t ɛnɛn nɛyá nkáp tontó, arɔk atí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyi, aku ntǎy bɛyǎ nkáp ɛnɔ.”
Yesu apɛt atɛ́m nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛchi mbɔ bɛyǎ nkáp anɛ́ bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ anyɛ́n nɛ ákɛ́m nsi mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
Ásɨ ájwí nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ nsi, báya bákó ɛbhɨ, bachɔkɔ amɨk bayap nsi ɛnɛ ɛrɨ, báfyɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ. Báto ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ.
Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́bhàk chɔŋ mpok mmɨk ámay. Bɔangɛl bátwɔ̀, mámfɛrɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ nkwɔ bǒ abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm,
mámfyɛ́ amɛm nɛpǐngo. Arɛ́, bábhak ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ nɛ nɛnyiɛ ámɛ́n.”
Yesu abhɛ́p baghɔkɔ́ bhi mbák bájwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághátí bhɔ mɛnkɛm. Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ bajwimɛm.
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm anɛ ághɔ́kɔ́, árɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap, achí mbɔ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɔ nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛsɨ amɛm mɔ́kɛt anɛ yi ábhʉ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ.”
Yesu anaŋa nɔkɔ bɛtɛm bakay yɔ ndu bɛtɔŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ, afa atú ɛtɔk wu.
Apɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi Násárɛt. Ɛnɛ́ yi átɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛyap, bo bábhak maknkay tontó. Bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Aré bhɔŋ ɛnɛn ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak fá? Aré bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ fá ndu bɛkʉ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnyu ɛnɛ?
Pú mmɔ̌ nchwě mɛnɔk nɛ́? Pú María kɛ̌ achi máyi? Pú Jems, nɛ Josɛ́f, nɛ Símun, nɛ Júdas, chi bɔ̌mayi abhɛn babhakanɛm?
Pú bɔ̌mayi abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ báchí fá mankɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ bhɛsɛ? Aré bhɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́kɛpɨ ɛnɛn, nɛ ɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn fá?”
Ɛkʉ bare byak yi byak. Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bo báchyɛ̀ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm kɛnókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. Ndiɛrɛ ɛtɔk ɛyi, nɛ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, kɛ bápú chyɛ yi kɛnókó.”
Tɛ̌ndu bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, yi kɛkʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay amɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi Násárɛt.
Mpok yɔ, Hɛ́rɔd abhak mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m atú Gálili. Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ̀,
arɛm ntá bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi atú Gálili ɛ̌ti Yesu bɛ, “Jɔ̌n Njwiti kɛ apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay.”
Hɛ́rɔd akaysi bɛ Yesu chi Jɔ̌n Njwiti ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ nyaka ntá Jɔ̌n. Achyɛ́ nyaka ɛyɔŋ, bákɛ́m Jɔ̌n, bagwɔt, nɛ báfyɛ́ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi Hɛródias áyàŋ. Hɛródias ayámbɨ achi nyaka chi ngɔrɛ́ Fílip, manɔ Hɛ́rɔd, kɛ Hɛ́rɔd ǎsɔt yi ndǔ nɛbhay.
Hɛ́rɔd ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Hɛródias ndǔ nɛbhay, Jɔ̌n aré ghati yi bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bo Israɛl ɛbhɨkɨ ka bɛ ɔ́mbay Hɛródias ngɔrɛ́ mɔmáyɛ.”
Hɛ́rɔd ǎyàŋ nyaka bɛrɛm mángwáy Jɔ̌n, kɛ are cháy bǒ abhɛn yi achi mǔnti wap. Bo Israɛl mánoko nyaka bɛ Jɔ̌n achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
Kɛ ɛwak Hɛ́rɔd ánáká ɛpǎ nɛbhe ɛyi, mmɔ̌ Hɛródias anɛ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ abhɛ́n nɛbhɛ́n sayri bɛsí bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛpǎ yɔ. Nɛbhɛ́n ɛni nɛkʉ Hɛ́rɔd abhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák,
kpát Hɛ́rɔd ayɨkɨ bɛ, “Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ.”
Bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ máyi aghati yi, arɔk arɛm ntá Hɛ́rɔd bɛ, “Chiɛ́ mɛ ntí Jɔ̌n Njwiti amɛm nchán myákátí-nɛ nɛ́nɛ!”
Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd apɔp! Ɛ̌ti nɛyɨkɨ anɛ yí áyɨkɨ nyaka bɛsí mankɔ abhi ɛ́chá yi bɛyibhiri ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mankʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmɔ̌ Hɛródias áyàŋ.
Akʉ yɛ bárɔ́k ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bafɛrɛ ntí Jɔ̌n Njwiti,
báfyɛ́ amɛm nchán myákátí, bárɔk bachyɛ ntá mmɔ̌ Hɛródias. Asɔt, arɔk achyɛ ntá máyi.
Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n bárɔ́k, basɔt ɛrɛnɛ́ Jɔ̌n barɔk, babhɛmɛ. Bárɔ́k yɛ baghati Yesu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí nɛ Jɔ̌n.
Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mbok nɛwú Jɔ̌n, afa, bárɔk bachwe amɛm áchwí, babho bɛrɔŋ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɛ̌ mmu achak apu. Ǎyàŋ nyaka bɛ mámbák bɔbhɔ. Kɛ mpok bo bághókó bɛ yi asɔt áchwí ǎrɔ̀ŋ, báfá bɛtɔk ɛbhap, babho bɛkoŋo yi nɛ bɛkak.
Yesu áfú amɛm áchwí, akó ɛbhɨ. Aghɔ́ bɛyǎ bho, ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi nɛ bhɔ́. Abú abhɛn mámè.
Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́k ntá yi barɛm bɛ, “Nywɔp nɛ́naŋ nɛrɔŋ, nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ chi ɛbhɨ. Ghatí bǒbhɛn bɛ mándɔ́k ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk abhɛn báchí fá kɛkwɔt manku ɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nyiɛ.”
Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Ntí apu bɛghati bhɔ bɛ mándɔ́k mánjáŋ nɛnyíɛ́. Bě babhɔŋ, chyɛ̌ ká bhɔ nɛnyíɛ́ mányíɛ́.”
Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ chi bɔ̌bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt batay nɛ nsi ɛpay. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛ́pú”.
Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká nɛ bhɔ.”
Aghati yɛ bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ bɛ manchɔkɔ amɨk ndǔ tákɔ. Asɔt yɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bhɔ bɛ́táy nɛ nsi ɛpay. Ayoŋ amɨk mfay. Achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti brɛt wu anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ mánkɔ́rɛ́ nɛ nsi ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap anyiɛ́ kpát ajwi. Baghɔk Yesu mányókóti nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛrɔbhɛ. Nɛ́jwí bɛkay byo nɛ bɛpay.
Mpǎy babhakanɛm abhɛn manyíɛ́ brɛt wu nɛ nsi ɛyɔ ábhák mbɔ nka ɛtay, kɛfyɛ́ baghɔrɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.
Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ mándɔ́k mǎnchwe amɛm áchwí, mámpe nnyɛ́n manjambɨ ndǔ ɛbhě manyu ɛchak. Arɔp ansɛm bɛkʉ bɛyǎ bo bhɔ abhɛn bachi arɛ mangurɛ.
Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛkʉ nɔ, akó amfǎy njiɛ aywǐntí ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt. Bɛti bɛgʉ́ bɛ́tɛ́mɛri yi arɛ.
Mpok yɔ, áchwí anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi anaŋ arɔŋ nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛfu angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ɛre fú bhɔ ambɨ. Ɛ́kʉ́ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛya ɛ́cha, bɔ mánu nɔkɔ nɛ yɔ.
Bɛfʉɛt nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát bɛghaka nkárɛ́nká ɛ́tandat betí Yesu abho bɛkɔ amfǎnyɛ́n bɛrɔŋ bɛtɛmɛri bhɔ.
Kɛ bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ amfǎnyɛ́n átwɔ̀, bɛ́cháy bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ tontó. Bábho bɛbɨk, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Chí ɛfóŋó-ngu! Chí ɛfóŋó-ngu!”
Tɛ́mté wu, Yesu afyɛ́ bhɔ ntɨ arɛm bɛ, “Chí mɛ, bǎkɛ́ chay!”
Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, mbák chí wɔ, chyɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ bɛ nsɛ́p anyɛ́n, nkɔ, ntɛmɛri wɔ.”
Yesu akɛmɛ Píta bɛ, “Sɛp twɔ́.” Píta afú amɛm áchwí asɛp anyɛ́n abho bɛkɔ andɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛtɛmɛri Yesu.
Kɛ ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ mbʉ́ɛ́p ákʉ̀ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́kò tɛ amfay kɛ ɛ́nsɛp, abho bɛcháy nɛ abho bɛgurɛ anyɛ́n tɛ́mté. Abɨk yɛ arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, pɛmɛ́ mɛ!”
Yesu asá awɔ tɛ́mté akɛm yi arɛm bɛ, “Píta, nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ́gʉpsi nɛcha! Ndaká yí ɔ́mákátí bɛ mɛ̌kwáy bɛkʉ wɔ ɔ́nkɔ amfǎnyɛn?”
Yesu nɛ Píta bákó nɔ́kɔ́ ndu áchwí, mbʉ́ɛ́p wu ákwɛn.
Baghɔk Yesu babho yɛ bɛ́kwɛ́n yi bɛkak, ndu bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm!”
Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛpe manyu, bákó ɛbhɨ, atú Gɛnɛ́sarɛt.
Bo abhɛn bachi atú ɛtɔk ɛyɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Yesu achi arɛ. Bátó ɛyɔŋ mbǎnkɛm bɛkʉ bo mántwɔ́ ntá yi nɛ bǒmame.
Bo abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá Yesu nɛ bǒmame bhap, mánɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ yi andɔ bǒmame mántɔk yɛ̌ chi nkokoŋ ndɛn ayi. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánú átɔ́kɔ́ nkokoŋ ndɛn Yesu, ataŋ.
Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báfú Yerúsalɛm bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bábhɛp yi bɛ,
“Ndaká yí baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ bápú koŋo bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ? Bápú so amɔ kɛ manyíɛ́ nɛnyiɛ.”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nɛ ndaká yí bǎrɔ̀ bɛbhé Mandɛm, mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhɛka batɔŋɔ?
Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Chiɛ́ ɛ́táyɛ nɛ máyɛ kɛnókó’ nɛ bɛ ‘Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbɛ́ptí ɛyɔŋ ntá ɛtayi, yɛ̌ máyi, bábhɔŋ bɛway yi.’
Kɛ bǎghàti bho bɛ, ‘Mbák mmu ándɛ́m ntá ɛtayi, yɛ̌ máyi bɛ, “Nsɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mbʉ́ bɛkwak wɔ nɛ yɔ, nchyɛ́ ntá Mandɛm”, nɛ bɛ́ yi abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ máyi, yɛ̌ ɛtayi kɛnókó,’
nɔ́ bǎbyak bɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ bǎbhʉ̀rɛ chi bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk.
Bě bǒ bɛtábhá! Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya arɛm nyaka ndak aywi tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti yɛka! Aghátí nyaka bho bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ,
‘Bǒbhɛn báchyɛ̀ mɛ kɛnókó chi nɛ bɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bhap, batɨ yap asap nɛkɔ nɛ mɛ.
Kɛnókó ɛkɛn báchyɛ̀ mɛ kɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm, mbɔnyunɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báfyɛ́, kɛ bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ bho mbɔ bɛ bɛchi Ɛyɔŋ ɛya.’”
Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, abhɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́ arɛm bɛ, “Tá ká batú mǎngok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m, mǎnjwimɛm!
Puyɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chwè anyu kɛ̌ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú mmu anyu kɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.”
Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bakoŋo bhi bákókósi mmʉɛt nɛ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́ bɛ ndak anɛ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ ákʉ batɨ ábè bǒnkwɔ Fárisi?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chɔŋ mángwɔp yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ, mámfɛrɛ.
Dɔ̌ ká bhɔ awu! Báchí chí manɛ́mámɨk abhɛn báyàŋ bɛya bho mbi. Nɛ mbák nnɛ́mámik ánjá ntɨ nnɛ́mámik mbi, bɔ́ mankɛm bákwɛn amɛm nɛpi.”
Píta arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, ghatí bhɛsɛ ntí nɛkay ɛnɛn.”
Ɛ́kʉ́ Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bě nkwɔ́ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re jwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́rɛ̀mɛ?
Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu afyɛ́ anyu, ɛ́nsɛp yí mɛniɛ, ǎjì yɔ amfɛrɛ?
Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù mmu anyu, ɛ́fù yi chi antɨ, nɛ yɔ kɛ̌ ɛ́kwày bɛkʉ yi ákɛ́ bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
Nɔ chi bɛ amɛm ntɨ mmu kɛ̌ nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ áfù, antó mmu ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛway mmu, bɛkwɛn bɛrwɔp, kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ ɛkɛn bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhay batɨ, nɛ aghɛ́p, nɛ bɛ́té ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́, nɛ bɛ́rɛ́m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mmu ndǔ bɛchɔŋti nnyɛ́n ɛni.
Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Mɛ́nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛso amɔ, apú kʉ bɛ mmu ákɛ́ bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.”
Yesu afa yɛ atú Gálili nɛ bakoŋo bhi, bárɔk ndǔ atú ɛtɔk anɛ achi kɛkwɔt Táya nɛ Sídɔn.
Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak atú ɛtɔk wu anɛ apu mmu Israɛl, kɛ abhak mmu Kánǎn. Arɔk ntá Yesu, ambɨk nɔkɔ bɛ, “Acha, mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít, ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso! Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri mɔ́wa tontó.”
Yesu kɛ kɛmɛ yí yɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ. Nɛ bakoŋo Yesu baghati Yesu bɛ, “Bók yi andɔ́k. Ǎchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.”
Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mandɛm ato mɛ́ bɛ ntwɔ nkwak chi bo Israɛl, bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n yi anɛ ánɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ.”
Kɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu arɔk akwɛ́n bɛkak Yesu are nɨk yi mmʉɛt andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Acha, kwak mɛ.”
Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́pú chak bɛsɔt nɛnyíɛ́ bhɔ mánchyɛ́ ntá mmú.”
Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɛ́chí tɛtɛp, kɛ mpok mmu ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́, apú káŋ mmú bɛ ɛ́kɛ́ nyiɛ bɛchɔkɔtí ɛbhɛn bákwɛ̀nti amɨk.”
Yesu akɛmɛ yɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔchí ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ tɛtɛp, nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ.” Tɛ́mté wu, mɔ́ywi ataŋ.
Yesu afa yɛ atú Táya nɛ Sídɔn apɛtnsɛm angɔkɔ manyu Gálili. Akɔ, afʉɛ́t arɛ́, akó achɔkɔ ambɨ njiɛ.
Bɛyǎ bho babho bɛrɔŋ ntá yi nɛ bǒmame, nɛ bakɛm, nɛ bo abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ, nɛ manɛ́mámɨk, nɛ babhók nɛ bǒmame báchák, mámbʉrɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛsí bhi. Abú bhɔ́ mankɛm.
Manyu áchók bǒ abhɛn bachi arɛ ndǔ bághɔ́ bɛ́ babhók bábho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ, nɛ bɛ bǒ abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ báfàte kpɛrɛp, nɛ bakɛm bábho bɛkɔ, nɛ manɛ́mámík babho bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Bábhó bɛbɨti Mandɛm, Mmu bo Israɛl báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó.
Yesu abhɨŋɨ yɛ bakoŋo bhi arɛm bɛ, “Ntínso nɛ́kɛ̀m mɛ nɛ bǒbhɛn. Báchí fá nɛ mɛ ndǔ manywɔp arat, nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ yáŋ bɛrɔ bɔ mandɔk kɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ bákway bɛgu nsay ambi.”
Bakoŋo bhi bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛtɔk ɛ́pú fá, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́kway bɛyǎ bǒbhɛn fá?”
Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt afɔ mɛ́ní?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkpɔk tándrámɔt, nɛ bǎru nsi.”
Yesu achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk.
Asɔt yɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt ɛbhɔ tándrámɔt nɛ nsi. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti bhɔ anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá bakoŋo bhi, bɛ́ mánkɔ́rɛ́ ntá bǒbhɔ.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anyiɛ́ anɛ ákwáy yi. Bakɔŋo bhi bábwɔpti nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́. Nɛ́jwí bɛkay tándrámɔt.
Mpǎy babhakanɛm abhɛn mányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ abhak mbɔ nká ɛnwi kɛfyɛ́ mǎmbɔ nɛ baghɔrɛ́.
Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ́ bɛ́ mángúrɛ́. Bo mankɛm bárɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́, asɛp anyɛ́n nɛ bakoŋo bhi, asɔt áchwí arɔk atú Magádan.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bárè yaŋ mbi mɛmɔ yi. Bábhɛ́p yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔŋ bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm.
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák mmok ánɛ́m beku, nɛbu nɛ́mbak chuuu, be bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, Chɔŋ nywɔp nɛndɨ mborɛ.
Nɛ mbák nywɔp nɛ́njí nɛbu nɛ́ngiri, bǎrɛm bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nywɔp nɛ́mbɛ́p tontó.’ Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛbu mǎndɛm mbák manyiɛp ǎkwɛn chɔŋ, nɛ mbák apu kwɛn. Kɛ bǎghɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari ɛchɔŋ, be kɛrɨŋɨ ntí anɛ bɔ bɛ́fàkari.
Bɛbʉ́ ná nɛ mkpáká bho anɛ ɛchɔŋ! Bápú kʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ. Báyàŋ bɛghɔ chi ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay! Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́mɔt mpú tɔŋ be, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chi ɛnɛ́ Jóna, ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.” Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔ bhɔ, arɔk.
Bakoŋo Yesu bápé barɔk ebhě manyu ɛchak, baghɔ bɛ baghɔkɔntɨk bɛpɔkɔ brɛt.
Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok nɛ yís anɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, mǎnsɔt mpok nɛ yís anɛ bǒnkwɔ Sádusi.”
Bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ǎrɛ̀m nɔ chi ndǔ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ nɛ brɛt.”
Yesu arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bárɛ̀m, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎrɛ̀m ɛ̌ti brɛt anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ? Nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ́gʉpsi nɛcha!
Kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re jwimɛm-ɛ? Bǎghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk ndu ndɨ́kɨ́ nka bho ɛtay nɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛtay? Bǎghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk bɛkǎy brɛt anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́?
Ná nɛ anɛ bɛkpok tándrámɔt anɛ nká bho ɛnwi mányíɛ́? Bǎghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk brɛt anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ mǎnyókóti bǎfyɛ ndǔ bɛkay?
Ndaká yí bǎpú kway bɛghɔ bɛ mpú rɛm mbʉ chi ɛ̌ti brɛt? Sɔt ka mpok nɛ yís anɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, nɛ anɛ bǒnkwɔ Sádusi.”
Afɔ̌ kɛ̌ bakoŋo Yesu bájwimɛm bɛ Yesu abhɨkɨ sɛmti bhɔ chi ɛ̌ti yís anɛ báfyɛ̀ ndǔ flawa, kɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ ɛbhɛn bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bátɔ̀ŋ.
Yesu arɔk atú Seséria Fílipi nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Arɛ́, abhɛp bhɔ bɛ, “Bo bárɛ̀m bɛ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí agha?”
Bákɛ́mɛ Yesu bɛ, “Mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí Jɔ̌n Njwiti. Bachak bɛ Ɛláija, abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ́ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Jeremáya, nɛ bɛ, mbák puyɛ̌ yi, nɔ chi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ achak.”
Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛ bě babhɔŋ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ mɛnchí agha?”
Símun Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ áchí nɛpɛ́m.”
Yesu akɛmɛ Píta bɛ, “Símun mmɔ̌ Jóna, ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛ ɛcha! Ɛtaya mmu áchí amfay kɛ ákʉ́ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ndak anɛ, puyɛ̌ nkwǎ.
Wɔ, ɔchí sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́, nɛ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɛ́n kɛ nchí te ɛkɛt ɛya. Nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛtaŋá nɛwú bɛ́pú kway bɛtaŋ mɛncha nkwɔ bo Mandɛm.
Nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ amɛm Kɛfɔ Mandɛm. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́gwɔ́rɛ́ fá amɨk, chɔŋ Mandɛm angwɔt yɔ awu amfay. Ɛnɛ́ ɔ́káŋárí, Mandɛm ǎkaŋari awu amfay.”
Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɛmti yɛ bakoŋo bhi bati byo nɛ apay bɛ bákɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu andɨŋɨ bɛ yi chí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
Bɛ́bhó mpok yɔ, Yesu abho bɛ́gháti bakoŋo bhi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari nɛ yi. Arɛm bɛ yi abhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, nɛ arɛ́, bǒbati ɛtɔk, nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses mánchyɛ yi bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, kpát mángwáy yi, kɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
Kɛ Píta asɔt yi nɛpak, abho bɛji yi bɛ, “Acha, Mandɛm ákɛ́ ka! Awǔ ndak ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛfakari nɛ wɔ!”
Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt ayɨŋɨ Píta, arɛm bɛ, “Satan, fá mɛ́ bɛsí! Ɔchí ɛrɛm ntá, ntá ya. Nkaysi yɛ chí nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ, abhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá Mandɛm!”
Yesu aghati yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mbák mmu ǎyàŋ bɛbhak nkoŋo wa, ángɔ́kɔ́ntɨk mmʉɛt yi, ampɔkɔ ɛkotákátí yi, ankoŋo mɛ.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt yi ǎnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya, ǎbhɔŋ nɔ.
Ntɨkɨ nsáy mmu ábhɔŋ mbák abhɔ̌ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ fá amɨk, kɛ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni? Nɛ mbák mmu ánɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ yí ákwày bɛsɔt anchyɛ bɛ́ yi ampɛt ambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛni?
Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mpɛtnsɛm fá amɨk nɛ bɛtaŋ Ɛtaya. Mbɔŋ bɛ́twɔ nɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, nchyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu aywi akap, bɛ́kóŋo bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbɔk yɛka báchí fá te abhɛn bápú gu kpátɛ mǎngɔ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu nchí twɔ fá amɨk mbɔ Mfɔ bǒ mankɛm.”
Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp atandat, Yesu asɔt Píta, asɔt Jems nkwɔ́ nɛ manɔ ywi Jɔ̌n, akó amfay njiɛ ngo nɛ bhɔ, bábhak arɛ́ bɔ́bhɔ́.
Bápɛ́rɛ yɨŋɨ, bɛsí Yesu bɛ́yíbhiri bɛrɔbhɛ ghɔɔ ghɔ́ɔ mbɔ mmok. Ndɛn ɛ́yi nkwɔ ɛ́yíbhiri ɛrɔp pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p, ɛ́nkɔt nɔkɔ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ.
Tɛ́mchok, Moses nɛ Ɛláija, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm abhɛn tɛsáy bábhési, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ Yesu.
