Kɛ Mandɛm aghati yi bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu! Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn, nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛ́may. Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ bɛ́rɔ̀p chɔŋ chi ɛbhɛn bo bachak!’
Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́fakari nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ntá yímbɔŋ, kɛ yi kɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnwɔp bɛsí Mandɛm.”
Yesu aghati yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Nɔ́ kɛ̌ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ chɔŋ nyiɛ́ yi, chɔŋ mfyɛ́ yi?
Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha nɛnyíɛ́? Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha ndɛnɛ́?
Yɨŋɨ́ ká kɛnɛn. Kɛ́pú kwaŋ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ kɛ́pú fɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ. Kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkɛt nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛ̌ták ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ nɛnyíɛ́ arɛ́. Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ kɔ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm, bǎcha kɛnɛn tontó!
Nɛ ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka basɛ́mɛ́ ákway bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́nsap, yɛ chi mandú nɨŋɨnɨŋɨ nɛ́nchá ɛnyu nɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak?
Mbák yɛ bapú kway bɛkʉ mandú ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔ, ndaká yi bǎbhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak?
Yɨŋɨ́ ká bɔchuchu abhɛn bágò. Bápú kʉ bɛtɨk, nɛ bapu ghoko ndɛn. Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ chí Mfɔ Sólomon mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛyǎ kɛnɛ́m, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛrɨ mbɔ yɛ̌ chuchu amɔt.
Mandɛm kɛ̌ ághókó tákɔ nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhi, tákɔ anɛ ákway bɛbhak ɛchɔŋ, mbúrɛ́ angwɔsi, mámfyɛ́ ango. Bǎkáysí bɛ́ be kɛ̌ Mandɛm apu kwáy bɛ́kwák mǎmbɔ́ŋ ndɛn bɛ́fyɛ́ amʉɛt kɛ? Nɛka ɛnɛká nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́gʉ́psi nɛcha!
Bǎkɛ́ sɔŋɔri yɛ batɨ̌ yɛka bɛbhɛp ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nyiɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyu.
Bǒ mmɨk bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ Ɛtayɛka arɨŋɨ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɔ́.
Fíɛ́ ká ntí chi bɛ Mandɛm ámbák Mfɔ ywɛka, nɛ chɔŋ yí anchyɛ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nkwɔ.
“Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ chay, yɛ̌ndu bǎchi nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ abhɨkɨ ya. Mandɛm abhɔŋ maŋák bɛchyɛ be akɔrɛ ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
Tí ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mǎnchyɛ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Bɔ́ŋ ká bɔ̌bɛbhǎ-nkap abhɛn bápú chɔŋɔ bɛ nkáp anɛm. Bʉrɛ́ ká kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛkɛka amfay. Arɛ́, kɔ́ kɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm. Yɛ̌ ngɛ́p apu kway bɛghɛp ɛnyɨŋ arɛ, nɛ kɛngɔk apú chwe ánchɔŋti yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ nkáp ywɛ áchí, arɛ́ kɛ̌ ntɨ ɛnɛ nkwɔ nɛ́bhak.
“Toŋtí ká mmʉɛt mǎndurɛ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛka.
Bák ká mbɔ bɔ̌-bɛtok abhɛn mánòŋ bɛ chi-bɛtɨk awap amfu ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛnɛ yi árɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ ampɛtnsɛm bɛ mánɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ntá yi tɛ́mté, mpok yi átwɔ́ ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɛkok.
Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ɛncha ntá bo abhɛn bábhak pě mpok ɛtayap átwɔ́! Tɛtɛp nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpok yi atwɔ, ǎghati bhɔ manchɔkɔ amɨk, anchóŋ ndɛn ɛyi, ansɔt nɛnyíɛ́ anchyɛ bhɔ manyíɛ́.
Yɛ̌ antwɔ́ chí nɛ nɛ́ntɨ́ bhiti, yɛ̌ chí mpok nkɔk ɛ́kòk, kɛ antɛmɛri bhɔ pě, ɛ́rɨ ɛncha ntá bǒ bɛtok bhɔ!
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mbɔ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ǎrɨŋɨ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngɛ́p átwɔ̀, mbʉ apú rɔ mándak ɛkɛt ɛyi.
Bě nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛtoŋti mmʉɛt Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm átwɔ̀ chɔŋ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ yi ǎtwɔ̀.”
Píta abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔtɛ̌m nɛkay ɛnɛn chí ntá yɛsɛ kɛ chi ntá bo mankɛm?”
Acha akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmǔ bɛtok anɛ achi tɛtɛp nɛ ndɨŋɨndak chí anɛ? Chí anɛ chi-bɛtɨk ywi áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ bɛ anjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛfo yi, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ awap ákɔrɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ndǔ mpok.
Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ɛncha ntá mǔbɛtok wu anɛ chi-bɛtɨk ywi átwɔ antɛmɛri yi ndu ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghati yi ankʉ!
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák nkʉbɛtɨk wu ákʉ nɔ chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎchyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhí mɛnkɛm.
Kɛ mbák mǔbɛtok arɛm bɛ, chi-bɛtɨk awa ǎtat bɛ́twɔ, ambo bɛdɛn bɔ̌-bɛtok bachak, abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ nɛ abhɛn babhakanɛm, nɛ ambo mɛ́nyiɛ, anyu nɔkɔ, kpát mmɛm ánkɛm yi,
chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎtwɔ̀ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn mǔbɛtok abhɨkɨ kaysi bɛ yí ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn mǔbɛtok wu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ. Antɛmsi yi, amfyɛ yi nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm bachi.
Nɛ mǔbɛtok anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chi-bɛtɨk áyàŋ yi ankʉ, kɛ yi kɛ toŋti mmʉɛt ankʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yaŋ, bátɛmsi chɔŋ yi sayri.
Kɛ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chi-bɛtɨk áyàŋ yi ankʉ, mbák akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ mantɛmsi yi, báchyɛ yi chi mandú ntɛmsi. Bábhɛp tontó ntá mmu anɛ báchyɛ́ yi tontó. Nɛ báfyɛ amɨ́k tontó ntá mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ amɔ́ yi.”
Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ntwɔ bɛgʉɛp chi ngó fá amɨk. Mbɔ ánaŋ akɛm, mbʉ nkɔŋ tontó!
Chɔŋ mámfyɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ mmǔ anɛ báfyɛ́ yi anyɛ́n ndǔ mpok anɛ bájwìti yi. Ntɨ nɛ́pú pɔp mɛ amɛm tɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛ́ntwɔ ɛmfʉɛt!
Bǎkáysí bɛ́ ntwɔ fá amɨk chi bɛkʉ bo mámbák ndu kpák nɛ batɨ kɛ? Ǎe, ntwɔ chí nɛ akɔrɛ.
Bɛ́bhó nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bo bachi arɛ bati atay, chɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ámbak nɛntɨ nap. Bati arat kɛka abhɛn bati apay. Bati apay kɛka abhɛn bati arat.
Ákɔ́rɛ́ ábhak chɔŋ ɛnyunɛ́ chi ápap mɔ́ywi anɛ mbakanɛm, mmɔ̌ anɛ mbakanɛm ampap ɛtayi, nnɔ ampap mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔrɛ́, mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ampap nnɔ. Nnɔnɛ́m ampap ngɔrɛ́ mɔ́ywi, ngɔrɛ́ ampap nnɔnɛ́m ɛ́ywi.”
Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá ngɛ́mtay bho abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ́ nɛbu ndǔ nɛ́gírí ndǔ ɛbhě nɛbu ɛnɛ mmok ánɛm arɛ, bǎrɛm bɛ ‘Manyiɛp átwɔ kwɛn’; nɛ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
Nɛ mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ nɛbháŋ ndu nɛbho bɛkwɛn, bǎrɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛnɛm ɛ́twɔ̀’; nɛ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
Bě bǒ bɛtabha! Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛbu mǎndɛm mbák manyiɛp ǎkwɛn chɔŋ, nɛ mbák apu kwɛn. Ndaká yí bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ ndǔ mpokó-nɛ?
“Ndak yí bě babhɔŋ bapú kway bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛ mmu ankʉ?
Mbák ɔbhɔ̌ŋ ndak nɛ mmu nɛ yi ákʉ́ manyé nɛ wɔ, ɔ̌kʉ yi? Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ ndaka wu ámay ansɛm ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ndu acha manyé. Mbák ɔ́nká yi ansɔt wɔ ambɨ ndǔ manyé, ntaŋá manyé ǎchyɛ̀ wɔ ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú nɛ bɔ mámfe wɔ.
Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, ɔpú fu wawak kpátɛ ɔnchyɛ ákwɔ́ ywɛ ankɛm, yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp.”
Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, mbɔk bho abhɛn bachi arɛ́, bátɛ́mɛ Yesu ɛ̌ti bo Galili abhɛn Páílet akʉ baway mpok báchyɛ̀ akap ntá Mandɛm.
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkáysí bɛ bo Galili bhɔ bákʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́ bacha bǒ ɛtɔk Gálili bachak kɛ?
Nɔ́ bhɔ! Dɔ̌ ngati be bɛ, mbák bǎbhɨkɨ tɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, chɔŋ be mankɛm mǎngu mbɔ bhɔ.
Ná nɛ bǒ batí nɛku-nɛ-arat abhɛn ɛkɛrɛ́mfáy ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛpak ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn Sílom ɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ ɛ́wáy? Bǎkáysí bɛ́ ɛfákárí nyaka nɛ bhɔ ɛnyu yɔ chí ndu bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ bacha bo bachak abhɛn bachi ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm yɔ kɛ?
Nɔ́ bhɔ! Nchí ghati be bɛ, mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ tɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, chɔŋ bě mankɛm mǎngu mbɔ bhɔ.”
Yesu atɛ́m yɛ bhɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Mmu amɔt apɨ nyaka ɛnɔk ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ́ *fig amɛm nkɨ ywi. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, are kɔ ambyo nɔkɔ mbák ɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, kɛ akɛ ghɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
Aghati mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ wu bɛ ‘Yɨŋɨ́, ndǔ mamiɛ́ árát nchí twɔ bɛyaŋ kɛpɛm ndǔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ, kɛ mpu ghɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Kpɔ́t yɔ́ gʉ́ɛ́p amɨk! Ɛ́kʉ̀ kpɨ́k yi fá téé, ɛ́nchɛt nɔkɔ mmɨk ndɛ́ndɛm?’
Nkʉ bɛtɨk wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, dɔ̌ ɛ́mpɛ́t ɛmbak ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɛn nkwɔ. Chɔŋ ntɛ́m nnɛt ywi ngabhɛri, mfyɛ́ ntɔbhɛ́-píɔ.
Nɛ mbák ɛ́nyu kɛpɛm mmíɛ́ mbúrɛ́ ɛ́ndɨ, kɛ mbák ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyu kɛpɛm, ɔ̌kwáy bɛghati mɛ mkpɔt yɔ ngʉɛp amɨk.’”
Ɛwak nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl, Yesu áre tɔŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap.
Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kʉ́ yi ápɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku-nɛ-arat, yí kɛpɛrɛ kway bɛkɔ chak.
Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, abhɨŋɨ yí arɛm bɛ, “Mmá, nɛme ɛnɛ nɛ́may.”
Atɔk yi nɛ amɔ. Tɛ́mte wu, anyabhɛ mmʉɛt téé, abho bɛbɨti Mandɛm.
Mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu akʉ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu ataŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap, abé ntɨ, abho bɛrɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ manywɔp átándat ndǔ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk. Mmu ámbɔ́ŋ nɛme, ántwɔ́ chí amɛm manywɔp ayɔ bɛ mámbú yi. Ɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhak chi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.”
Yesu Acha akɛmɛ yɛ yi bɛ, “Bě bǒ bɛtabha! Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ápú kaŋari yɛ chí mpɔŋ yi, yɛ̌ chi mpɔŋɔ batu yi ándɔ́k anchyɛ yɔ́ manyiɛp ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt?
Ná nɛ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ, mmɔ́ Ábraham anɛ Satan ágwɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku nɛ arat. Ɛ́chí ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ bɛfɛrɛ yi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
Nɛrɛm Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ, ntíánwɔ́p akɛm bǒmpap abhi mankɛm. Kɛ bɛyǎ bo bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛ yi ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bhɔ mɛnkɛm.
Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́chí mbɔ yi? Chɔŋ njɛnti kɔ nɛ yí?
Kɛfɔ Mandɛm fá amɨk kɛ́chi mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛm anɛ ɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́stat, anɛ bápɨ́ amɛm nkɨ, sɛ́chák, sɛ́gó, sɛ́rɔ́p ɛnɔk ɛnɛ kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ̀ kɛ́nte manyay ndǔ batáp ayi.”
Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ mpɛt njɛnti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ yi?
Kɛchi mbɔ yís anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ásɔ́rɛ́ achɛm nɛ nchán fláwa ɛ́rát. Mandu yís wu akʉ fláwa nkɛm amwɔt, kpát ajwi amɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi achi arɛ́.”
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ Yerúsalɛm, are te ndǔ bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ bɔ̌bɛtɔk antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
Mmǔ amɔt abhɛp yi bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ chi bǎru bho?” Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
“Nu ka bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndǔ nyǔbhá anɛ áchí mábhɛ́rí. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ bɛyǎ bho báyàŋ chɔŋ bɛfʉɛt manchwe kɛ bápú bhɔŋ mbi.
Mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ánáŋ chɔŋ amfate antiɛp mbǐnywɔp, bǎte nɛfí mǎndɛp nɔkɔ nɛkok nɛ mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Acha, nɛnɛ́ bhɛsɛ mbǐnywɔp.’ Kɛ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ankɛmɛ chí bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhak ɛnɛ bǎfú.’
Mǎmbo yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Pú sɛ́chɔkɔ nyaka nɛbhʉɛt amɔt sɛ́nyíɛ́, nɛ sɛnyu nɛ wɔ? Nɛ ɔtɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛtɔk ɛbhɛsɛ?’
Kɛ ákɛmɛ bhe chi bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛbhak ɛnɛ bǎfú. Fǎ ká mɛ bɛsí, bě bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ mankɛm!’
Arɛ́, chɔŋ mǎndi kɛbhɔ nɛ mǎmbak ndǔ nɛnyiɛ ámɛ́n mpok bǎghɔ Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm chɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛfɔ̌ Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ bátiɛ́bhɛ́ be nɛfí.
Chɔŋ bo mámfu mbɨ nɛ nsɛm, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm nɛ awɔ́ghɔ, mánchɔkɔ mányiɛ ɛpǎ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛfɔ̌ Mandɛm.
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, chɔŋ mbɔk bho abhɛn báchí ansɛm nɛ́nɛ mándɔp bǒmbɨ, nɛ abhɛn báchí bǒmbɨ mandɔp ansɛm.”
Ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ mpok ɛyɔ, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔk bágháti Yesu bɛ, “Fǎ fá dɔk ɛbhak ɛ́chák. Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd ǎyàŋ bɛ́way wɔ!”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ghatí Hɛ́rɔd ɛsɔp ɛyɔ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛ́bok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ mbú bho ɛchɔŋ nɛ mbúrɛ́, nɛ ɛ́gháká nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, nnaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbha.
Yɛ̌ndu ɛ́chí nɔ́, mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm. Nchí kɔ ɛchɔŋ nɛ mbúrɛ́ nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi arat ńgaka arɛ́. Amɛm Yerúsalɛm kɛ báway nɔkɔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.’
Yesu akók arɛm bɛ, Eé Yerúsalɛm, bǒ Yerusalɛm! Bě bo bǎwày barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, mǎntɛmti nɔkɔ nɛ batay ndu bɛ́wáy bo Mandɛm átó bɛ mángátí bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ndǔ bɛyǎ mpok, njáŋ bɛsɔt be mfyɛ́ amʉɛt bɛ́ mǎmbak nɛ mɛ mbɔ bɔ̌nkɔk abhɛn nnɔ nkɔk ákútí nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ bɛbhap ɛbhi, kɛ bǎpú ka bɛ nkʉ nɔ!
Nɛ nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ ntí ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛyɛka, ɛ́ndɔp ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ chɔŋ mɛ́, kpátɛ mpok anɛ bǎrɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ ‘Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm Acha.’”
Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛmɔt, Yesu arɔk mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔnti amɔt anɛ achi mǔnkwɔ Fárisi. Bo Fárisi bhɔ bátɛp yi amɨ́k amʉɛt bɛghɔ ndǔ yi ákʉ̀.
Mǔfú abhak bɛsí Yesu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛmě afɛmntay.
Yesu abhɛ́p batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́ká bɛ mámbú mmu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
Kɛ bákɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yesu asɔt mmu wu abú yí. Arɔ yɛ yí arɔk.
Abhɛ́p yɛ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka anɛ mɔ́ywi nɛ yɛ̌ mpɔŋ yi ákwɛn amɛm mbokó manyiɛp ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ yi kɛya yɛ̌ yi, yɛ̌ yɔ tɛ́mté ámfɛ́rɛ́?”
Bɔ́ kɛkwáy bɛ́kɛmɛ Yesu yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áyɨ̀ŋɨ, aghɔ́ ndǔ bǒ abhɛn mánáká ndǔ ɛpa báre yap bɛbhaká kɛnókó. Achyɛ bhɔ maniɛ bɛ,
“Mpok mánáká wɔ ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay, ɔ́kɛ́ tɨŋɨ yap ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó ɔ́nchɔkɔ arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́kwáy bɛfakari bɛ mának mmǔ anɛ acha wɔ.
Nɛ mmu anɛ ánáká bhe antwɔ́ andɛm bɛ, ‘Faté chyɛ ɛpok ɛnɛ ntá mmǔ-nɛ.’ Mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu yɔ, ɔ̌faté nɛ bɛyǎ ntíánwɔ́p bɛ́rɔŋ bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mandú kɛnókó.
Mpok mánáká wɔ ndǔ ɛpa, yap chi ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ kɛnókó, bɛ mmu anɛ ánáká ɛpa ántwɔ́, ankwáy bɛrɛm ntá yɛ bɛ, ‘Nkwǎnɛ, twɔ́ chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó.’ Bǒ ɛpa bachak mángɔ bɛ mmu anɛ ánáká ɛpa ǎchyɛ̀ wɔ kɛnókó.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀pti yi amɨk. Nɛ mmu anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk, Mandɛm ǎkòsi yi amfay.”
Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá mmu anɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí ndǔ ɛpa nkwɔ bɛ, “Mpok ɔ́bhɨ́ŋɨ́ bho ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́, ɔ́kɛ́ bhɨŋɨ chi mamʉɛrɛ bhɛ, nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt ywɛ, nɛ bǒ nkáp abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt nɛ wɔ. Mbák ɔ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ chi mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ, bɔ́ nkwɔ́ bákway bɛbhɨŋɨ wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak akap anɛ ɔ́bhɔŋ.
Mbák ɔ̌nàk ɛpa, bɨŋɨ́ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho, nɛ babák, nɛ bakɛm, nɛ manɛmamɨ́k.
Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́ndɨ ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bápú kway bɛkɛmɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́ ntá yap. Kɛ Mandɛm ǎkap wɔ mpok yi ákʉ̀ bo abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí bhi mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, mmu amɔt anɛ áchí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛ́ndɨ ntá yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányíɛ ɛpǎ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt Kɛfɔ Mandɛm awu amfay!”
Nɛ Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mmǔfu anak nyaka ɛrɛm ɛpa, abhɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bho.
Mpok anɛ ɛpa ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbho ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, ató mɔ̌bɛtok ywi bɛ andɔk angati bo abhɛn yi anaka bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká, mánaŋ batoŋti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.’
Arɔk aghati bhɔ́, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap arɔbhɛ ghati yi chí bɛ ndak akɛm yi. Anɛ mbɨ arɛm bɛ ‘Nku nkɨ nɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ bɛyɨŋɨ wu. Nɨkmʉɛt, ghatí ɛtayɛ bɛ ákɛ́ bentɨ.’
Achák arɛm bɛ, ‘Nku mpɔŋ byó ɛnɛ ɛ́kwàŋ bakɨ. Nchí yaŋ ndɔ́k ngɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yɔ ɛ́kwày bɛkʉ. Nɨkmʉɛ́t. Ghatí Ɛtayɛ bɛ́ ákɛ́ bentɨ.’
Anɛfú arɛm bɛ, ‘Nɛ́nɛ kɛ mbáy ngɔrɛ́. Mpú kwáy yɛ bɛ́twɔ.’
Mmɔ̌ bɛtok wu arɔk aghati ɛtayi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒbhɔ bárɛmɛ. Mbɔŋɔ́kɛt abéntɨ. Aghati mɔ̌bɛtok yi wu bɛ, ‘Fú, dɔ́k áyák ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbay anɛ áchí ɛtɔk nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ bo báchí arɛ sɔt bachɛ́bhɛ́bho twɔ ndǔ ɛpa nɛ bhɔ. Twɔ́ nɛ babák nɛ bakɛm nɛ manɛ́mámɨk.’
Mmɔ̌ bɛtok arɔk atwɔ́, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kɛ ɛkɛt ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re jwi.’
Ɛtayi arɛm bɛ, nɛ́nɛ ‘Fú, dɔ́k, ɛtɔk ndǔ babhǐ agho nɛ ndǔ babhǐ bɛbhɨ. Fíɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ bo mántwɔ́ bɛ́ ɛkɛt ɛpa ɛ́njwi.
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ndǔ bo abhɛn njambɨ kɛ bɔ́ kɛtwɔ́, apú kwáy bɛ́ghókóti ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛpa ɛya-nɛ.’”
Ngɛ́mtay bho báré kɔ nɛ Yesu. Ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
“Mbák mmu áyàŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ mɛ apú kwáy bɛbhák nkoŋo wa mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ mɛ ánchá ɛtayi nɛ máyi, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi, nɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ, bɔ̌mayi abhɛn babhakanɛm nɛ abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ nɛ ankɔŋ mɛ ancha yɛ chí mmʉɛrɛ́ yi.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛpɔkɔ ɛyi ɛko ankoŋo mɛ apú kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.
“Mbák mmu ywɛka ǎyàŋ bɛte ɛkɛt ɛgho, pú ǎyambɨ anchɔkɔ amɨk ankay, angɔ mbák nkáp anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akway anɛ yi áte ɛkɛt anaŋa?
Mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ, ǎkwáy bɛghoko nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt kɛ yí kɛte ɛkɛt ánáŋá, nɛ bo abhɛn bághɔ́ yɔ mámbo bɛ́wáy yi bɛ,
‘Anɛ abho bɛte ɛkɛt kɛ ɛcha yi mɛnaŋa.’
“Nɛ sɛ́nsɔt bɛ mfɔ amɔt abhɔ̌ŋ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nka byo (10, 000). Apɛrɛ́ rɔŋ mɛnu nɛ mfɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nka ɛsa, (20, 000) ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎyambɨ anchɔkɔ, ankaysi sayri, mbák ǎkway mɛnu nɛ mfɔ wu?
Nɛ mbák ángɔ́ bɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway, ǎto bo ntá mfɔ wu mpok batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi babhʉɛt nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛ mánsókórí ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bápú nu nɛ batɨ.”
Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ be mankɛm. Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ bɛrɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, apú kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.”
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ngáŋ áchí ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ mbák ngáŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ manyɨŋti mi, ná bákway bɛkʉ wu ampɛt ambak ɛrɨ́tí ngáŋ?
Ɛnyǔ ngáŋ wu ápú pɛrɛ rɨ́ ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ápú rɨ amɨk nɛ apu rɨ yɛ̌ ndu bɛfyɛ ndu ntó-takɔ anɛ báyàŋ ámpɔ́ɔ́ ánchyɛ ntɔbhɛ́-píɔ. Báto wu to. Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok ántá batu angok sayri.”
Mpokófu, babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak báré kap Yesu ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí átɔ̀ŋ.
Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábho mɛ́nywínti bɛ, “Mɔ́nkwǎnɛ ǎsyɛpti bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ǎnyiɛ tɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.”
Ɛ́kʉ Yesu atɛ́m bɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ:
“Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n bɛsa bɛtay. Mbák amɔt anɛm ɛbhɨ, ǎkʉ̀ yi? Pú ǎrɔ̀ anɛ́ bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛkʉ nɛ anwi, andɔk bɛyaŋ awu ámɔt kpát ambɔŋ wu?
Nɛ mbák aghɔ wu, ǎpɔkɔ anyaŋa mankɨ nɛ maŋák,
nɛ mpok anɛ yi ágháká anywɔ́p, ǎbhɨŋɨ mamʉɛrɛ bhi nɛ bakokosi bhi, angati bhɔ bɛ, ‘Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ́, mbɔ̌ŋ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn wa anɛ ánɛ́mɛ́ nyaka.’”
Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ maŋák ǎbhák amfay ntá Mandɛm nɛ bɔángɛl ɛ̌ti mmǔ bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi ɛncha bo bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛku nɛ anwi abhɛn bákáysi bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ntí apú anɛ bɔ́ bátɨ̀k nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.”
Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhɔŋ bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkáp byó. Mbák ɛbhɔk ɛ́mɔt ɛ́nɛm, ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎdurɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, ansɔt kɛtɨ́ŋɨ́ anyɔ ɛkɛt ɛnkɛm, ambyo sayri mbǎnkɛm kpatɛ angɔ́ yɔ́?
Nɛ mpok ághɔ́ yɔ ǎbhɨŋɨ mamʉɛrɛ nɛ bakokosi bhi, angati bhɔ bɛ ‘Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ngɔ̌ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap ɛnɛ ɛnɛmɛ.’
Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm bábhɔŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti mmǔ bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.”
Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmǔfú abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɔ̌ babhakanɛm bati apay.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn arɛm ntá ɛtayi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, chyɛ awa ákɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́.’ Ɛtayap akɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi ntá yap bati apay.
Ansɛm mpǎy manywɔp, anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn anyokoti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi apɔkɔ arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Arɛ́ achɔŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm ndu mɛ́nyiɛ ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛm.
Áchɔ́ŋtí nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nsay ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm, arɔp amɔ apay.
Ɛkʉ arɔk, abhat mmʉɛt nɛ mmǔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ amɔt. Ató yi bɛ ándɔ́k, áne nɔ́kɔ́ bakók bhi amɛm nkɨ ywi.
Are yáŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyiɛ́ bakók, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛchyɛ yi ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ.
Kɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi nɛ mmʉɛt yi arɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká mɛ-á, bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk ɛtaya báchí awu mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ mmʉɛt ngɔkngɔk, mándɔ nɔkɔ mbɔk, nsay átwɔ way mɛ fá!
Chɔŋ mfá mpɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛtaya ngati yi bɛ, “Ɛta, nkʉ Mandɛm bɛbʉ́, nɛ nkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́.
Mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kway mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́ywɛ. Sɔt mɛ chí mbɔ nkʉbɛtɨk ywɛ̌ amɔt.”’
Afate abho bɛpɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi. Kɛ ɛnɛ́ yi abhʉɛt nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, chi aghɔ́ yi ndu átwɔ̀. Ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi, afate, ajɛt arɔk akɛ́m yi abhɛnɛ.
Mmɔ arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, nkʉ Mandɛm bɛbʉ́, nɛ nkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kwáy mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́ywɛ.’
Kɛ chi aghati bɔ̌-bɛtok bhi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká ayak nɛ ɛ́wɛt ɛnɛ ɛrɨ́ ɛ́chá mǎnsɔbhɛri yi nɛ yɔ, mǎmfyɛ́ yi sɛnɔŋ ndǔ sɛnɔŋáwɔ, nɛ nkwɔbhánya bɛkak.
Dɔ́k yɛ ká mǎnkɛm mɔ́sɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ mǎngwáy mǎnkʉ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛ sɛ́nyíɛ́ sɛnkʉ maŋák,
mbɔnyunɛ mɔ́wa-nɛ agǔ nyaka, kɛ nɛ̌nɛ apɛt achi nɛpɛ́m. Anɛm nyaka kɛ mpɛt ngɔ yí.’ Afɔ̌ kɛ̌ ɛpa ɛ́bhó.
“Mpǒk yɔ, mɔ́ywi anɛ nsénsí abhak ɛbhɨ. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔ́t nɛ ɛkɛt ndǔ yi afu ɛbhɨ ápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, aghók ndǔ nkɛnkwɛt nɛ nɛbhɛ́n nɛ́chí anywɔ́p.
Abhɨŋɨ mmɔ̌bɛtok amɔt abhɛ́p yí bɛ ‘Ntɨkɨ ndak áchí fá ɛchɔŋ?’
Mmɔ̌ bɛtok wu aghati yí bɛ ‘Mɔmáyɛ apɛtnsɛm, kɛ ɛtayɛ áway mɔ́sɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ mbɔnyunɛ́ apɛtnsɛm dok.’
Mɔ̌mbɨ wu abéntɨ, anisi bɛchwe anywɔ́p. Chi afú arɔk are anɨk yí mmʉɛt bɛ anchwe anywɔ́p.
Kɛ akɛmɛ ɛtayi chi bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ, bɛyǎ mamiɛ́ anɛ ankɛm, nchí fá nɛ wɔ, nkʉ nɔkɔ bɛtɨk ntá yɛ mbɔ nsɛm. Yɛ̌ ɔrɛm bɛ yi, nkʉ kʉ, nkɛ taŋ ntí. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ mɛ yɛ̌ chi mɔ́mɛn bɛ́ nkʉ mǎŋák nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bha.
Kɛ mpok mɔ́ywɛ-nɛ mmu árɔ́ŋɔ́ ányíɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ nɛ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, ɔwǎy yi ɛsɛnɛ́mpɔŋ!’
Chi abhɨŋɨ yɛ yí arɛm bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, ɔchí fá nɛ mɛ mpǒk nkɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛya, chí ɛyɛ.
Ɛ́chí mbʉ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ bɛ sɛnkɛm ɛpa ɛ́nɛ, sɛ́nkʉ́ maŋák, mbɔnyunɛ mɔmáyɛ nɛ agǔ nyaka kɛ nɛ́nɛ achi nɛpɛ́m. Anɛm nyaka kɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛghɔ yi.’”
Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mǔnkáp amɔt achi nyaka. Abhɔ́ŋ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ ákɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm. Bo bágháti yi bɛ, mmʉ̌ bɛtɨk ywí wu ǎchɔŋti nkáp ywi.
Abhɨŋɨ mǔbɛtɨk wu arɛm bɛ ‘Ntɨkɨ ndak nɛ́ ngoko ɛ̌ti yɛ? Dɔ́k twɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ bɛkáti ɛbhɛn ɔ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛya arɛ́. Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kwáy bɛ́kɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha.’
“Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ yi? Mmʉɛt ápú mɛ́ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk bɛtaŋ bɛtaŋ, nɛ ntí ánwɔ̀p mɛ mɛnɨŋɨ mɛnɨŋɨ.
Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, arɛm bɛ, nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí kʉ bɛ́ bo mánsíɛ́ptí mɛ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap mpok báfɛrɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk.’
Abhɨŋɨ bǒ barɛm abhɛn chi-bɛtɨk ywi amɔt amɔt. Abhɛ́p anɛ mbɨ bɛ, ‘Yi ɔ́kɛ̀m chi-bɛtɨk wa?’
Akɛmɛ yi bɛ ‘Babhaŋá bawɛt bɛsa bɛtay.’ Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu aghati yi bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ɛkati barɛm ɛyɛ, sɔt, wupsi, sɨŋ babhaŋ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo ndǔ ɛnɛ́ ɛkɔ nɛ.’
Abhɛ́p yɛ anɛfú bɛ, ‘Ɔ̌kɛ́m ná?’ Akɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Bɛbhǎ nchwi bɛsa bɛtay.’ Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu achyɛ yí ɛkati barɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Sɔt, wupsí sɨ́ŋ bɛbhǎ nchwi bɛsa mɛnwi ndǔ ɛnɛ ɛkɔ.’
Chi-bɛtɨk ywi ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ arwɔ̌ yi ɛnyuyɔ, akaka yí bɛ́ yi abhɔŋ kɛ́ŋwáŋ bɛ́káysi ndak. Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ bǒ mmɨkɨ nɛ bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap nɛ kɛŋwaŋ bácha ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bákʉ̀ ɛbhap.”
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Kɛfɔ̌ bakáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ́kway bɛ́twɔ nɛ bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mǎnsɔ́t kɔ mǎnkʉ bo mámbák mamʉɛrɛ bhɛka bɛ́ mpok kɛ́máy, Mandɛm ánsɔt bhe ndǔ bɛchɔ́kɔ́ bhi ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
Mmǔ anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ bǎru mɛnyɨŋ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp mi ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ bǎru mɛnyɨŋ, apú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ nkwɔ.
Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ baraká nkáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk, agha ákway bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ be amfyɛ kɛfɔ̌ bakáp ɛkɛn kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti amɔ yɛka?
Mbák bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn báfyɛ́ amɔ yɛka, yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay?
Yɛ̌ mɔbɛtok apu kwáy bɛtok bachi batí apay ndɔŋ amɔt. Mbák ámbɔ́ŋ bachi bapay, ǎkɔŋ amɔt ancha anɛfú, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ǎchyɛ kɛnókó ntá amɔt, ambyak anɛfu. Mmu apu kwáy bɛtok Mandɛm antok nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk.”
Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nkwɔ Fárisi bo bákɔ́ŋɔ́ nkáp tontó báre way yi.
Yesu aghati bɔ bɛ, “Bě bǎchí bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mmʉɛt bɛ bǎchi chak bɛsí bho. Kɛ Mandɛm arɨŋɨ batɨ yɛka. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo báyɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ ɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ápàp.”
Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n Njwiti ápɛ́rɛ twɔ, bo bátɔ̀ŋ nyaka chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Basɨŋɨ́ mɔ kɛ̌ bo bákòŋo nyaka. Jɔ̌n átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bábho bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu are nu bɛchwe arɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ.
Kɛ ɛchi wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mfay ámfʉ́ɛ́t, mmɨk amfʉɛt, ɛcha bɛ mandú ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ basɨŋ amɛn Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ ánɛ́m.
Ɛchi yɛ bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay, akwɛ̌n bɛrwɔp. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ nnɛ́m árɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhay, akwɛ̌n nkwɔ bɛrwɔp.”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́n bɛ, “Mǔnkáp amɔt achi nyaka anɛ afyɛ́ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp, anyiɛ nɔkɔ ɛpa yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
Nchɛ́bhɛ́mu amɔt achí nyaka. Aka nyɛ́n bɛ Lásárɔs. Báre bhʉrɛ yi ndǔ nyǔbha mǔnkáp wu mpoknkɛm. Mmʉɛt yi ajwi nɛ bɛfʉɛt.
Abhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak mɛnyiɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛchɔkɔti ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwɛ̀nti amɨk mpok mǔnkáp anyiɛ nɛnyiɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak abhak bɛ mmú mǔnkáp ɛ́ré rɔŋ ɛ́nɨŋɨ nɔkɔ bɛfʉɛt ɛbhi.
Ansɛm mpok, nchɛ́bhɛ́mú wu agú, bɔángɛl Mandɛm basɔt yi barɔk amfay, bákʉ yi achɔkɔ kɛkwɔt nɛ Ábraham. Mǔnkáp agú nkwɔ, bábhɛ́mɛ yi.
Arɔk ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, abhak ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri arɛ́. Áyóŋ nɔ́kɔ́ amɨ́k amfay, aghɔ́ Ábraham nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ Lásárɔs abhak yí nɛpaká mmʉɛt.
Mǔnkáp wu akók yɛ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, Ábraham, ghɔ mɛ ntínso. Tó Lásárɔs ántáp sɛnɔŋ awɔ ndǔ manyiɛp antwɔ ankwɛnɛ mɛ ntɨ mandú. Nchí ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ngó-nɛ.’
Kɛ Ábraham akɛmɛ yi chi bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mpok ɔchí awu amɨk, ɔbhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Lásárɔs ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ yí achí sayri fá ɛnɛ́ wɔ ɔ́chí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ámɛ́n.
Dɨŋɨ́ nkwɔ bɛ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛpi nɛ́kɔrɛ bhɛsɛ ɛnyunɛ́, yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛfu fá ampe antwɔ ntá yɛka; nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛrɔ ɛbhě yɛká, ampé ántwɔ́ fá ntá yɛsɛ.’
Mǔnkáp wu arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Ábraham, nɨkmʉɛt tó yɛ Lásárɔs ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ɛtaya.
Mbɔ̌ŋ bɔ̌maya batí atay. Ghatí yi ándɔ́k ánsɛmti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ twɔ nkwɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́t nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n anɛ.’
Kɛ Ábraham akɛmɛ yi chí bɛ ‘Bɔ̌mayɛ babhɔŋ basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Mángók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn basɨŋɨ́ mɔ ághàti bhɔ.’
Arɛm ntá Ábraham bɛ, ‘Ǎe Ɛta Ábraham, ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway. Mbák mmu amɔt anɛ ánáŋá ágú ámpɛ́tnsɛm angati bhɔ, chɔŋ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.’
Ábraham aghati yɛ yi bɛ, ‘Mbák bɔ̌mayɛ babhɨkɨ ka bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ, nɔ bápú kway bɛghok yɛ chi mmu anɛ ánáŋá ágú kɛ ǎpɛtnsɛm ntá yap.’”
Yesu abho bɛ́gháti bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mamɔ anɛ átɛ̀n bo ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ápú nɔ́k bɛ́twɔ. Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛ́ncha ntá mmú anɛ ákʉ̀ mamɔ ántwɔ́ ntá bho!
Ɛ́chí sáyrí ntá mmu wu bɛ mánsɔt ntay nɛgho mánsɛt ɛmɨ ɛyi, mámɛsɛ yí amɛm manyu ɛcha yi bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m ankʉ mmǔ amɔt anɛ ánókó Mandɛm ankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
Sɔt ka mpok! Mbák mɔ́mayɛ ánkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, ghatí yi bɛ́ ándɔ́ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ. Mbák atɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, foŋorí yi.
Nɛ mbák akʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́ ndɔŋ tándrámɔt ndǔ ɛwak nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ndɔŋ antwɔ́, anɨk wɔ mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Ɛta foŋorí mɛ́,’ ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́fóŋóri yi.”
Bǒnto Yesu barɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Acha, kwak bɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛ́ntáŋ nɛndɔk ambɨ.”
Acha akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chí yɛ̌ chi nɨ́ŋɨ́nɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛm anɛ ɛnɔk ɛ́nɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ *mɔ́stat, mbʉ bǎkway bɛ́ghati ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bɛ, ‘Fǎ fá nɛ bakaŋ dɔ́k tě awu amɛm manyu’, nɛ yɔ́ ɛ́ngok be.”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛtɔŋ. Arɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ áchí ɛbhɨ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk, yɛ̌ chí ndu bɛbhábhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, yɛ̌ chi ndu bɛ́kwáŋ mbaŋ. Mbák afǔ ɛbhɨ apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, wɔ chi-bɛtɨk ywi ɔ̌ghati yi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ chɔkɔ́ amɨk nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́’?
Pú ɔ̌ghati yi chi bɛ, ‘Dɔ́k wupsí ndɛn, kʉ nɛnyíɛ́ twɔ nɛ nɔ. Nnáŋ nnyiɛ́ nnáŋá, ɔ́nsɔt ɛnɛ ɔnyiɛ’?
Mbák akʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́ghátí yi ɔpú kwáy bɛkaka yi bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ a’ mbɔnyunɛ akʉ chí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
Ɛ́mbák yɛ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe. Mǎnáŋ mǎnkʉ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ bhe, bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, ‘Sɛ́chí chí bǒ bɛtok, yɛ̌ ndak áchák ápú. Sɛ́kʉ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ.’”
Ndu Yesu ákɔ̀ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, are fʉɛ́t ndǔ ndyɛrɛbhɨ Samária nɛ Gálili.
Nɛchwe áchwè amɛm mɔ́tɔk amɔt, bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa bati byo bághɔ́ yi ndu átwɔ̀, báte, kɛrɔ́ŋ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ yí.
Bábho bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Yesu, Ɛta, ghɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso.”
Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ntá bachiǎkap Mandɛm bɛ mánchák bhe.” Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, ɛbhaŋákwa yap ɛ́may.
Mmu wap amɔt ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ ataŋ, abho bɛpɛtnsɛm ntá Yesu ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay.
Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí Yesu, akwɛ́n yi bɛkak ankaka nɔkɔ yi. Ɛ́fákárí bɛ mmǔ wu achí chi mmu Samária.
Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Pú bǒ bati byo kɛ mbúú? Abhɛ́nɛ́fú bati nɛ́nɛ́namɔt báchí fá?
Ndiɛrɛ kɛnkɔ̌ nɛ aywǐntí kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm bɛbɨti Mandɛm-ɛ́?”
Yesu aghati yɛ mmu wu bɛ, “Faté, dɔ́k ɛbhak ɛyɛ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n ɔbhɔŋɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.”
Nywɔp nɛ́mɔt, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ntɨ́kɨ́ mpok Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bo fá amɨk mbɔ Mfɔ wap?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́pú ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm abho bɛ́kɛm bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
Nɛ yɛ̌ mmú apú kwáy bɛrɛm yɛ̌ bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká Mandɛm fa nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap!’ Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Mandɛm anáŋ achi Mfɔ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka.”
Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ chɔŋ ɛkwak bɛbhak nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nywɔp nɛmɔt kɛ be kɛbhɔŋ mbi.
Mpók yɔ, chɔŋ bo mámbak abhɛn bághàti bhe bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi awu!’ Báchák mandɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi fá!’ Mbák mǎngók nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ bho bɛ́koŋo bhɔ.
Mbɔ ɛnyǔ miámiaŋ ákɔ̀t angɔɔ, bɛfu ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nɛbu ɛ́mɔt bɛghaka ɛ́chák, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ.
Kɛ yí abhɔŋ bɛyambɨ angɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ mámbyak yí, kɛ antwɔ́.
Mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka mpok Nóa, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́fàkari chɔŋ kɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi.
Bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka mányù nɔkɔ, abhɛn bábhày baghɔrɛ́ mámbay nɔkɔ, nɛ abhɛ́n bátòk bhɔ mántoko nɔkɔ kpatɛ nywɔp ɛnɛn Nóa áchwé amɛm áchwí, nɛ manyiɛp átwɔ́ akuti mmɨk awáy bǒ mankɛm.
Chɔŋ ɛ́mbak nkwɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nyaka mpok Lɔt. Bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka nɛ mányu nɔkɔ. Bákù nyaka mɛnyɨŋ nɛ abhɛn bɛ́ti mánti nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap. Mbɔk bákwàŋ nyaka nɛnyíɛ́, abhɛ́nɛ́fú mánte nɔkɔ bɛkɛt.
Kɛ ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n Lɔt afa ɛtɔk Sódom, Mandɛm akʉ ngó áfú amfay nɛ ɛkɛm mbɔ batay anɛ ádù, anyɛ mbɔ manyiɛp, ásɔ́ŋ bɔ mankɛm.
Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́bhàk chɔŋ nɛ bo mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ábhèsi.
“Ɛwak ɛyɔ, ɛ́bhák ɛnyumɔt nɛ mmu anɛ achi amfǎy ɛkɛt. Ákɛ́ rɔ́ŋ kpɨ́k anywɔ́p bɛ ampɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ ambʉɛ. Ɛnyumɔt nɛ mmu anɛ achi ɛbhɨ. Ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ́ ǎpɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p ansɔt yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ ngɔrɛ́ Lɔt.
Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt, chɔŋ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛ́nɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya, chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɔ́.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ndǔ mpok yɔ anɛ mɛ̌pɛtnsɛm, bǒ bati apay bákway bɛbhʉrɛ ndǔ bɛkɔ́k mɛ́mɔt, mánsɔt amɔt mandɔk nɛ yí, mándɔ anɛfu.
Baghɔrɛ́ bati ápay bákway bɛbhak ndǔ ntay nɛmɔt mánkɔk nɔkɔ nchwi, mánsɔt amɔt mándɔk nɛ yi, mándɔ anɛfú.”
[Bǒ bati apay bákwày bɛbhak ɛbhɨ, mánsɔt amɔt, mándɔ anɛfú.]
Bakoŋo Yesu bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari chɔŋ fá?” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛgú-nnya ɛchi, arɛ́ kɛ̌ kɛnɛn ɛkɛn kɛ́nyìɛ̀ bɛgú nnya kɛ́chɛmɛ.”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú ntá bakoŋo bhi ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɔ bɛ, bábhɔŋ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm, kɛfɛrɛ ntí arɛ.
Arɛm bɛ, “Ntaŋá-manyé amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔkɔfú, Mandɛm yi kɛ chyɛ kɛnókó, ntɨ nkwǎ yi kɛbhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi.
Kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt abhak nkwɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ. Are rɔ́ŋ ntá ntaŋá manyé wu anɨk nɔkɔ yí mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Ɛta, táŋ manyé ya sayri fɛrɛ mɛ amɔ́ mǔmpap awa.’
Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, ntaŋá manyé wu kɛfyɛ́ ntí. Kɛ ansɛm mpok, achɔkɔ diíí arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Yɛ̌ndu mpú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ ntɨ nkwǎ,
kɛ ndu mɔ́ngɔrɛ́-nɛ árɔ̀ŋ chi ambɨ bɛchyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, chɔŋ ntáŋ manyé yi sayri nchyɛ́ yi. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, apú sɛbhɛ mɛ ante amɨk.’”
Yesu Acha arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Bǎghok nɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ntaŋá manyé anɛ ápú chak árɛ́mɛ́?
Mbák mmu mbɔ yi ǎkwáy nyaka bɛ́kwak mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu, Mandɛm kɛ apu kway bɛkwak bo abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ mbák bádì kɛbhɔ ntá yi bɛ̌ti nɛ ngósí? Ǎkway bɛ́chɔ́ŋti mpok kɛ ankwak bhɔ?
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amkpɔ́t manyé áyák anchyɛ bǒbhi. Kɛ mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, chɔŋ angɔ́ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm fá amɨkɨ́?”
Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú ntá bo abhɛn bakaysi nyaka bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mámbyaka nɔkɔ bo bachak.
Yi bɛ, “Bo bati apay bárɔŋ nyaka mɛnɨkmʉɛt amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Amɔt abhak mǔnkwɔ Fárisi, anɛfú abhak mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti.
Mǔnkwɔ Fárisi ate ɛyǐ ɛbhak anɨk mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Mandɛm, nkáká wɔ́ bɛ mpú mbɔ bo báchák abhɛn bachi baghɛ́p, bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bakwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp. Nkáká wɔ bɛ mpú mbɔ yɛ̌ chí mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti anɛ áté nɔ́ awu.
Nchí bhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay ndɔŋ ɛ́páy ndu sɔ́nde amɔt. Nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha mɛnkɛm nchí chyɛ ndu amɔt amfay baru byo mbɔ akap ntá yɛ.’
Kɛ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti ate nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Ntí, yi kɛ yoŋ amfay, nɛ adɛp awɔ́ antɨ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Mandɛm, nchí mmǔ bɛbʉ́. Ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso!’
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́t nyaka bɛ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti wu achí chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ́kɛbhák nɔ nɛ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi mbɔnyunɛ́ Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀pti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, kɛ ǎkòsi yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk.”
Bofú básɔ́t bɔ̌bhap bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ bɛ yi anyaŋa bɔ amɔ anti anjɛt bhɔ. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábho bɛsáyti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ kʉ nɔ.
Kɛ Yesu abhɨŋɨ bǒbhɔ nɛ bɔ̌bhap. Nɛ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká mǎmbɔ mántwɔ ntá ya, bǎkɛ́ chyɛt bɔ mbi mbɔnyunɛ bǒ abhɛn bachi mbɔ bhɔ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ wap.”
Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ Mandɛm ankɛm yi mbɔ mɔ́nkwɛn apú kway bɛbhak ndǔ mpǎy bo abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap wáwák.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, mǔnti bo Israɛl abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, wɔ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
Yesu akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́bhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ bɛ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́? Mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́ apú. Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ achi Mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́.
Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbhé Mandɛm. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp. Ɔ́kɛ́ wáy mmu. Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɛp. Ɔ́kɛ́ te ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́. Chiɛ̌ máyɛ nɛ ɛtayɛ kɛnókó.’”
Mmǔ wu árɛm bɛ́ “Nnáŋ nchí bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm.”
Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛ́rɔp ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ. Dɔ́k tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, chyɛ̌ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Mbák ɔ́nkʉ́ nɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ amfay. Ɔ́ntwɔ́ yɛ ɔnkoŋo mɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ awǔ amfay.”
Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, apɔp, arɔbhɛ rɔ́ŋɛ́rɔ́ŋ mbɔnyunɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
Yesu ayɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́bèmʉɛt tontó bɛ mǔnkáp anka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.
Ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mpɔŋɔ baso ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok mbíábhan ɛ́cha mǔnkáp bɛ́ka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.”
Bo abhɛn baghoko bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɔ bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Agha ákwày yɛ bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́cha nkwǎŋwaŋ, ɛ́pú cha Mandɛm.”
Píta asá ɛyɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, sɛ́rɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm sɛ́kòŋo wɔ.”
Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ árɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛkɛt, yɛ̌ ngɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ bɔ̌mayi, yɛ̌ ɛtayi nɛ máyi, nɛ yɛ̌ bɔ̌bhi ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm,
Mandɛm ǎchyɛ chɔŋ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha ɛbhɛn yi anɛmɛ fá amɨk. Nɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ.”
Ɛ́tat nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu asɔt baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay nɛpak. Abho bɛ́gháti bhɔ bɛ, “Ghók ká! Sɛ́rɔŋ nɔ chí Yerúsalɛm, nɛ arɛ́, chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ɛ́mfakari.
Chɔŋ mánkɛ́m yi mámfyɛ amɔ́ bǒbati abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, mánjɔ́kɔ́ yi, nɛ mánsɔkɔti yí, nɛ mámpati yi batiɛ́ amʉɛt.
Chɔŋ mándɛ́n yi nɛ ɛkpa, nɛ mángwáy yi. Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
Kɛ baghɔk Yesu kɛjwimɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ́mɛ́. Bɛ́bhak bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá yap nɛ bɔ́ kɛkɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɛmɛ.
Mpok Yesu aghaka kɛkwɔt nɛ Jɛríko, nnɛ́mámɨ́k amɔt abhak nɛpak mbi chɔ́kɔ́, anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́.
Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bó báfʉɛ̀t, abhɛ́p ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari.
Bágháti yi bɛ, “Yesu anɛ Násárɛt kɛ áfʉɛ̀t.”
Abho yɛ bɛ́bɨ́k bɛ, “Yesu! Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso!”
Bo abhɛn bárɔ̀ŋ ambɨ báré sayti yi bɛ ánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák; kɛ akpɨk are bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋɛtaŋ bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso!”
Yesu áte, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mántwɔ́ nɛ yi. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ yi, Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ,
“Ɔ̌yáŋ mɛ̌nkʉ́ wɔ yi?” Akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Acha, nchí yaŋ mpɛt ngɔ mbaŋ.”
Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mbaŋ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n ɔbhɔŋɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.”
Tɛ́mté wu, abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ! Nɛ abho bɛkoŋo Yesu, ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm. Bo mankɛm bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, babhɔ bɛbɨti nkwɔ Mandɛm.
Yesu achwe ɛtɔk Jɛríko are kɔ bɛfʉɛt.
Mmu amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sakio. Abhak mǔnti babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti. Abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ nkáp.
Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu ǎfʉɛ̀t, abho bɛyaŋ mbi bɛ ángɔ́ ɛnyǔ mmu Yesu achi, kɛ ɛ̌ti kɛmbɨŋ ɛki nɛ bɛyǎ bo, yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ yi.
Ajɛt arɔk ambɨ, akó amfǎy ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Síkámɔ ndǔ mbi anɛ Yesu ákɔ̀ arɛ ndu áyàŋ bɛghɔ yi.
Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, ayoŋ amɨ́k amfay aghati Sakio bɛ, “Sakio, sɛp twɔ́ áyák. Mbɔŋ bɛ́bhak ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ɛchɔŋ.”
Sakio asɛp amɨk áyák, anak Yesu ɛkɛt yi nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
Bo bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt Sakio, báré nywinti mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yesu ǎrɔ̀ŋ bɛbhák kɛnkɔ amɛm ɛkɛt nkʉ bɛbʉ́.”
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ Sakio báchí anywɔ́p, Sakio afate arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ghók, chɔŋ nkɔ́rɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha ndǔ baru apay, nchyɛ́ ndu amɔt ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́ bho. Nɛ mbák nsɔt ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu ndǔ mangwɔ, chɔŋ nkɛmɛ yɔ ndɔŋ ɛnwi.”
Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ wɔ́ nɛ ɛfo ɛyɛ ɛnkɛm mbɔnyunɛ wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham anɛ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ.
Nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntwɔ bɛ́yáŋ nɛ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ chi bo abhɛn manɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ.”
Ɛnɛ́ bo bághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ̀m, arɔk ambɨ bɛtɛm nɛkay nɛchak. Ntí abhak bɛ, anáŋ agháká nyaka kɛkwɔt nɛ Yerúsalɛm, nɛ bo bákàysi nyaka bɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ̀ fá amɨk mandú mpok.
Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnɛ́m mmu amɔt arɔ́ nyaka ɛtɔk yi arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛ́ mánkʉ́ yí mfɔ ntá bǒbhi kɛ ampɛtnsɛm.
Ápɛ́rɛ rɔŋ, abhɨŋɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi bati byo. Achyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ɛbhǎ nkáp, arɛm bɛ ‘Kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛsiɛ nɛ nkáp wu kpátɛ̌ mpok nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ɛná.’
Arɔ yɛ are rɔ́ŋ. Kɛ bǒ ɛtɔk yi bápap nyaka yi. Bátó yɛ bo bɛ mándɔ́k mángátí mfɔ ngo bɛ ‘Acha, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mmǔ-nɛ ambák mfɔ ywɛsɛ.’
Yɛ̌ nɔ, nɛrɔŋ yi arɔŋɔ bákʉ́ yí mfɔ. Ápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ɛtɔk yi, abhɨŋɨ bǒ bɛtɨk abhɛn yi achyɛ nyaka nkáp bɛ mántwɔ́ yi angɔ nsay anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
Anɛ mbɨ arɔk aghatí yí bɛ, ‘Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ nsáy bɛbhǎ nkáp byo amfay ɛbha ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.’
Mfɔ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ sayri, ɔchí ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk! Tɛ̌ndu ɔ́tɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ mandú ɛnyɨŋ bɛ ɔ̌bhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp, mɛ̌chyɛ̀ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm bɛtɔk byo.’
Anɛ ájwí bati apay atwɔ́ arɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ nsay bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay amfay ɛbha ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.’
Mfɔ arɛm ntá nkʉbɛtɨk wu bɛ, ‘Mɛ̌chyɛ̀ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kɛ́m bɛtɔk bɛgho bɛtay.’
Nkʉ bɛtɨk achák atwɔ arɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, ghɔ́ ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyɛ. Nnɛp nyaka wu ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn mbɛsɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ wu.
Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchǎy mbɔnyunɛ ɔchí mmu mbeápak. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú ɛyɛ, ɔ̌sɔrɛsɔt. Nɛ ɔ̌ghɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ.’
Mfɔ wu aghati yi bɛ ‘Wɔ nkʉbɛtɨk mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɛ ɛ́way wɔ! Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nchí mmu mbeápak. Ɔrɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí sɔt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ɛya, nɛ nchí ghɛm ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɨ, pú nɔ́?
Kɛ ndak yi ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ nkáp awa amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́nkap? Mbɔ ɔkʉ nɔ, mbʉ́ ndu ntwɔ́ nɛ́, mbɨ́kɨ́ sɔt wú nɛ nsáy?’
Aghátí yɛ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ téé bɛ, ‘Sɔt ka ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyǐ yɔ mǎnchyɛ ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbha byo.’
Bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, ‘Acha, pú yi abhɔŋ bɛbhǎ byo?’
Mfɔ wu akɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, báchyɛ yi ɛ́chák. Kɛ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, básɔ̀t ntá yi yɛ̌ chí mandú anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
Nɛ mbák chí bǒmpap abha bhɛn, abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ nyaka bɛ mbák mfɔ wap, twɔ́ ká nɛ bhɔ fá, mǎngwáy bhɔ́ bɛsí bha.’”
Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kɔ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, yi abhak ambɨ, bo abhɛn báchi nɛ yi mankoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm.
Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɔ̌bɛtɔk Bɛtfágɛ nɛ Bɛ́tani, ndǔ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk *Ólif, ató baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati apay ambɨ.
Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ndǔ mɔ́tɔk anɛ achi afɔ ambɨ. Nɛchwe anɛ báchwe arɛ chɔŋ mǎngɔ mɔ́ mpɔŋɔ batu sɛsɛ́t, anɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re kɔ nɛ yɔ́. Kaŋarí ká twɔ́ mɛ nɛ yɔ́.
Mbák mmú ámbɛ́p be ntí anɛ bǎkàŋari yɔ́, ghati ka yí bɛ, ‘Acha kɛ áyàŋ yɔ.’”
Bǒ abhɛn yi átó, bárɔ́k, bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ bákàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bǒ abhɛn babhɔŋɔ yɔ, bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu?”
Bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Acha ǎyàŋ yɔ.”
Bárɔ́k yɛ nɛ yɔ ntá Yesu. Básɔ́t ndɛn ɛnɛ́ mfǎymʉɛt ɛyap basɔbhɛri mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bákwák yi achɔkɔ amfay.
Nɛ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ árɔ̀ŋ, bo báré sɔt ndɛnɛ́ mfǎymʉɛt ɛyap mángay nɔkɔ ambi bɛ mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu ankɔ amfay.
Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mbi árɔ̀ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif ásɛ̀p Yerúsalɛm, ngɛ́mtáy bakoŋo bhi bábhó mɛŋák, mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bághɔ́.
Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha! Mandɛm Mfay kɛ áchyɛ̀ kpák. Sɛ́nchíɛ yí kɛnókó!”
Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn báchí ndǔ ngɛ́mtáy bo bhɔ, bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sáy bakoŋo bhɛ mánchɔkɔ kpák.”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌ mbʉ́ mánchɔkɔ chí kpák, batay ábɨk ambɨti Mandɛm.”
Yesu ágháká kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Yerúsalɛm, aghɔ́ ɛtɔk, adi kɛbhɔ ndǔ ntínso nɛ́kɛm yi nɛ Yerúsalɛm,
andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ be bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí ɛchɔŋ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɔ́ŋ kpák, mbʉ́ ɛ́rɨ-e! Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛchi bhɛsɛ bhɛsɛ nta yɛka nɛ bǎpú ghɔ bhɔ.
Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bǒmpap abhɛka bátwɔ̀ mánkap be, mántɛp nkók ankap ɛtɔk yɛka, mánchɛt bhe bɛbhě mɛnkɛm.
Nɛ mánchwe mánaŋa bhe nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka mankɛm, mámokoti ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛnyunɛ́ yɛ̌ ntay nɛ́pú rɔp amfǎy ntɨ. Chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ́ bǎbyak Mandɛm mpok yi átwɔ́ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhe.”
Yesu arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm abho bɛbok bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ́ amɛm,
ambe nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛkɛt ɛya ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak chi ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt’, kɛ bǎyíbhírí yɔ́ ɛ́rɔp chi ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ baghɛ́p bábhɛ̀sɛ arɛ!”
Yesu are rɔ́ŋ yɛ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp. Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bachak báre yáŋ mbi bɛway yi.
Kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔ́ŋ mbi mbɔnyunɛ́ bo mankɛm bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ̀m.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm angati nɔkɔ bhɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɔ́k ntá yi,
barɛm bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ntɨkɨ bɛtaŋ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ ɔ́kʉ̀? Agha áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛbhɛp be. Ghatí ká mɛ.
Bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ndu bɛjwiti bho, bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm kɛ ntá nkwǎ?”
Báre kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n bɛ́fú nyaka ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɛ́p bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ ndaká yi bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi?’
Nɛ mbák sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, ‘Bɛ́fǔ nyaka ntá nkwǎ’, bǒ mankɛm bátɛmti bhɛsɛ nɛ batay mangway, mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánóko sayri bɛ Jɔ̌n achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
Ɛ́kʉ́ bakɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.”
Nɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnkwɔ́ mpú ghati yɛ be mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
Yesu abho yɛ bɛ́tɛm bɔ nɛkay nɛchak bɛ, “Mmǔfú achi nyaka. Atɨ nkɨ apɨ mɛnɔk vain arɛ. Afyɛ́ bo arɛ, bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk mankɔrɛ nsáy nɛ yi. Arɔ yɛ arɔk nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yi átàt, ɛtɔk ɛchak.
Mpok bɛkɔk kɛpɛm ɛ́nɔk ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi bachak bɛ mándɔ́k mánsɔ́t aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ mbwɔt. Kɛ bǒ bɛtɨk bhɔ kɛchyɛ. Bákɛ́m yi badɛn, bábók, apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ amɔ.
Mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató mǔbɛtok achak. Bákɛ́m awu nkwɔ́ bádɛn, báchyɛ́ yi ntiánwɔ́p, bábók apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ apay.
Ató mmɔ̌bɛtok anɛ ajwi bati arat. Bádɛ́n, báfyɛ́ bɛfʉɛt amʉɛt, bábók, afú arɔk.
Ɛ́kʉ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu arɛm nɛ mmʉɛ́t ɛyi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ ná? Chɔŋ ntó mbɔ̌ŋ mmɔ̌ntɨ wa. Yɛ̌ yí, bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.’
Kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ mɔ́ywi nɛ́, nɛ yí kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛwú ɛtayi. Twɔ́ ká sɛnkɛm yi sɛ́ngwáy bɛ́ ɛtayi ánáŋ ángú, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛ́ndɔp chi ɛbhɛsɛ.’
Mɔ́ywi wu áchwé nɔ́kɔ́ amɛm nkɨ, bákɛ́m yi baya báfú amɛm nkɨ nɛ yi, barɔk baway.” Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎkaysi bɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu ankʉ yi ntá bǒbhɔ?
Chɔŋ antwɔ́ angway bhɔ, anchyɛ nkɨ wu ntá bo bachak.” Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, babho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm akɛ ka!”
Yesu ayɨŋɨ bhɔ dǐǐ, abhɛp bɛ, “Ntí basɨŋɨ́ amɛn achi bɛ yi? Basɨŋɨ́ amɛn árɛ̀m bɛ: ‘Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batɛ̌kɛt bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ́ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt nɛchá batay áchák ankɛm.’
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ akwɛnɛ ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn, ǎsìɛpti ndǔ mbɨŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ yi amʉɛt, nɛ́chɔ̀kɔti yi.”
Yesu atɛm nɔkɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn, batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm bárɨŋɨ bɛ atɛm nɛkay ɛnɔ chi ɛ̌ti yap. Báre yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ báchày bo abhɛn báchi arɛ.
Bárɔ́k yɛ ambɨ bɛyaŋ mbi bɛkɛm yi. Bátó baghokotǐ kɛpɨ ntá yi bɛ mánkɔt ngɛpti bɛ bachi bǒ tɛtɛp. Kɛ bárɔ̌ŋ nyaka chi bɛ mámbɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi mɛnyɨŋ kpát ankwɛ́n anyu, ankwɛ́n ndǔ ntǎ yap bɛ mansɔt yi manto ntá Gɔ́bhanɔ Rom mmǔ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi yi amɔ.
Baghokotǐ kɛpɨ bhɔ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Yesu, babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́rɛ̀m nɛ ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛchi chak. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔpú yɨŋɨ mmu ndǔ bɛsí ɔ́ncháy yi, kɛ ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ.
Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛka bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Mfɔ Rom kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka?”
Yesu arɨŋɨ bapu map, arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
“Tɔ́ŋ ká mɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap.” Bátɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ yi abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ntí ághá nɛ́ arɛ́? Nɛ nnyɛ́n chí ɛnɛn ághá?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Chí ntí Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ nnyɛ́n, chi ɛni.”
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Chiɛ́ yɛ́ ka nta Mfɔ Rom yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛyi, mǎnchyɛ ntá Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ Mandɛm.”
Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu arɛmɛ, bápɔ́p! Bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ yi ankwɛn anyu bɛ bɔ mánkɛ́m yi bɛsí bho. Bárɔp kpákpǎkpak.
Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu babhɛp yi ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka bɛ bawú bápɛ̀t chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Babhɛp yi bɛ,
“Ntɔŋ, Moses asɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bɛ, mbák mmu ángú ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́, mɔ́mayi abhɔŋ bɛsɔt ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ́ ámbé bɔ nɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n manɔ anɛ ágú.
Bɔ̌ chi amɔt bati tándrámɔt báchí nyaka. Anɛ mbɨ abháy ngɔrɛ́, agú kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́.
Anɛ ákòŋo asɔt kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu ndǔ nɛbhay agú kɛbhɔŋ mmɔ́.
Anɛ ájwí bati arat nkwɔ asɔt yí kɛ agú kɛbhɔ́ŋ mmɔ́ nɛ yi. Ɛ́fákári ɛnyumɔt nɛ bɔ mankɛm bati tándrámɔt.
Ndǔ ngwɛnti, ngɔrɛ́ wu nkwɔ agú.
Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ngɔrɛ́ wu ǎbhák anɛ agha? Ndu bɔ́ mankɛm, bati tándrámɔt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhay nyaka yi.”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Fá amɨk, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm bábháy batɨ,
kɛ bo abhɛn chɔ́ŋ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mǎnchwe ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ, bápú pɛrɛ bháy nɛbhay
mbɔnyunɛ bápú pɛrɛ kway bɛgu. Bábhak mbɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, bábhak bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn yi akʉ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
Yɛ̌ chí Moses atɔŋ nyaka kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ mbok ɛnɔk ɛnɛ́ ngó ádù arɛ bɛ bawú bápɛt chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ mi ɛ̌ti mbok ɛyɔ, Moses ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm mmu achi Acha bɛ, ‘Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek, Mandɛm Jekɔ́p!’
Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm achí Mandɛm bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Apú Mandɛm bawú. Ntá Mandɛm, bǒbhɔ mankɛm bachi nɛpɛ́m.”
Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báká nɛ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔrɛm sayri!”
Yɛ̌ mmu kɛpɛrɛ mɔ bɛ́bhɛp yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
Yesu abhɛ́p bo abhɛn bághòk yi bɛ, “Ná bákwày bɛrɛm bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò achi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít?
Mbɔ̌ŋ Debhít asɨ̌ŋ amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ: ‘Mandɛm Acha arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ, chɔkɔ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ-kɛnókó,
kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mándɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nyàŋa bɛkak arɛ.’
Debhít ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Mpɛmɛ ɛrɛ bɛ Acha. Ná Achǎ áyibhiri ambak ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi?”
Bɛsí bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, Yesu arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ,
“Sɔt ka mpok nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Bákɔŋ bɛghap mánkó mansɛp nɛ bɛwubhɛ wubhɛ́ ndɛn amʉɛt nɛfísiɛ bɛ bo mánkáká nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ nɛ kɛnókó. Bákɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́chɔkɔ ndǔ bɛbhaká kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndǔ bɛpa.
Nɛ mányìɛ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ mangwɔ, mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɔ́rí nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛsí bhó mbɔ bɛ bachi bɛrɨtí bho. Chɔŋ ntɛ́msí yap anjá ancha.”
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu achi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ayɨŋɨ aghɔ́ ndǔ bǒ bakáp báfyɛ̀ akap amɛm ɛkʉbhɛ́ nkáp.
Aghɔ́ nkwɔ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt anɛ ɛyi ɛ́pú ndu afyɛ́ bɔ̌bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap bapay.
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, akap kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́-nɛ ácha anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
Ndǔ bɛyǎ bakap kɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap áfɛ́rɛ́ mandú achyɛ mbɔ akap, kɛ nchɛ́bhɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ, achyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.”
Mbɔk baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré rɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, mánkak nɔkɔ bɛrɨtí batay anɛ́ básɔ́rɛ́ báté yɔ́ nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báchyɛ́ bɛ mánsɔ́bhɛ́rí ɛkɛt ɛ́rɛ. Kɛ Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
“Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ nɛ mɛnkɛm, mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ amɨk ɛnkɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp téé.”
Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ntɨkɨ mpok chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fakari, nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ arɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ bákɛ́ rwɔ bhe mǎnjíbhírí batɨ yɛka. Bɛyǎ bo bátwɔ̀ chɔŋ mánsɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna mántɛn ambɨ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Mɛ kɛ nchi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtó!’ Nɛ bɛ, ‘Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ mmɨk!’ Mbák mǎngók nɔ́ bǎkɛ́ koŋo bhɔ́.
Nɛ mpok bǎghókó nsóŋó-nɛnu nɛ ɛbyɔk, bǎkɛ́ chay. Mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́pú tɔŋ bɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk arɔp kɛkwɔt.”
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́nu nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák, bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk mánu nɛ batɨ̌ bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk.
Chɔŋ bɛtaŋtí nɛnyikisǐ mmɨk nɛ nsay nɛ bɛghorǐ mame mɛ́mbak mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́ntwɔ nɛ bɛyǎ bɛcháy, nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mfu amfǎy.
Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́pɛrɛ́ fákári, chɔŋ mánkɛm be, mánchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, mánsɔt be mandɔk amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap mántaŋ be arɛ, mamfyɛ́ bhe amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mámfyɛ be amɔ́ bafɔ nɛ bɔgɔ́bhanɔ bɛ mántáŋ be ɛ̌ti ya.
Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nchyɛ bhe mbi bɛghati bɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya.
Kʉ yɛka batɨ̌ yɛka bɛ bǎpú sɛmɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛrɛm ndu bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt,
mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm, nchyɛ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛ mǎnchók manyǔ bǒmpap abhɛka.
Chɔŋ yɛ̌ chí bachi nɛ manɔ bhɛka, nɛ bɔ̌mayɛka, nɛ bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhɛka mámfyɛ be amɔ́ bǒmpap abhɛka. Nɛ chɔŋ mángwáy mbɔk yɛka.
Chɔŋ bo mankɛm mámpap be ɛ̌ti bǎchí bakoŋo bha.
Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn mɛ́nkway bɛfakari nɛ bhe kɛ yɛ̌ ɛkǎk ɛmɛnɛ́nti mmu ywɛka ɛpu nɛm.
Mbák mǎnté kákátí, chɔŋ mǎmpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka.
“Mpok bǎghɔ́ bakwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ndu bákábhɛ́ Yerúsalɛm, dɨŋɨ́ yɛ́ ka bɛ mpok bɛchɔŋti Yerúsalɛm akway.
Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya mámbʉ́ɛ́, mámbɛ́sɛ́ amfay njiɛ. Abhɛn báchi amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm mámbʉ́ɛ́ mándɔ́k. Nɛ abhɛn bachi nɛfí bákɛ́ chwe ɛtɔk,
mbɔnyunɛ manywɔp ayɔ chi anɛ ntɛmsi, bɛ́kʉ bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm mɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.
Nɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá baghɔrɛ́ nɛ mɛniɛ nɛ abhɛn báchí nɛ bɔ amɔ mpok ayɔ! Chɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛ́ntwɔ fá amɨk nɛ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒ Yerúsalɛm mángɔ bɛběntɨ bhi.
Chɔŋ mángwáy bɛyǎ bhap nɛ bɔakparɛnja, nɛ mánkɛmti bachak mbɔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛnú ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk. Chɔŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mánjati Yerúsalɛm kpatɛ mpok ayap amfʉɛt.
“Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mbak amfay ndǔ mmok, nɛ ndǔ ntaŋ nɛ ndǔ mambe. Nɛ fá amɨk, chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́mbɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bɛcháy ɛ̌ti bɛrɛmti ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fù ndǔ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛnɛ bɔmanyu.
Chɔŋ bo mámbɔŋ bɛcháy kpátɛ mbɔk mámfe ndu bárɨŋɨ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhó bɛfakari fá amɨk. Chɔŋ bɛtaŋ mfáy mɛ́nyɨkɨsi.
Nɛ chɔŋ Mmǔ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi, ande twɔ́ amɛm nɛbháŋ, nɛ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ nɛ kɛnókó.
Mpok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhó bɛfakari, tě ká sɛnɛ́ nɛ nkaysi bɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm áfɛrɛ bhe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.”
Yesu atɛ́m bɔ nɛkay ɛnɛ́n bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ká ɛnɔk *fig nɛ mɛnɔk bɛ́chák.
Nɛtɛ́m anɛ bɔ́ bɛ́bho bɛ́tɛm bɛtɔ́, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛso ɛ́rɔp chi kɛ́kwɔ́t.
Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ nɛtwɔ́ wa, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm. Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n-nɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́fàkari, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mpok anɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ arɔp kɛkwɔt.
Nchí ghati bhe tɛtɛp bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ amfʉɛ́t.
Chɔŋ mfay amfʉɛt, mmɨk amfʉɛ́t, kɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú fʉɛt wáwák.
“Sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndǔ mɛ́nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ tontó, bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndu mmɛ́m nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛmɛ́ mmɨk ɛnɛn. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kway bɛkʉ bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛtwɔ́ ɛna nɛ́mbák tɛ́mchok ntá yɛka ndǔ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ toŋti mmʉɛ́t, nɛ nɛ́mbayti bhe mbɔ ntá.
Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ mɛ́njɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu fá amɨk.
Bák yɛ ka pě mpoknkɛm, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́bʉɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari, mǎnte bɛsí Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm.”
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp Yesu are tɔ́ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ běku, ankó andɔk ambʉrɛ amfay njiɛ mɛnɔk Ólif.
Nɛ nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bo mámpu mandɔk ntá yi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ.
Mpok anɛ bo Israɛl mányìɛ̀ ɛpǎ Brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís arɔp kɛkwɔt. Bábhɨŋɨ ɛpǎ yɔ bɛ, *Nɛkɨŋɨ.
Bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báré yaŋ mbi bɛway Yesu bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bakway bɛkʉ.
Satan akó anti Júdas anɛ mpɨ́kɨ́rí nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchi bɛ Iskariɔt. Júdas achi nyaka mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu bati byo nɛ apay.
Arɔk anyiɛ́ bɛti nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ɛnyu yi ákway bɛti Yesu ntá yap.
Bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó, nɛ báká bɛchyɛ yi nkáp.
Júdas aka nɛ bhɔ́. Abho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛ́tí Yesu ntá yap ndǔ mpok anɛ ngɛ́mtay bho bapu ghɔ.
Nywɔp Brɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yís nɛ́kwáy. Ndu nywɔp ɛnɔ kɛ̌ báwày nyaka mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ,
Yesu ató yɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká toŋtí mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ sɛ́nyíɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.”
Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yàŋ sɛ́ntóŋtí yɔ́ fá?”
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ká, nɛchwe anɛ bǎchwé ɛtɔk, chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ mmu anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ ɛjɔ̌ manyiɛp. Koŋó ká yi kpátɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ yi áchwe,
mǎngati mbɔŋɔ́kɛt bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ ǎto bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbɛp wɔ bɛ, mɔ́kɛrɛ́ mankɔ anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ nɛ baghɔk abha achí fá?’
Chɔŋ antɔ́ŋ be mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi amfay nɛ achɨk anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔbhɛri. Toŋtí ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ́.”
Bárɔ́k, baghɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ. Bátóŋti Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ arɛ́.
Mpok ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu achɔkɔ ndu ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nɛ bǒnto.
Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ njǎŋ mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛnɛ́ nɛ bhe tontó kɛ nchwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mpú pɛrɛ nyiɛ́ chɔŋ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ kpátɛ mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mándɨŋɨ ntí ɛpǎ ɛnɛ, nɔ́ chi mpok yi ábhák Mfɔ bǒ mankɛm.”
Yesu asɔt yɛ nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ́m amɛm. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, achyɛ ntá bǒnto andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka nyú, ntɨ anyǔ anchyɛ ntɨ.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bɛ́bhó ɛchɔŋ, mpú pɛrɛ nyú mmɛ́mɛn kpátɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ bo mankɛm.”
Asɔt yɛ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛd. Achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Are bɔkɔti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi, andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Brɛt-nɛ até ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛya anɛ nchí chyɛ mbɔ akap ɛ̌ti yɛka. Mǎndɔp, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ ndu bɛ́tɨk mɛ.”
Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, asɔt nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ́m amɛm, achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ákʉ́ nɛ nɛnyíɛ́. Arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Nku Nkɔ anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bǒ mmɨk ɛ̌ti nɛwú ɛna ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ ankʉ *Nku Nkɔ anɛ yi ányú nɛ bo ante.
Kɛ mmu anɛ átì mɛ achí fá chɔkɔ ǎnyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛ.
Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ngu mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá mmu wu nɔ átì mɛ ntá bǒmpap abha!”
Bǒnto bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ ákway bɛkʉ anɛ ɛnyǔ ndak ntá yi e?”
Baghɔkɔ Yesu babho bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ mmu wap anɛ áchá abhɛnɛfu.
Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bafɔ abhɛn bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk babhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒbhap nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho, ǎyàŋ mámbɨŋɨ yi bɛ, ‘Nkwaka-bho.’
Kɛ ɛ́kɛ́ bhák nɔ nɛ bhe. Mǔngo ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛbhak mbɔ mɔ́nkwɛn ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, mǔnti ambak mbɔ mǔbɛtok.
Agha áchá ntɨ? Mmǔ anɛ báfʉɛ̀t yi nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ anɛ áfʉɛ̀t nɛnyíɛ́? Pú anɛ áchɔkɔ mámfʉɛt yi nɛnyíɛ́? Kɛ nchí nɛ bhe mbɔ mǔbɛtok.
“Bě kɛ̌ bǎté nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri bha mɛnkɛm.
Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnyiɛ kɛfɔ, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ nchí kʉ chɔŋ bɛ be nkwɔ́ manyíɛ́ kɛfɔ.
Chɔŋ mǎnyiɛ nɛ mǎnyú nɛ mɛ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndǔ ɛpǎ kɛfɔ ɛya, nɛ mǎnchɔkɔ nkwɔ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ndu bɛkɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt Israɛl byo nɛ apay.”
Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɛm ntá Píta bɛ, “Símun, Símun, ghók! Báchyɛ́ Satan bɛtaŋ bɛ́ ámɔ́ bhe, amfap abhɛ́n bárɨ́ nɛ abhɛn babɛbhɛ mbɔ mmǔ ǎnyɨ̀kɨsi kasárá ndu bɛsɔt anɛ yi ághàŋ gari.
Kɛ nnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛ bɛ́ ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ. Nɛ ɔ́náŋ ɔ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ntá ya, ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛfyɛ bɔ̌mayɛ ntɨ.”
Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, yɛ̌ báfyɛ̀ wɔ chi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, yɛ báwày wɔ wáy, mɛ̌gú chi nɛ wɔ.”
Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Píta, dɨŋɨ bɛ́ nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók bɛtǐ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
Yesu abhɛ́p baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mpok ntó bhe pósá ti, ɛbha ti, nkwɔbhánya bɛkak ti, bǎchɛp nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛ?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Wáwák.”
Aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkáp ankɛm wu amʉɛt. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhǎ nɛkɔ ánsɔ́t yɔ. Anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ akparɛnja, ántí ndɛ́ yi anku akparɛnja.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ya, ɛbhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp. Nɔ chi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Básɔt yi mbɔ nkʉ bɛbʉ́ amɔt.’ Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp.”
Baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɛm bɛ, “Acha, ghɔ́ bɔakparɛnja bapay fá.” Aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɔ.”
Yesu afa yɛ arɔk amfay Njiɛ Mɛnok Ólif mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɔk nɛ yi.
Arɛ́, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt bɛ mbák nɛmɔ nɛ́twɔ bǎkɛ́ kwɛn.”
Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔ bhɔ, atɛ́n mmʉɛt ambɨ mandú, mbɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́tɛ́m ntay nɛngaka. Atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ,
“Ɛtaya, mbák ɔkɔŋ, fɛrɛ́ nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ́ ámfórí mɛ. Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ, kʉ chi ɛnɛ́ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́yàŋ.”
[Ɛnɛ́ yi ánɨ̀kmʉɛt nɔ, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi yi bɛsí, afyɛ́ yi ntɨ.
Nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ basɛmɛ, are nɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Nsɔ́ŋtí anɛ áfú yi amʉɛt are chɨti amɨk mbɔ bakɔŋ manoŋ.]
Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, afate, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yí árɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Aghɔ bhɔ ndu bábhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́ ndu mánáŋ bápɔ́bhɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́.
Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎbhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́? Faté ká, mǎnɨkmʉɛt bɛ nɛmɔ nɛ́ntwɔ́, bǎkɛ́ kwɛn.”
Ɛnɛ́ Yesu abhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm nɔ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, ɛká bho ɛ́chwɔ́p. Júdas, mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu batí byó nɛ apay, abhak bɔ ambɨ. Arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ Yesu ndu bɛ́bhɛ́nɛ yi.
Kɛ Yesu abhɛp yi bɛ, “Júdas, ɔ̌bhɛ̀nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛti mɛ ntá bǒmpap abha?”
Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ fakari, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, sɛ́nsɔ́t bɔakparɛnja bhɛsɛ sɛnu nɛ bǒbhɛn-ɛ?”
Mmǔ wap amɔt agwɔp akparɛnja ywi. Akpɔ́t atú nsɛ̌m mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm chwát agʉɛ́p amɨk.
Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɔ!” Atɔk yɛ atú mmu wu, abu yi.
Yesu abhɛ́p yɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk abhɛn bátwɔ́ bɛkɛm yi bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ bɛkɛm mɛ nɛ bɔakparɛnja nɛ nkɨ́k mbɔ bɛ nchí chí ngɛ́bhɛ ntantaŋ?
Mpok nchí nɛ bhe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ́nji nɛnji, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kɛm mɛ. Kɛ mpok yɛka nɛ Satan, mfɔ ɛjuri, akway nɛ́nɛ.”
Bǒbhɔ bákɛ́m yɛ́ Yesu, bábhó bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Píta are koŋo bhɔ ansɛm nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ.
Bábháyti ngó nɛntɨ sɛnta. Bo báchɔ́kɔ nɛpaká ngó mángwaka nɔkɔ ngo. Píta achɔkɔ arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.
Ngɔrɛ́ bɛtok amɔt anɛ achi arɛ, aghɔ́ Píta nkwɔ arɛ́ chɔkɔ ndǔ ngo ághɔ̀ yi amʉɛt. Áyɨ́ŋɨ́ yi dǐǐ, arɛm bɛ, “Mɔ́nkwǎnɛ nkwɔ́ achi mbʉ nɛ Yesu.”
Píta ataŋa, arɛm bɛ, “Mma, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi.”
Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mmǔ achak aghɔ́ Píta arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ ɔchí mmǔ ywi amɔt.” Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Cháá, mpú nɛ bhɔ”
Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔkɔ mbɔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp nɛmɔt, mmǔ achak arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ nkwɔ́ achi mbʉ nɛ Yesu. Yi nkwɔ chi mmu Gálili.”
Píta aghati yi bɛ, “Nkwǎnɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ wɔ ɔ́rɛ̀m!” Tɛ́mté wu, ɛnɛ́ yi ábhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, nkɔk akók.
Acha ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t ayɨŋɨ Píta. Amɨ́k ayap átɛ́mɛ́ri. Píta atɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ághátí yi bɛ, “Nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók bɛti ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛrat bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
Afú nɛfí, adi kɛbhɔ, nɛ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ.
Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri Yesu bábho bɛyɔkɔ yi nɛ mándɛnɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛ ɛ́kpá.
Bágwɔ́t yi amɨ́k nkwɔ, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ yi bɛ, “Wɔ mmu ɔ́chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, ghatí bhɛsɛ! Agha ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́ wɔ?”
Bárɛ́m bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak, mánso nɔkɔ yi nɛ nsɔk.
Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bǒbati ɛtɔk, bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ ɛghǒ yap. Básɔ́t Yesu barɔk arɛ́ nɛ yi.
Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɔchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák ngátí bhe bǎpú noko;
nɛ mbák mbɛ́p bé ɛnyɨŋ, bapú kɛmɛ mɛ.
Kɛ bɛ́bhó ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm amfyɛ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú amfay nchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛyǎ kɛnókó, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛyi.”
Bɔ́ mankɛm babhɛp yi bɛ, “Nɔ́ ɔchí Mmɔ̌ Mandɛm-ɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎrɛ́mɛ́.”
Bɔ́ bárɛ́m bɛ, “Sɛ́pɛ́t sɛ́yàŋ batísiɛ́ mántwɔ́ mándɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ndaká yí? Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghok nɛ batú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú yi anyu.”
Nkwɔ́ bataŋá manyé bárɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bɔ̌ mankɛm báfáte, básɔt Yesu báré rɔ́ŋ ntá Páílet nɛ yi.
Bábhó bɛbhat yi barak amʉɛt mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛghɔ̌, mmǔ-nɛ ndu ákʉ̀ bɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ bákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛtɔk. Ǎkàŋ nkwɔ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ chyɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ árɛ̀m bɛ yí achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, nɔ́ chi bɛ achí Mfɔ.”
Páílet abhɛ́p yɛ Yesu bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.”
Páílet arɛm yɛ ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mmǔ-nɛ.”
Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɛmɛ bɛ, “Ǎkɔ̀ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho ndu mɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ yap amɛm bɛ mángʉ́ɛ́p ɛsɔŋɔri ɛtɔk. Akʉ nɔ́, bɛbho atú Gálili kpát bɛ́gháka fá Yerúsalɛm.”
Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, abhɛ́p bhɔ mbák Yesu achi mmu atú Gálili.
Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu afǔ atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Hɛ́rɔd achi mfɔ arɛ́, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mandɔk nɛ yi ntá Hɛ́rɔd. Mbɔŋ Hɛ́rɔd achi nyaka Yerúsalɛm mpok yɔ.
Hɛ́rɔd ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, ábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó, mbɔnyunɛ anáŋ ǎghòk nyaka ɛ̌ti yi nɛ abhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak tɛntɛp bɛghɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k. Ǎbhàka nyaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Yesu ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay yí angɔ́.
Ɛ́kʉ́ Hɛ́rɔd abhɛ́p Yesu bɛyǎ bɛbhɛp kɛ yɛ ɛ́mɔt Yesu ábhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ.
Ɛnɛ́ Hɛ́rɔd árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛbhɛp yi bɛbhɛp, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báte kɛkwɔt, mámbat nɔkɔ yi barak amʉɛt nɛ bɛyǎ ɛ̌yu.
Hɛ́rɔd nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi báré byak yi, mámfyɛ nɔkɔ yí ɛtáŋɔk. Mámɛ́sɛ yi nkú kɛfɔ amʉɛt. Arɛm bɛ́ mánsɔ́t yí mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Páílet nɛ yi.
Kɛmmʉɛrɛ Hɛ́rɔd nɛ Páílet kɛ́bho ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ. Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm bachi nyaka chi ndǔ mpap.
Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ntá Páílet nɛ Yesu, Páílet ató bábhɨ́ŋɨ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk.
Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ̀ fá ntá ya nɛ mmǔ-nɛ bɛ ǎkʉ̀ bo bákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛtɔk. Mbɛ̌p yi mɛnyɨŋ bɛsí bhɛka, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhě yi.
Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd nkwɔ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhě yi mbɔnyunɛ atǒ yi apɛtnsɛm ntá ya. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ yi abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mangway yi.
Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mándɛ́n yi, mámfɛrɛ yi amɔ.”
[Ɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Israɛl ɛ́chí nyaka bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bɔ́ mányìɛ̀ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, Páílet abhɔŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mmu amɔt anɛ bǒ Yerusalɛm báyàŋ yi amfɛrɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.]
Bɔ́ mankɛm bábɨ́k mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ mángwáy yi. Fɛrɛ́ bhɛsɛ chi Barábas!”
Barábas chi mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ nyaka ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ndǔ barak apay, “Agʉɛbhɛ́ nyaka ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk, nɛ awáy mmu.”
Páílet apɛt arɛm kɛpɨ ntá yap nɛ nkaysi bɛ́fɛ́rɛ Yesu amɔ.
Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛbɨk bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí! Mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!”
Ndǔ ndɔŋ anɛ ájwí ɛ́rát Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak yi ákʉ́? Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛ́bɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mángwáy yi. Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ mándɛ́n yi nɛ ɛ́kpá, mámfɛrɛ yi amɔ.”
Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛkpɛmɛ, mambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ Páílet andɔ mango yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bǎri map anyiɛrɛ Páílet, awupsi ntɨ.
Áká yɛ bɛ́ mánkʉ́ nɛ Yesu mbɔ ɛnyu bakɔŋɔ.
Afɛrɛ Barábas mmu ágʉ́ɛbhɛ́ ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk nɛ awáy mmu, ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ báyàŋ. Achyɛ Yesu ntá bo Israɛl bɛ mánkʉ nɛ yi mbɔ ɛnyu bákɔ́ŋɔ́.
Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t Yesu báre rɔ́ŋ nɛ yi. Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, bátɛ́mɛri mmǔ ɛtɔk Sírene amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Símun. Áfǔ nyaka ɛbhɨ ǎpɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, Yerúsalɛm. Bákɛ́m yi bábáyti nɛ ɛko Yesu, bákʉ yi apɔkɔ yɔ́ ankoŋo nɔkɔ Yesu.
Ngɛ́mtáy bhó báre koŋo Yesu ansɛm. Mbɔk yap bábhák baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn básɛ̀mɛ nyaka, mándi nɔkɔ yi.
Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ntá baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Baghɔrɛ Yerúsalɛm, bǎkɛ́ di mɛ! Dí ká chí mmʉɛt ɛyɛka nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka.
Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bo bárɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ, ‘Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛntɨkɨ nkongɔrɛ́ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhé!’
Ndǔ mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɛm ntá njiɛ ɛgho bɛ, ‘Kwɛ́n ká bay bhɛsɛ́’; nɛ ntá bɔ̌njiɛ bɛ, ‘Kutí ká bhɛsɛ.’
Bo bárɛ̀m chɔŋ nɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ, mbák bákwày bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntá ya, Mmɛ mmu nchí ɛnɔk ɛbɨk, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gú?”
Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ nɔ, basɔt bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bati apay nkwɔ abhɛn batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bárɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛway nɛ Yesu.
Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ njiɛ anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ *Ɛ̌nkɔ́nti, bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bágó nkwɔ́ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bhɔ bati apay, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí, amɔt ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Yesu, achák ɛbhě awɔ́ghɔ.
Arɛ́, amfǎy ɛkotákátí, Yesu anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, foŋorí bhɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀.” Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bágʉɛp ɛbháŋá ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyu bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɔ́rɛ ndɛn Yesu.
Bo bábhák arɛ́ tee mámkpɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fàkari. Kɛ bǒbati báré way yí way mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ǎpɛ̀mɛ nyaka bo bachak! Ámpɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi mbák achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmu Mandɛm Ayabhɛ!”
Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nkwɔ báré way Yesu, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛchyɛ yi mmɛ̌m amɛn ábáká.
Nɛ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák tɛtɛp ɔchí Mfɔ bo Israɛl, pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ!”
Amfay ntí Yesu, ɛbhɔ́kɛnɔk ɛbhak babhát ndǔ ɛko ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛ bɛ: “Nɛ́ chi Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
Nkʉ-bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ áchi nkwɔ́ kpaŋkpáŋ ndǔ ɛyǐ ɛkotákátí are way Yesu andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Pú wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò? Pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ, ɔ́mpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ́ nkwɔ bhɔ!”
Kɛ mmʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ achák wu are sayti yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ndu ɔ́gù ndǔ ɛkotákátí mbɔ Yesu, ɔpú cháy Mandɛm-ɛ́?
Wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛ́gù ɛ̌ti bɛpɔ̌ barak ayɛsɛ, kɛ mmǔ-nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ?”
Arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Yesu, ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso, mpok ɔ́bhak Mfɔ.”
Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbak nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt maŋák anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Párádis.”
Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, mmok ánɛ́m, ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛn ɛkuti ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm kpátɛ nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát beku,
mbɔnyunɛ mmok ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ ghɔɔ. Nɛ ɛkát ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛ́ghárɛ ndǔ bɛbhɔk bɛpay gbee.
Yesu abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɛtaya, ndɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛna amɔ́ yɛ!” Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɛbhɛ.
Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛfakari, abɨti Mandɛm, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ achí mbʉ chak bɛsí Mandɛm!”
Ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn báchɛ́mɛ́ nyaka arɛ ndu bɛghɔ, bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. Bágúrɛ nɛ basɛ́mɛ́, mámbyaka nɔkɔ amɔ antɨ.
Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, nɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bábhó bɛkoŋo yi tɛ Gálili, báté nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ mángɔ nɔkɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
Mmǔ amɔt achí nyaka Yerúsalɛm mpok yɔ. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f. Achi nyaka mmǔ Arimátia, ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Abhak ndɨ̌ndu nɛ mmǔ chak nɛ ǎnòŋ nyaka mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ bho. Abhak mmǔ amɔt ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ ɛgho ɛnɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk. Kɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka nɛ bhɔ ndǔ nkaysi yap nɛ nɛkʉ wap.
<range>
Yí arɔk ntá Páílet bɛ́ ánchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfɛrɛ Yesu amfǎy ɛkotákátí. Páílet áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi bɛtaŋ,
arɔk yɛ asɛbhɛ Yesu amɨk, anɛ́p yi nɛ ɛsyɛ̌ndɛn, arɔk afyɛ́ amɛm nnɛm ɛnɛ́n bátɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́, kɛ kɛre bhɛmɛ yɛ̌ mmu arɛ́.
Ɛ́chí nyaka chi nywɔp ɛnɛn bo bátòŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt, nɛ ɛ́rɔp chi mandú bɛgháká ndǔ mpok anɛ Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt nɛ́bho.
Baghɔrɛ abhɛn báfú nɛ Yesu tɛ Gálili, bákóŋo, baghɔ nnɛm, nɛ ɛnyǔ bábhʉ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt yi amɛm.
Bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báchɔ̀kɔ amɛm Yerúsalɛm. Bátóŋti bawɛt ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp amɛn báwati amʉɛt ngu. Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnap nɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́, báywěmʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
Nɛ nɛyǐnwyɔp ndǔ Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ básɔ́t bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn bɔ bághókó bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm Yesu nɛ nɛyǐnwyɔp.
Bághɔ́ bɛ ntay ɛnɛn anyǔ nnɛm nɛ́rɔp chi nɛpaká nnɛm.
Báchwé amɛm nnɛm, kɛ bákɛ ghɔ mmʉɛt yi.
Ɛ́chá bhɔ ɛnyu bákʉ. Tɛ́mté wu, babhakanɛm bati apay nɛ ndɛn amʉɛt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kɔ̀t ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ báté kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ.
Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ tontó. Bátɛ́p bati amɨk. Bǒ-bhɔ bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí báyàŋ mmu anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nkwɔ́ bawú?
Apú fá. Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari. Twɔ́ ká ghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi. Tɨ́k ka ndǔ yi ágháti bhe mpok ábhʉɛ́t atú Gálili nɛ bhe.
Yi arɛm nyaka bɛ, chɔŋ mámfyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm amɔ́ bǒ bɛbʉ́, mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí, nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
Baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bátɨk yɛ bɛyɔŋ Yesu.
Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm, bágháti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari ntá bǒnto Yesu bati byo nɛ amɔt nɛ bakoŋo bhi abhɛ́nɛ́fú mankɛm.
Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bághátí nyaka bǒnto Yesu mbok yɔ chi María anɛ áfú ɛtɔk Mágdala, nɛ Joana, nɛ María nnɔ Jems, nɛ baghɔrɛ́ báchák abhɛn báchi nyaka nɛ bhɔ.
Kɛ bǒnto básɔ́t ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɔ ɛráká ndak, bɔ́ kɛnókó wáwák.
Yɛ̌ nɔ́, Píta afate, ajɛt arɔk ndǔ nnɛm. Ákúrí nɔ́kɔ́, agʉɛp amɨ́k, ayɨŋɨ amɛm nnɛm. Aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn mánɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt Yesu nɛ bhɔ bhʉ́rɛ́. Apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, amakati nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ́fákárí.
Nkúbhɛ́ ɛwak ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bati apay báfá Yerúsalɛm bare rɔŋ ndu mɔ́tɔk anɛ bábhìŋɨ bɛ Ɛmayus, nɛkɔ̌ ɛnɛn nɛchi mbɔ bɔkilɔ́mɛta nɛ́nɛnamɔt nɛ ɛbhɔ́k.
Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí.
Ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m mánkɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ, mbɔŋ Yesu arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ ankɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ.
Kɛ ɛ́bhák mbɔ bɛ́ bágwɔt amɨ́k ayap. Bɔ́ kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ́ chí Yesu.
Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ndak bǎkɔ̀ mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ?” Báté nsónso.
Mmu wap amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Klópas abhɛ́p yɛ yi bɛ, “Ndiɛrɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí kɛnkɔ̌ anɛ átwɔ́ Yerúsalɛm anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́-nɛ?”
Abhɛ́p bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mɛnyɨŋ?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí nɛ Yesu anɛ Násárɛt. Achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛsí bho nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ yi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ̀m nɛ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
Kɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk abhɛsɛ bákɛ́m yi bachyɛ mangway, nɛ bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
Sɛ́bhaka nyaka ntɨ bɛ yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bo Israɛl ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛ́chí nɛ́nɛ manywɔp arat ɛnɛ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí.
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛ́chí bɛ́ mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ bákʉ batí átaka bhɛsɛ amɛm. Bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm běti bheti,
kɛ bákɛ ghɔ Yesu. Bápɛtnsɛm barɛm bɛ bághɔ̌ bo mbɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú abhɛn bághátí bhɔ bɛ Yesu achi nɛpɛ́m.
Mbɔk bo abhɛn báchí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm bághɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́, kɛ bɔ́ kɛghɔ́ mbɔŋ Yesu.”
Afɔ̌ kɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎchɨŋti bǎcha! Nɛ batɨ̌ yɛka ápú wakari mɛ́nóko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛmɛ!
Pú Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm kɛ anchwe ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki?”
Yesu abho yɛ mɛnɛnɛ ntá yap bɛ manjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti yi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, bɛ́bho ndǔ Basɨŋɨ Moses bɛrɔ́ŋ bɛghaka ndǔ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mankɛm.
Bágháká kɛkwɔt ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bárɔ̀ŋ, Yesu akʉ mbɔ bɛ ǎrɔ̀ bhɔ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ.
Kɛ bájwɛ́ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Bʉrɛ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ. Nywɔp nɛ́rɔŋ nɛ mbaŋ anaŋ ǎgiri.” Arɔk yɛ bɛbhʉrɛ nɛ bhɔ.
Mpok nɛnyíɛ́ ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, asɔt ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt. Áchyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Abho yɛ bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá yap.
Amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ bhɔ, bárɨ́ŋɨ yɛ bɛ chi yi. Kɛ anɛmsi bhɔ́ bɛsí.
Babho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Nyakányɛt maŋák achi mbʉ bhɛsɛ antɨ mpok yi árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ bhɛsɛ ambi, anɛnɛ nɔkɔ basɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ!”
Báfáte tɛ́mté bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Bághɔ́ bǒnto Yesu bati byo nɛ amɔt nɛ bakoŋo bhi abhɛ́nɛ́fú abhɛn báchí nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
Nɛchwe báchwé, bágháti bhɔ bɛ, “Acha apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m tɛtɛp! Atɔ̌ŋ mmʉɛt ntá Símun!”
Bǒbhɔ bati apay bágháti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari ambi, nɛ ɛnyu bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ yi mpok yi abɔkɔti brɛt achyɛ bhɔ manyíɛ́.
Ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi, mbɔŋ Yesu abhesi bɛsí bhap! Arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
Bácháyti, nɛ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ. Bákáysi bɛ bághɔ̀ nɔ chi ɛfóŋó ngu.
Kɛ abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎcháy yi? Yi mǎmàkati amɛm batɨ yɛka?
Ghɔ́ ká amɔ ya nɛ bɛkak ɛbha, mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ chi mɛ tɛtɛp. Mɔ́ ká mmʉɛ́t ya mǎngɔ bɛ chi mɛ. Ɛfóŋó ɛ́pú bhɔŋ mmʉɛt nɛ bɛghɛp mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ́ bɛ mbɔŋ.”
Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, atɔ́ŋ bɔ́ amɔ yi nɛ bɛkak.
Bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó nɛ babhak maknkay bɛ yi achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛkʉ bɔ́ kɛnókó bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp. Yesu abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ fá?”
Báchyɛ yi mbɨŋɨ́ nsi anɛ bágwɔ́.
Asɔt anyiɛ́ bɛsí bhap.
Aghati yɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀-nɛ́, chí nkúbhɛ́ barak anɛ mɛ̌ghàti nyaka bhe mpok mbʉɛt nɛ bhe. Mɛ̌ghàti nyaka be bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi amɛm basɨŋɨ́ Moses nɛ amɛn abhɛn bɛchi ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway ɛ̌ti ya, bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp.”
Anɛnɛ yɛ nkaysi yap bɛ mánjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.
Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Básɨŋ bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò abhɔŋ bɛ́ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, angú, nɛ bɛghaka manywɔp árát, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
Nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛghati bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni bɛbho Yerúsalɛm bɛ Mandɛm ǎfòŋori bo abhɛn bátɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.
Bǎchí batísiɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́gháti bo bachak bɔ mɛnkɛm.
Ghɔ́ ka, chɔŋ nto be akap anɛ Ɛtaya afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ntá yɛka. Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ mɛ́noŋ fá amɛm ɛtɔk kpátɛ bɛtaŋ mɛ́mfu amfay mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.”
Yesu asɔt yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, afú ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ. Bárɔ́k bachwɔp ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani. Arɛ́, ayoŋ amɔ amfay, are yɛt bhɔ.
Ɛnɛ́ yi áyɛ̀t bhɔ, arɔ bhɔ́, Mandɛm asɔt yi ámpɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
Nɛ ndǔ yi ákò baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré chyɛ yi kɛnókó. Bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm Yerúsalɛm nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
Báre rɔ́ŋ ɛkɛrákap mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
Bápɛ́rɛ ghoko mmɨk, mmu anɛ achi Ɛyɔŋ anáŋ achi nyaka. Abhak nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ abhak Mandɛm.
Abhak nɛ Mandɛm tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt.
Mandɛm afʉɛ́t ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ ghoko yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi apu nɛ yi.
Nɛpɛ́m nɛ́fù chí ntá yi mmu bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛyɔŋ. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhak ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mángɔ́ tɛtɛp.
Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ ɛ́ghɔ̀ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛjuri ɛchi, nɛ ɛjuri ɛ́pú kway mɛnɛmɛ yɔ.
Mandɛm atǒ nyaka mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Jɔ̌n.
Atwɔ́ bɛ́gháti bho ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛyɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, anoko yɔ.
Jɔ̌n apu nyaka ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ. Atwɔ́ chí bɛ́gháti bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ.
Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ tɛtɛp, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu angɔ mbaŋ ɛ́twɔ́ ntá bǒ mmɨk.
Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́bhak fá amɨk, nɛ báfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi kɛ bághoko mmɨk. Yɛ̌ nɔ, mpok yi átwɔ́ fá amɨk, bǒ mmɨk kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyu mmu yi achi.
Atwɔ́ ntá bǒbhi, kɛ bǒbhi bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt yi nɛ maŋák.
Kɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ yí nɛ maŋák, básɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, ǎchyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ mándɔp chí bɔ Mandɛm.
Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambak bǒbhi. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ fu nyaka yɛ chi amʉɛt nkwǎ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ.
Ɛyɔŋ, ɛ́yíbhiri nkwǎ, atwɔ́ achɔkɔ nɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghɔ́ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛjwi nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ tɛtɛp. Ɛyɔŋ chi Njaŋamɔ anɛ áfú ntá Ɛta.
Jɔ̌n ǎghàti nyaka bho ɛ̌ti yi ambɨk, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi mmǔ anɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mmǔ anɛ átwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm achá mɛ. Bápɛ́rɛ bhe mɛ, yí achi.’”
Ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ áfɔ́k ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ.
Mandɛm afʉɛt nyaka ntá Moses achyɛ bho bɛbhé. Kɛ afʉɛt chi ntá Yesu Kristo kɛ ǎtɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ tɛtɛp.
Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ Mandɛm. Njaŋamɔ ywi mmu achi nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ yi kɛ ákʉ́ bo mandɨŋɨ mmu yi achi.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, bǒbati bo Israɛl abhɛn Yerúsalɛm bátó bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi ntá Jɔ̌n bɛ mámbɛ́p yi angati bhɔ ɛnyǔ mmu yi achi. Nɛ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú Jɔ̌n anyu mbɔ ntísiɛ.
Yi kɛ bhɛsɛ bhɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ yi kɛ rɔ bɛkɛmɛ bhɔ. Arɛm bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛ kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.”
Bǒ bhɔ bápɛt bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí yɛ́ agha? Ɛláija kɛ?” Jɔ̌n yi bɛ, “Mpú Ɛláija.” Bápɛ́t babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ anɛ Moses árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ǎtwɔ̀?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ǎe.”
Ndɔŋ ɛyɔ bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔrɛm bɛ ɔchí agha? Ghatí bhɛsɛ mmu wɔ ɔchí bɛ́ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bátó bhɛsɛ. Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔchí agha?”
Jɔ̌n aghati bhɔ mbɔnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Asaya arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ, “Nchí mmǔ anɛ achi amɛm baso ábɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Nyabhɛ́ ká mbi Acha ambak chak.’”
Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi kɛ bátó nyaka bǒbhɔ ntá Jɔ̌n.
Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɛ́ ɔpú Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, ɔbhɛ́ ɔpú Ɛláija, nɛ ɔpú ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, kɛ ndaká yí ɔ́jwìti bho?”
Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛ̌jwìti bho nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ mmu áchí fá téé nɛntɨ ɛnɛka anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
Yi ǎtwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mmu anɛ nchí kaŋari nkwɔbhɛ́nya bɛkak ɛbhi.”
Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí chi ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, ɛbhě Nyɛ́n Jɔ́dan, nɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bho.
Ntɨ nywɔp, Jɔ̌n aghɔ Yesu ndu átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm fá amɨk!
Yí kɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mmǔ ǎtwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm anɛ acha mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bápɛrɛ bhe mɛ, yi achi.’
Yɛ̌ mɛmbɔŋ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ chi yí, kɛ ntí anɛ ntwɔ́ njwiti nɔkɔ bho nɛ manyiɛp chí ndu bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mandɨŋɨ mmu yi achi.”
Jɔ̌n abho bɛghati bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k ɛ̌ti Yesu. Yí bɛ, “Ngɔ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áfú amfay asɔt mkpá ɛbhóŋó are sɛp kpát ate yi amʉɛt.
Kpátɛ mpok ɛyɔ, nkɛ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ chí yí. Kɛ Mandɛm mmu átó mɛ njwiti bho nɛ manyiɛp, anáŋ aghati nyaka mɛ bɛ, ‘Mmu anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm asɛbhɛ arɔp nɛ yi, yí wu kɛ achi mmu anɛ ájwìti bho nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.’
Mɛ Jɔ̌n ngɔ nɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí, nɛ nchí rɛm mbɔ ntísiɛ bɛ tɛtɛp mmǔ-nɛ chi Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Jɔ̌n apɛt abhak téé nɛ bakoŋo bhi bati apay.
Aghɔ́ ndǔ Yesu áfʉɛ̀t, arɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm!”
Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n bati apay bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, bárɔ́ yi bábho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ bhɔ ndu bákòŋo yi. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎyàŋ yi?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Rábay, ɔ̌chɔkɔ fá?” [Rábay chi Ntɔŋ]
Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká ghɔ.” Bárɔ́k nɛ Yesu baghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi áchɔ̀kɔ. Mpok yɔ nywɔp nɛ́bhák mbɔ nkárɛ́nká ɛnwi ɛnɛ́ ngósí. Bábhák nɛ yi kpátɛ̌ bɛti bɛgʉ.
Mmu amɔt ndǔ bǒbhɔ bati apay abhɛn bághoko nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu, nɛ abho bɛkoŋo yi aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Andru. Abhak manɔ Símun Píta.
Arɔk tɛ́mté, aghɔ mɔ́mayi Símun, aghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, ‘Mɛsáya’”, nɔ chi, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
Andru asɔt Símun arɔk ntá Yesu nɛ yi. Yesu ayɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n. Chɔŋ nnyɛ́n ɛna nɛ́chák nɛ́mbak bɛ Sɛ́fas” [nɔ chí Sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́].
Ntɨ nywɔp, Yesu akʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔŋ atú Gálili. Arɔk aghɔ́ mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Fílip. Aghati yi bɛ, “Twɔ́ bhák nkoŋo wa.”
Fílip abhak mmǔ Bɛtsáida, nkúbhɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Andru nɛ Píta báfú arɛ́.
Fílip arɔk atɛmɛri Natániɛl aghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ̌ mmu anɛ Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi amɛm Ɛkáti Bɛbhé Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ yi mmǔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nkwɔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti yi. Nɔ chi, Yesu mmu Násárɛt, mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f.”
Natániɛl ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Fílip árɛ́mɛ́ abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kway bɛfu Násárɛt?” Fílip aghati yi bɛ, “Wɔmbɔŋ twɔ́ ghɔ́.”
Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Natániɛl átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Nɛ́, chi mbɔ̌ŋ mmǔ Israɛl tɛ́mɛ́ tɛ́mɛ́. Bapu apú nɛ yi wáwák.”
Natániɛl abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ɔkʉ ná kɛ ɔ̌rɨŋɨ mɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Fílip ápɛ́rɛ bhɨŋɨ wɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ ɔ́chí anɛrɛ́nɔk fig, nnáŋ ngɔ wɔ.”
Natániɛl arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp! Ɔchí Mfɔ bo Israɛl!”
Yesu ákɛ́mɛ́ yí bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ ngɔ wɔ anɛrɛ́nɔk fig kɛ ɔ́nókó bɛ́ nchí Mmɔ Mandɛm? Chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɛn.”
Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, chɔŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ nɛbu nɛ́nɛnɛ gbee, bɔángɛl Mandɛm mánkó amfay mánsɛbhɛ nɔkɔ amɨk bɛtɛmɛri Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm.”
Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp apay, ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛ́bhák amɛm ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili. Nnɔ Yesu abhak arɛ́.
Mának nyaka Yesu nkwɔ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛyɔ.
Mmɛ́m ámáy nɔ́kɔ́, nnɔ Yesu arɔk aghati yi bɛ, “Mmɛ́m ɛpǎ amay.”
Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmá, ndaká yí ɔ́sɔŋɔri mɛ ɛ̌ti mmɛ́m? Mpok aya abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway.”
Máyi aghati bo abhɛn bákɔ̀rɛ mmɛm bɛ, “Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ághàti bhe.”
Bɛjɔ̌ manyiɛp bɛtandat bɛchi nyaka arɛ téé. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛjɔ ɛ́sɔ̀t nyaka mbɔ líta manyiɛp bɛsǎ byo. Bɛ́kóŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl, básɔ̀t nyaka manyiɛp ndǔ bɛjɔ ɛbhɔ ndu bɛ́so bɛ́pókó mmʉɛt.
Yesu aghati bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bɛ, “Fíɛ́ ká manyiɛp amɛm bɛjɔ ɛbhɔ kpát mɛ́njwi.” Báfyɛ́ manyiɛp amɛm bɛjɔ, bɛ́jwí tɛ anyu.
Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mbɔk mǎnchyɛ́ ntá mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay”. Bákʉ́ nɔ́.
mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay ághókótí nɔ́kɔ́, aghɔ́ bɛ́ manyiɛp mɔ arɔp chi mmɛ́m. Yi kɛrɨŋɨ ɛbhak mɔ́ áfú, yɛ̌ndu bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bákò mɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ manyiɛp kɛ ayibhiri ndǔ mmɛm. Mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay abhɨŋɨ mbǎyngɔrɛ́,
